76b6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba 'jug pa/ bram ze'i byis pa thams cad kyi nang na mchog tu bya ba 'di/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkod pa chen po zhes bya bar 'gyur
76b7(mdo sde): te/ de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i blo gros kyi tog gi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa bzhin du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i che
77a1(mdo sde): bos nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de las/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cus sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab ste/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhi
77a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa bden pa'i blo gros kyi tog gi rgyal po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ bdag cag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams der skye bar shog cig
77a3(mdo sde): ces smon lam btab par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar lung bstan to// de nas gcer bu pa 'bum phrag brgyad cu po de dag gis kyang tshig 'thun par
77a4(mdo sde): smras pas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar lung bstan to//
77a5(mdo sde): de nas steng gi bar snang las kyang lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcus 'di skad kyi tshig brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i
77a6(mdo sde): blo gros kyi tog gi rgyal po de/ byang chub brnyes pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rnam par bltas pa'i grags pa can der skye bar gyur cig/ yon tan bkod pa bsam gyis mi
77a7(mdo sde): khyab pa de yang mthong bar shog cig ces smon lam btab bo/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag khyed cag kun kyang 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rnam par bltas pa'i grags pa
77b1(mdo sde): can der skye bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de yang mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro// lha'i bu khyed kyang 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rnam par bltas pa'i grags pa can de nyid du bla na med pa yang dag
77b2(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ ming tha dad pa'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur la/ tshe'i tshad ni 'thun par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen
77b3(mdo sde): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ sa'i 'og nas pad+ma 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi 'dab ma can/ nor bu rin po che chen po an+da rnyil gyi ze ba'i tshogs can/ spug gi snying po dang
77b4(mdo sde): ldan pa nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Ya'i chu ba can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis sa gzhi brtol nas mngon par 'phags te/ pad+ma de dag thams cad la byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs skyil mo krung
77b5(mdo sde): du 'khor pa mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa'i lus kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bar gnang bar gyur te/ de dag gis rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi dra ba
77b6(mdo sde): dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab nas 'di skad kyi tshig brjod do// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni 'jig rten gzhan dang / gzhan gyi khams nas de bzhin gshegs par byang chub
77b7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa 'di'ang nyan/ bcom ldan 'das la yang blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / rigs kyi bu bden smra 'di dang / 'khor
78a1(mdo sde): 'dus pa 'di yang blta ba'i slad du 'dir mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag tu byang chub sems dpa'
78a2(mdo sde): bgrang ba las 'das pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe don 'di nyid shin tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di
78a3(mdo sde): dag bka' stsal to/ / rtse gcig sems su dbang po mnyam zhog ste/ de ring ngas smras padi don mnyan par gyis// de bzhin gshegs la brdzun gyi tshig mi mnga'// bde gshegs rang byung tshig ni gzhan
78a4(mdo sde): du min/ / skye bo de dga' bden smra 'di nyid ni// dag cing dri med gnod med bskal pa la// bskal pa grangs me mang po 'jig rten du// 'tshang rgya bden pa'i blo gros tog gi rgyal// nyon mongs
78a5(mdo sde): gnod pa de las mi 'byung ste/ / de phyir bskal pa de ni gnod med pa// 'jig rten ming yang rnam par bltas pa ste// bskal pa de ni dpal gyi phung por 'gyur// rnam par 'dren pa de yi bskal pa de//
78a6(mdo sde): lha mi rnams kyis blta ba'i 'os 'gyur te// rin chen tshogs kyis 'obs dang rta babs rnams// nyams dga' kun nas shin tu mdzes par 'gyur// 'dzam bu'i gling gi gser gyi dra bas g.yogs// chos
78a7(mdo sde): kyi sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba bsgrags/ / seng ge'i rgyal mtshan rab rnams rtag tu bsgreng // rin chen tshogs kyi lnga ldi brgya dag sbyangs// rtsig pa'i rgyud ni rin chen dri med de// de ni lha yi khyim dang 'dra bar
78b1(mdo sde): 'gyur/ / mtshe'u dang lum pad+ma'i mtsho dag gis// de ni rtag tu legs par brgyan par gyur// de yi chu gtsang pad+ma ut+pal dang // pad+ma dkar po dag gis kun khebs 'gyur// gling bzhi pa yi 'jig rten
78b2(mdo sde): bar ma de/ / ming ni blta na sdug cing yid 'ong ste// de ni bde gshegs de yi skye ba'i sa// rang byung de ni bram ze'i rigs las 'byung // thub pa'i yum ni shugs dang ldan zhes bya// yab ni tshangs pa'i dbyig ces
78b3(mdo sde): bya bar 'gyur/ / de yi bu ni rnam grags sgra zhes bya// dper na nga'i bu sgra gcan zin 'di 'dra// bde gshegs de yi btsun mo dam pa ni// blo gros che no nga yis 'tsho bzhin// de yi ma ma ming ni grags chen te//
78b4(mdo sde): nga yi skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo bzhin// thub pa'i rim gro byed pa'i sems can 'phags// rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhes bya ba ste// nga yi rim gro 'dun pa gus ldan bzhin// de ni 'dren pa de la rim gro byed// thub
78b5(mdo sde): pa de yi rta mchog 'gyur ba ni/ / shugs can zhes bya'i ming dang ldan 'gyur te// bde gshegs mngon par 'byung tshe bcibs par 'gyur// nga yi rta mchog bsngags ldan gyur pa bzhin// bde gshegs
78b6(mdo sde): de yi rdzogs pa byang chub shing / / chos kyi 'phags zhes bya ba de tshe 'byung // shing mchog brgya phrag stong du bsgyur ba yi// phrag ni brgyad cu dag gis de bskor 'gyur// shing mchog de drang kye ma chos
78b7(mdo sde): kyi rgyal/ / rang byung zla med bde zhes bya ba zhugs nas// bla na med pa'i byang chub rab zhi ba// mya ngan med pa mngon par 'tshang rgyar 'gyur// de na bdud med bdud kyi phyogs kyang med// bdud kyi las kyang der
79a1(mdo sde): 'byung mi 'gyur ro/ / rgyal ba thub pa gang zag bla med de'i// sangs rgyas zhing ni gnod sngo med par 'gyur// mi dang lha tshogs mang po 'du 'gyur te// rnam dag shin tu sbyangs pa
79a2(mdo sde): 'byung / / de kun me tog 'phreng ba gos dang glu// rol mo'i sgra yis bde gshegs drung 'dod 'gyur// rgyal bas de dag bsam mkhyen mdo sde 'di// mdo gzhan lhan cig drang srong gsung bar 'gyur// rgyal
79a3(mdo sde): ba des ni rab tu gsungs pa yi/ / mdo sde khyad par 'phags pa 'di thos nas// sems can dpag yas gang+gA'i bye ma snyed// thub dbang byang chub mchog tu mi ldog 'gyur// theg pa dman pa der 'byung mi 'gyur/
79a4(mdo sde): te// rang rgyal theg pa'ang dar ni 'byung mi 'gyur// rgyal ba de yi sangs rgyas zhing mchog dar// byang chub sems dpa' ba byung kun dpa' zhing mdzangs// rkang gnyis mchog de'i 'dus pa dang por ni//
79a5(mdo sde): rgyal sras grags pa'i bod ldan gang 'byung ba// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog/ rnam dag gang+gA'i rdul bas mang ba 'byung // blo bzang ldan pa'i 'dus pa gnyis pa ni// skye ba
79a6(mdo sde): gcig gnas khrag khrig brgyad cu 'byung / / 'dus pa gsum pa byang chub sems dpa' mchog/ dkrigs phrag drug cu dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur// bde bar gshegs de'i tshe yi tshad 'gyur ba// bskal
79a7(mdo sde): pa bar ma drug cu tshang ba ste/ / rgyal ba de ni mya ngan 'das gyur nas// mi yi 'dzin pa'i chos kyi sgron ma yang // lo grangs bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag ni// brgyad cu tham par gnas par 'gyur ba yin//
79b1(mdo sde): rang gi sku gdung ring bsrel rgyas mdzad cing // de ni gdul ba rab mang 'dul bar 'gyur// drang srong che de byang chub sems dpa' ni// tog chen lung bstan mdzad nas mya ngan 'dab// 'di ni bkod/
79b2(mdo sde): chen zhes bya'i thub dbang 'gyur// rgyal ba dgra las rgyal bar 'di 'gyur ro// rgyal ba de yi zhing bkod 'di 'dra ste// 'jig rten phan par mdzad pa 'di bzhin no// rgyal ba'i byang chub mnyam med dri
79b3(mdo sde): med pa/ / rab zhi rdzogs par sangs rgyas mgon por 'gyur// nga yi mkhyen pa de 'dra nam mkha'i tshad// bskal pa 'byung ba mang po rab tu shes// 'das pa'i los shes da lta ci zhig sems// nga yi ye shes
79b4(mdo sde): kun tu thogs med mnga'/ / nga yi tshig ni dag cing brdzun med de// brdzun du mi smra don dam bden pa la// nga gnas nas ni nam yang mi smra'o// ji skad gsungs pa 'di la yid ches bgyis// drang srong chen po'i
79b5(mdo sde): gsung 'di thos gyur nas/ / 'khor rnams kun kyang dga' ba'i sems gyur te// de tshe khams der skye bar shog cig ces// zhing mchog der skyer dad pas smon lam btag/ 'jig rten khams mchog de na
79b6(mdo sde): skye 'gyur zhes/ / 'jig rten 'dren pas de dag lung bstan te// de ni khyod kyis bde gshegs thob gyur nas// kun kyang sems can don mang byed par 'gyur// mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di bstan da'i
79b7(mdo sde): tsho/ / sa chen 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos// byang chub sems dpa' pad+mar gnas pa dag/ de tshe thal sbyar thub la 'di skad gsol// khyod kyis chos tshul dam pa 'di gsungs pa// thub pa zla med
80a1(mdo sde): rang bzhin shin tu legs/ / chos kyi tshul rab dam pa mnyan pa dang // rgyal ba'i chos 'tshal bdag cag 'dir mchis lags// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de tshim zhing
80a2(mdo sde): mgu ste/ / yi rangs la rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ gos re re bzhag ste/ gos gzhan dag bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol nas/ tshig 'di skad kyang smras te/ kye ma 'jig rten du chos
80a3(mdo sde): kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gnyis pa byung bar gyur te/ dang po ni grong khyer wA raNA sir bskor to// chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de ring 'dir bskor to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang rtag
80a4(mdo sde): tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos rin po che 'di lta bu 'di dang mi 'bral zhing / skyes bu dam pa 'di dang mi 'bral bar shog cig ces smon lam btab bo// steng gi bar snang las kyang lha'i rje chen po dag sgra mngon par
80a5(mdo sde): 'byin par gyur to/ / lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po'i char chen po yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung du mngon par bab par gyur to// stang gi bar snang la yang lha rnams kyis
80a6(mdo sde): lha'i gos dag g.yab mo'i thabs su bskor te/ tshig 'di skad kyang brjod par gyur to// skyes bu dam pa gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa de dag ni yon tan bsam gyis
80a7(mdo sde): mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'o/ / de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam
80b1(mdo sde): grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa dang / glags bam du bgyis shing 'chang na/ bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed cig 'phel bar 'gyur/
80b2(mdo sde): lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis so
80b3(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can gzugs can nam/ gzugs can ma yin pa 'am/ 'du shes can nam/ 'du shes can ma yin pa ji snyed pa dang / sems can rtse khams
80b4(mdo sde): na sems can ji snyed cig yod par sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mkhyen pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
80b5(mdo sde): par gyur la/ de dag thams cad la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bskal par gnas pa'i tshe/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas/ bla ma bas/ bsti stang
80b6(mdo sde): du byas/ mchod par byas na/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams mang du su ngang ba/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang legs so//
80b7(mdo sde): bar gshegs pa mang lags te/ 'di ltar bgrang ba'am/ brtsi bar yang sla ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis ba/ 'a stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bas kyang gang 'is chos kyi rnam sangs 'di
81a1(mdo sde): 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston tam/ glags bam du bris te 'chang ngam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan na/ chos kyi
81a2(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di lung 'bog pa de bsod nams mang du skyed do/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de
81a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten thams cad la sman pa'i slad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa 'di ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring po ji srid cig tu 'dzam bu'i/
81a4(mdo sde): gling na mchis par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal nga mya ngan las 'das nas/ gang gi tshe rgyal po brgyad kyis nga'i ring bsrel rgya cher bya ba'i phyir brgyad du bgos nas
81a5(mdo sde): za ma tog brgyad du bcug ste/ rang rang gi yul du mchod kyi/ khang pa yangs par 'jog par 'gyur te/ rgyal po ma skyes dgras ni nga'i ring bsrel rnams las brgyad na blangs nas/ rin po na'i za ma tog tu bcug
81a6(mdo sde): ste/ rgyal po'i khab kyis grong khyer chen po'i phyi rol dus brkos nas/ ring bsrel la pog snod kha gab can nas/ spos kyis bdugs/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ni btsugs/ rin po che'i me tog
81a7(mdo sde): gis ni gtor/ lo brgyar byin gyis brlabs pa'i mar me me lce gcig tu 'bar ba bus shing / ring bsrel gyi za ma tog 'jog par 'gyur la/ rgyal po mya ngan med pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba bsdad pa'i phyir/
81b1(mdo sde): mdo'i rgyal po 'di gser gyi glags bam la bris nas/ ring bsrel gyi za ma tog de nyid du 'jug par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ rgyal po mya ngan med pa de ni nga mya ngan las 'das nas
81b2(mdo sde): lo brgya lon nas 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ni mo'u ri'i rigs su skyes pa/ 'dzam bu'i gling la dbang ba/ mthu dang brtson pa thob pa/ stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/ de nga la rnam pa las rjes
81b3(mdo sde): su dran par byed par 'gyur ro/ / nga'i bstan pa la yang dad pa thob par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ dge slong dbang po bde ba zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa/
81b4(mdo sde): shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'dzin pa rgyal po'i rigs las rab tu byung ba/ rgyal po mya ngan med pas bkur ba/ grong du 'jug pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de ltar rgyal po mya ngan med pa des nga'i ring
81b5(mdo sde): bsrel rgya cher bya ba'i phyir/ skye bo mang pos yongs su bskor cing bkod pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen pos me tog dang / me tog 'phreng dang / spos dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang /
81b6(mdo sde): sil snyan dang / phag thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por song nas/ mchod pa'i go cha mngon par 'du bya ba chen po byas te/ sa'i phyogs de nas ring bsrel gyi za ma tog de phyung nas
81b7(mdo sde): nyi ma bdun gyi bar du spos thams cad dang / me tog thams cad dang / me tog 'brang thams cad dang / phye ma thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / sil snyan dang / pheg dang /
82a1(mdo sde): glu dbyangs thams cad kyis mchod pa rnam pa du ma byas te/ skar ma dang / sbyor ba ldan pa gcig la/ yul sna tshogs su chos kyi rgyal pos byas pa'i mchod rten brgyad khri bzhi stong
82a2(mdo sde): byed par 'gyur ro/ / de'i tshe chos smra ba dbang po bde bas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ring bsrel gyi za ma tog nas phyung nas/ byang phyogs kyi rgyud kyi yul chen por 'jog par 'gyur te/ skye bo mang pos shes par mi
82a3(mdo sde): 'gyur/ skye bo mang pos rig par mi 'gyur/ skye bo mang pos yongs su gzung bar mi 'gyur la/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'dzin pa nyung ba dang / klog pa nyung bar 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs
82a4(mdo sde): 'di ni rtag tu sgom du bcug pa dang / snod du bcug par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos tshol ba med cing / snod ma yin pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni mos par da
82a5(mdo sde): zhing yid ches par dka' la/ / rtogs par dka' ba ste/ mun sprul du mngon par yid ches pa 'am/ 'jug par mi nus so// 'jam dpal phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus/ lnga brgya tha ma la bab pa'i tshe/ chos kyi
82a6(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di gang la la dag gis thos te/ yid ches par gyur dam/ tshol lam rtog na/ de dag ni 'jam dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ legs par spyad pa
82a7(mdo sde): spyad pa/ theg pa chen po 'di'i snod du gyur par nges par rig par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rig kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chung
82b1(mdo sde): par byed pa dang / glegs bam du byas shing / 'chang ba de dag thams cad kyis kyang bdag cag gis ni/ sngon de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag mthong bar gyur to// mnyes par
82b2(mdo sde): byas so/ / bsnyen bkur byas so zhes bya ba dang / de dag gis ni nga yang skyed mos tshal 'di na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston pa dang / 'khor 'dus pa 'di yang mthong ngo zhes de ltar shes par bya'o//
82b3(mdo sde): de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di long zhig/ zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ dbang po rnams ma/
82b4(mdo sde): gtogs par bab bab kyi mdun du ma ston cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba yin pa dang / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang chen yin pa dang / 'di ni de bzhin/
82b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i bar chad med pa'i chos bstan pa yin pa dang / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya yin pa dang / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsrung ba bsgom pa yin pa dang / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
82b6(mdo sde): gter gyi mchog yin pa'i phyir te/ kun dga' bo de bas na nga'i bu thu bo chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa/ chos kyi mdzod bsrung ba/ de dag la sbyin par bya ba ma gtogs par 'di ni shin tu sba bar bya zhing / su la'ang
82b7(mdo sde): sbyin par mi bya'o/ / kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar
83a1(mdo sde): gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gyi thabs kyi yul la rnam
83a2(mdo sde): par 'phrul pa bstan pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gnas zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar chad med pa'i chos bstan pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshes
83a3(mdo sde): pa'i yul zhes bya ba dang / theg pa gcig tu bstan pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jam dpal gyis yongs su dris pa zhes bya ba dang / bden smra lung bstan pa zhes bya ba dang / bden spro'i le'u zhes bya bar yang
83a4(mdo sde): zung zhig/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ srog chags khrag khrig phrag sum cu sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma skyes pa las sems skyes par gyur to//
83a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' drug khris ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// sems can tshad med pa dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to//
83a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i
83a7(mdo sde): 'khor dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang /
83b1(mdo sde): dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / 'phags pa byang chub sems
83b2(mdo sde): dpa'i spyod yul gyi thabs kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA wa rma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa
83b3(mdo sde): bas+t+ra ya shes rje la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la bab pa/ / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ta thA ga ta gu Na dz+nyA na a cin t+ya bi Sh+Ta ya a ba tang
83b4(mdo sde): nir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul la 'jug pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// /
83b5(mdo sde): / bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha na
83b6(mdo sde): chos kyi dbye dgon pa na/ byang chub kyi snying po kun tu 'od kyi khang bzangs bsod nams kyi rgyan gyi tshogs chen po bsags pa/ dga' ba rgya chen po skyed pa/ kun nas ma smad pa/ yon tan gyi tshogs dpag
83b7(mdo sde): tu med pa dang ldan pa na bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/ legs par thugs su chud pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ kun tu spyod pa gnyis mi
84a1(mdo sde): mnga' ba/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la mchog tu gzhol bar mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas pas gnas pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i
84a2(mdo sde): rtog pa brnyes pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos dang ldan pa/ spyod yul gyis mi 'phrogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' yas pa rgyun mi gcod pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par 'jog pa/ mtshan
84a3(mdo sde): nyid med pa'i chos kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu byon pa/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid tshar phyin pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du zhugs pa'i sku dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la the tsom med pa'i mkhyen
84a4(mdo sde): pa mnga' ba/ spyod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i blo mnga' ba/ chos mkhyen pa la nem nur mi mnga' ba/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i sku mnga' ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes yang dag
84a5(mdo sde): par blangs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa gnyis su med pa dam pa'i pha rol tu byon pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'dres pa rnam par thar par mdzad pa'i ye shes kyi mthar phyin pa mtha' dang dbus
84a6(mdo sde): med pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa/ chos kyi dbyings dam pa can/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha sa gtugs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par bskal pa bgrang ba thams
84a7(mdo sde): cad du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba rgyun mi gcod pa'i sku mnga' ba/ pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te/ dge slong 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis dang thabs gcig pa la 'di lta ste/
84b1(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / 'od srungs chen po dang / ma 'gags pa dang / rab 'byor dang / ka t+ya'i bu dang / ka pi na chen po dang / nag pa dang / dga' bo
84b2(mdo sde): chu klung 'od srungs dang / ga ya 'od srungs dang / lteng rgyas 'od srungs dang / byams ma'i bu gang po dang / ba glang bdag dang / lam phran bstan dang / gyad bu nor dang / seng ldeng nags
84b3(mdo sde): pab dang / skul byed dang / gsus po che chen po dang / sgra gcan zin dang / kun dga' bo dang / de dag la sogs pa dge slong 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis po de dag thams cad kyang / chos
84b4(mdo sde): gcig la yang dag par gzhol ba 'phags pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa dag stag go/ thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi tshul la bzhugs pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang gzhi med
84b5(mdo sde): ba nam mkha'i spyod yul ba sha stag go/ thams cad kyang mi rten par gnas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba sha stag go/ thams cad
84b6(mdo sde): kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang spyod pa la zhugs pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa sha stag go/ / thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba la zhugs pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang de
84b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings snang ba'i tshul la zhugs pa sha stag go/ / thams cad kyang chos kyi tshul gcig la yang dag par gzhol ba sha stag go// thams cad kyang thams cad
85a1(mdo sde): mkhyen pa nyid la mngon du phyogs pa sha stag go/ / thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam rgyun ma bcad pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
85a2(mdo sde): las phyir ma log pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang shes rab dang / ye shes mngon par grub pa'i yid dang ldan pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang lhag mthong dam
85a3(mdo sde): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang thabs kyi yul dang spyod yul la nges par 'byung ba sha stag go// dge slong ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen po dang / dge slong ma grags
85a4(mdo sde): 'dzin la sogs pa dge slong ma 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis dang yang thabs gcig ste/ thams cad kyang dkar po'i chos shin tu yongs su bsdus pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i
85a5(mdo sde): ye shes la nye bar gyur pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi snang ba'i tshul la zhugs pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang chos thams cad dngos po med par rab tu rtogs pa ga
85a6(mdo sde): stag go/ chos thams cad la mtshan nyid med par zhugs pa/ chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mthar rig pa/ chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa dang / gnyen po med par mos pa/ bsam
85a7(mdo sde): kyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang 'dul ba'i sems can ji lta ba de bzhin du rnam par mi rtog cing spun gyis grub par gzug dang /
85b1(mdo sde): lus dang / kha dog dang / spyod lam shin tu ston pa sha stag go// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu'i
85b2(mdo sde): rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs gcig pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / kun nas 'dren dang / kun
85b3(mdo sde): tu sprul dang / kun tu shes rab dang / kun tu mig dang / kun tu 'od dang / kun tu snang ba dang / kun tu 'od zer dang / kun tu tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu blo dang /
85b4(mdo sde): shugs chen dang / shugs chen 'dzin dang / rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i rgyal po dang / brtson 'grus chen pos rnam par gnon dang / rtsal chen dpa' ba dang /
85b5(mdo sde): cher ba sgyings dang / bsgyings pa chen po'i stobs dang / tshogs kyi dbang po chen po dang / spos kyi bal glang glang po che chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba chen
85b6(mdo sde): po dang / zla ba bzang dang / yon tan zla ba dang / rin chen zla ba dang / kun tu snang ba'i zla ba dang / chos dri ma med pa'i zla ba dang / rnam par snang byed zla ba dang / rnam par bsgrags pa'i
85b7(mdo sde): zla ba dang / 'od zer rab tu gtong ba'i zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla gang dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / tshangs pa'i dbang pos bsgrags pa'i dbyangs dang / sa'i
86a1(mdo sde): sgra dbyangs dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sgra dbyangs dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i dbyangs dang / chos kyi rnga chen sgra dbyangs dang / kun tu go bar
86a2(mdo sde): byed pa'i dbyangs dang / mi rtog rnam par mi rtog dbyangs dang / sa steng sgra dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbyangs kyi yan lag thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i dbyangs dang //
86a3(mdo sde): kun nas snying po dang / kun tu dri ma med pa'i snying po dang / yon tan snying po dang / rnam par snang mdzad snying po dang / rin chen snying po dang / zla ba'i snying po dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / snang byed snying po dang /
86a4(mdo sde): pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po dang / rdo rje'i snying po dang / blo gros bzang po dang / blo gros chen po dang / khyad par blo gros dang / rnam grags blo gros dang / rgyal chen blo gros dang / bla ma'i blo gros dang /
86a5(mdo sde): 'phel ba'i blo gros dang / mtha' yas blo gros dang / yangs pa'i blo gros dang / sangs rgyas blo gros dang / blo gros mi zad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho dang /
86a6(mdo sde): bstan pa'i blo gros dang / rdo rje blo gros dang / sangs rgyas mngon sum blo gros dang / ri rab mar me dang / mar me chen po dang / chos kyi sgron ma'i mar me dang / phyogs thams cad du khyab pa'i mar me dang
86a7(mdo sde): kun tu mar me dang / mun pa thams cad sel ba'i mar me dang / 'gro ba thams cad la snang ba'i mar me dang / gcig tu snang ba'i mar me dang / zla ba'i mar me dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
86b1(mdo sde): chen po nyi ma'i mar me dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lag na rin chen gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lag na phyag rgya rin chen gzhon nur gyur pa dang / rin chen 'od zer gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
86b2(mdo sde): nam mkha' mdzod gzhon nur gyur pa dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gzhon nur gyur pa dang / dra ba can gyi 'od gzhon nur gyur pa dang / rnam par sel ba gzhon nur gyur pa da
86b3(mdo sde): bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba gzhon nur gyur pa dang / dpal gyi snying po gzhon nur gyur pa dang / seng ge gzhon nur gyur pa dang / zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa dang / zla ba'i 'od zer gzhon nur
86b4(mdo sde): gyur pa dang / mchog gi blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang / rgyan bkod pa gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lag na pad+ma dang / lag na rdo rje dang / nyi bod dang / nor bu dang / glo ga dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / brgya byin dang /
86b5(mdo sde): tshangs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i 'od dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'joms pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
86b6(mdo sde): yul thams cad las nges par 'byung ba'i blo gros dang / rdul med rnam par gnon dang / rnam dag rnam par gnon dang / phung po rnam par gnon dang / skye mched rnam par gnon dang / khams rnam par
86b7(mdo sde): gnon dang / stong pa nyid rnam par gnon dang / mtshan ma med pa rnam par gnon dang / smon pa med pa rnam par gnon dang / skye ba med pa rnam par gnon dang / 'gag pa med pa rnam par gnon dang / 'gro ba med pa
87a1(mdo sde): rnam par gnon dang / 'ong ba med pa rnam par gnon dang / 'chi 'pho med pa rnam par gnon dang / mi skye ba rnam par gnon dang / rang bzhin 'od gsal rnam par gnon dang / 'jig
87a2(mdo sde): rten gsum rnam par gnon dang / mtha' yas rnam par gnon dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par gnon dang / chos thams cad rnam par gnon dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
87a3(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad rnam par gnon dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa rnam par gnon dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnam par gnon dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam
87a4(mdo sde): par gnon dang / de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par gnon dang / mnyam pa nyid rnam par gnon dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings rnam par gnon dang / bdud yul mi
87a5(mdo sde): go sa dang / bdud las rgyal dang / bdud las rgyal chen po dang / gtsug na rin po che dang / 'od zer stong gi 'od 'phro dang / mngon par 'byung dka' dang / rab tu thu ba dka' dang / rtogs dka'
87a6(mdo sde): dang / bsnyen par dka' ba'i blo dang / ngan 'gro skems dang / bzang skyong dang / dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / ded dpon bzang po dang / mis byin dang / nu lha'i lha dang / zla ba'i lha
87a7(mdo sde): dang / dri ma med kyis byin dang / dri ma med par grags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
87b1(mdo sde): po sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag nas 'dus
87b2(mdo sde): pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la spyod pa dang / thabs dang / tshul dang / 'dul ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos la 'god pa la
87b3(mdo sde): mkhas pa sha stag go/ / thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad la dpyod pa'i tshul shes pa/ rab 'byams la zhugs pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i
87b4(mdo sde): sa'i spyod yul shes pa la dpyod cing so sor rtog pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ / thams cad kyang spros pa thams cad shin tu chad cing / spyod pa len pa rnam par chad de/ sems can gyi khams thams cad
87b5(mdo sde): sdud pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang mtha' dang dpung med pa'i chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa la shin tu gnas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyi las kyi rnam par smin/
87b6(mdo sde): pa chud mi za ba mi dmigs par dpyod cing so sor rtog pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / dbang po dang / rtsom pa dang /
87b7(mdo sde): sbyor ba la shin tu dpyod cing so sor rtog pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i don dang /
88a1(mdo sde): tshig dang / yi ge gzung ba dang / bla ba shes pa yang dag par 'dzin cing rtog pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang /
88a2(mdo sde): mtha' dang dpung med pa'i chos kyi tshul la 'jug par zhugs pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / dus dang / rim pa'i tshul la so sor rtog pa la mkhas pa
88a3(mdo sde): stag go/ thams cad kyang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor skad cig gcig gis de ma thag tu thob par gnas
88a4(mdo sde): pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad rig la 'chi 'pho dang / 'byung ba dang / skye ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' bar spyod pa sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi
88a5(mdo sde): snying por 'gro ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha
88a6(mdo sde): stag go/ / thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyi phyir sems bskyed cing byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang ma bral ba sha stag go// thams cad kyang sems can gcig gi sems kyi dmigs pa la
88a7(mdo sde): 'jug pas sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems kyi dmigs pa la mkhas pa dang ldan pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang rang byung gi ye shes kyi sa las ma bskyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus
88b1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis thob par spyod pa las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par 'du byed pa'i stobs rgyun
88b2(mdo sde): mi gcod cing mngon par 'du mi byed pa shes pa'i tshul la zhugs pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang sems can gcig gi bya ba la bskal pa mtha' yas par spyod pa kun tu 'dzin par byin gyis rlob
88b3(mdo sde): pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang khyad par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byin gyis rlob cing gdul bya'i khams 'gro ba thams cad 'dzud pa la mkhas pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang/
88b4(mdo sde): 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa'i gnas la 'jug pa dang / spod pa'i stobs kyi khyad par dang smon lam phun sum tshogs
88b5(mdo sde): pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par gyi bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad kyi thad du 'gro zhing
88b6(mdo sde): skul ba la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul kun tu 'dzin pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs
88b7(mdo sde): rgyun mi gcod par byed pa sha stag go/ / thams cad kyang sangs rgyas med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas 'byung ba kun tu ston par byed pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang kun nas nyon
89a1(mdo sde): mongs pa can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su sbyong bar byed pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod par byed pa
89a2(mdo sde): sha stag go/ thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings sgrib pa med pa la zhugs pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang nam mkha'i khams ltar tshad med pa'i chos dang ldan pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang
89a3(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa sha stag go/ / thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang las kyis kun
89a4(mdo sde): nas bslang ba ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par smin pa la mos pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang rgyus kun nas bslang ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'bras bu la mos pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang rgya'i 'bur kun tu
89a5(mdo sde): 'byung ba lta bur chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang ldan pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan ltar ston pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa sha stag go// thams cad
89a6(mdo sde): kyang chos thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs kyi rnam par rig pa brag cha dang mtshungs par ldan pa sha stag go/ / thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa sha stag go/
89a7(mdo sde): thams cad kyang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtsen pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang rang sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha' yas pa'i mdog yong su 'grub pa sgrub pa'i gzugs la gnas pas
89b1(mdo sde): stag go/ thams cad kyang sgra tsam gyi khyon gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang phyogs bcu dag tu skra tsam gyi khyon gcig la 'chi ba pho dang /
89b2(mdo sde): 'byung ba dang / skye ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' bar spyod par sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / mngon par byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
89b3(mdo sde): ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang skyil mo krung gcig gis phyogs bcu dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi nam mkha' rgyas
89b4(mdo sde): par 'gengs par shes pa dang ldan pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang zhing thams cad kyi rgyan zhing gcig tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang zhing gcig gi rgyan bkod pa zhing thams
89b5(mdo sde): cad du kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang phyogs bcu dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gang dag yin pa de
89b6(mdo sde): dag de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi 'khor du ston pa la mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi 'khor gang yin pa de phyogs bcu dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs
89b7(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyi 'khor du kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang chos thams cad mtha' dang dpung med par ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang sems can thams cad
90a1(mdo sde): kyi lus rang gi lus su kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku sangs rgyas gcig gi skur zhugs pa kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa
90a2(mdo sde): sha stag go/ thams cad kyang sangs rgyas gcig gi sku sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skur zhugs par kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
90a3(mdo sde): rang gi lus su chud par kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang sems can gcig gi lus la dus gsum gyi sems can rnams kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang
90a4(mdo sde): 'das pa'i dus la ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus kun tu ston pa
90a5(mdo sde): la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang lus gcig gis ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs la/ lus dpag tu med grangs med pa las ldang ba la mkhas pa lus dpag tu med cing grangs med pa
90a6(mdo sde): dag gis ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs la/ lus gcig las ldang bar kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyi lus snyed kyi mngon par byang chub pa
90a7(mdo sde): kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyi lus la sems can gcig gi lus kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa/ sems can gcig gi lus la sems can thams cad
90b1(mdo sde): kyi lus kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ / thams cad kyang sem can thams cad kyi lus las sangs rgyas kyi sku kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku las sems
90b2(mdo sde): can gyi lus kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ / thams cad kyang sems can gyi lus chos kyi skur kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang zhing thams cad kyi
90b3(mdo sde): rgyan bkod pa de dag zhing gcig tu kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa zhing gcig gi rgyan bkod pa de dag zhing thams cad du kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang chos kyi sku sems can gyi lus
90b4(mdo sde): su kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang spu'i khung bu gcig tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'jug par byed par kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go// thams
90b5(mdo sde): cad kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i smon lam gyi stobs kyi gnas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang
90b6(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad ni gdul bya'i sems can yongs su smin pa ji lta ba de bzhin du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa ga
90b7(mdo sde): stag go/ / thams cad kyang bskal pa bgrangs pa thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu byang chub sem dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rgyun mi gcod pa'i lus kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad
91a1(mdo sde): kyang sems bskyed pa gcig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams byams thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re ren sgong las skyes pa dang / mngal nas skyes pa dang /
91a2(mdo sde): drod ga sher las skyes pa dang / rdzus te skyes pa dang / gzugs can dang / gzugs can ma yin pa dang / 'du shes can dang / 'du shes can ma yin pa dang / rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa
91a3(mdo sde): dang / rkang mangs dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten
91a4(mdo sde): skyong ba dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa sems can gdul bya yongs su smin pa thams cad rnga lta ba de bzhin du lhun gyis grub cing / rnam par mi rtog par spyod pa dang / spyod lam dang bya ba la 'jug pa'i
91a5(mdo sde): gnas kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ / thams cad kyang rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med// gzhal du med/
91a6(mdo sde): tshad med/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag 'jug par byed kyang / sems can la gnod pa med pa la mkhas pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang bskal pa dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam
91a7(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag yud tsam gcig tu byin gyis rlob pa kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa yud tsam gcig bskal pa dpag tu med/
91b1(mdo sde): grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med// gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag tu byin gyis rlob pa la mkhas pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang spyod pa mji
91b2(mdo sde): lta bus sems can rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar lhun gyis grub cing / rnam par mi rtog par gzugs kyi lus kyi kha dog dang / spyod lam kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/
91b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po de dag dang / gzhan dag thams cad kyang yon tan bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dang ldan pa sha stag go// sangs
91b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa nas 'dus pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig
91b5(mdo sde): rten skyong ba dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa sha stag dang yang thabs gcig go/ 'jig
91b6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'di nas kyang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya re re yang g.yog 'khor mang po dang ldan pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur
91b7(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la bder lhags so// brgya byin bye ba phrag brgya dang / lha'i rgyal po rab 'thab bral bye ba phrag brgya dang / lha'i rgyal po yongs su dga' ldan
92a1(mdo sde): bye ba phrag brgya dang / lha'i rgyal po rang 'phrul bye ba phrag brgya dang / lha'i rgyal po gnan 'phrul dbang byed bye ba phrag brgyal/ lha'i rgyal po re re yang g.yog 'khor mang po dang ldan
92a2(mdo sde): pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so//

92a5(mdo sde): dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa lnga dang / drang srong 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa sha stag dang / rlung gi rgyal po chen po rnam
92a6(mdo sde): bar 'thor rlung dang / rnam par 'thor rlung chen po g.yog 'khor mang po dang ldan pa dag dang / tshangs pa bye ba phrag brgya dang / tshangs pa chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'od chung bye ba phrag brgya dang / tshad med

92b1(mdo sde): bu che bye ba phrag brgya dang / bsod nams skyes bye ba phrag brgya dang / gya nom snang bye ba phrag brgya dang / shin tu mthong bye ba phrag brgya dang / mi che bye ba phrag brgya dang / mi gdung bye ba phrag brgya dang

94b1(mdo sde): ljang de'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i

94b7(mdo sde): lo/ / rgyal lo zhes spro bar byed par shes so// kha cig gis ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ brgya byin rnams gsol ba 'debs par shes so// kha cig gis ni tshangs pa rnams gsol ba bde bas

95a2(mdo sde): bdag cag la sbyin pa'i gtam ston par shes so/ / 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la tshul khrims kyi gtam ston par shes so// kha cig gis ni bzod pa'i gtam/

95b1(mdo sde): gis ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i nang du skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so/ / kha cig gis ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su skye ba dang / kha cig gis ni/

96b1(mdo sde): tshad 'bum phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong par shes so/ / 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad 'bum phrag bgrangs pa las 'das par shes so// /

97b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa mthong bas 'dul ba yin nam/ sems can de dang de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan snga na 'dom gang tsam na 'khod par shes so// 'jam dpal kha dog dang / spyod lam

98a1(mdo sde): 'jug par 'gyur ba'i spyod pa de dang de la de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa thams cad lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtogs par 'gyur
98a2(mdo sde): ro/ / 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba yar gyi ro'i dkyil 'khor nam phyed kyi dus na/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyi so so'i mdun na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dug par
98a3(mdo sde): shes kyang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni sems can de dag gis bdag ci'i phyir/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du shes par 'gyur bar bdag sems can de dag gi mdun na 'dug par bya'o snyam du mi
98a4(mdo sde): rtog/ rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ bon kyang 'jam dpal zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pas lhun gyis grub cing / rnam par mi rtog par de lta bu'i bya ba 'di 'byung ngo // 'jam
98a5(mdo sde): dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang 'khor dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du
98a6(mdo sde): med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i dbus na bzhugs na/ de dag thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mdun na bzhugs par mthong mod kyi/ 'jam dpal de bzhin
98a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa ni sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mdun na bzhugs par shes par 'gyur b.rang sems can de dag gi mdun du 'dug par bya'o snyam du mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/
98b1(mdo sde): 'on kyang sems can rnams ji lta bus 'dul ba de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa mdun na bzhugs par shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal
98b2(mdo sde): dper na/ sems can rnams kyi las kyi tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang gis/ sems can rnams kyi 'du byed tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab rnams 'byung yang 'du
98b3(mdo sde): byed rnams ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang 'du byed de dag lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab rnams kyi bya ba dag la 'dug go/ 'jam dpal de
98b4(mdo sde): bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang / sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab kyi dbang gis de bzhin
98b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab tu sems can rnams kyis mthong yang / 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa
98b6(mdo sde): de'i mdzad pa de lta bu de lhun gyis grub par 'byung ngo / / 'jam dpal dper na/ nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Ya rigs ma ni ras tha dad pa nyid kyis dbang gis kha dog tha dad pa nyid du 'gyur te/ 'jam
98b7(mdo sde): dpal gal te nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Ya ras ser po'i steng du bzhag na ni/ nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Ya kha dog ser por 'gyur/ gal te ras dmar po'i steng du bzhag na ni/ nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Ya kha
99a1(mdo sde): dog dmar por 'gyur/ gal te ras sngon po'i steng du bzhag na ni/ nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Ya kha dog sngon por 'gyur te/ de ltar ras kha dog ci dang ci 'dra ba'i steng du bzhag
99a2(mdo sde): pa de dang de nyid kyi kha dog kho nar 'gyur yang / 'jam dpal nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Ya ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog pa de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung
99a3(mdo sde): ngo / / 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang sems can tha dad pa nyid kyi dbang gis kha dog tha dad pa nyid du 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal gal te sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs
99a4(mdo sde): pa'i sku gser gyi kha dog tu mthong bas gdul bar bya ba yin na ni/ de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsar gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo // gal ta sems can rnams nor bu rin po che bai DA rI'i
99a5(mdo sde): kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Ya'i kha dog tu mthong ngo // gal te sems can rnams mu tig gi kha dog lta bus
99a6(mdo sde): gdul bar bya ba yin na ni/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mu tig gi kha dog tu mthong ngo // gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che an+da rnyil gyi kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba
99a7(mdo sde): yin na ni/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che an+da rnyil gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo // 'jam dpal gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog lta bus
99b1(mdo sde): gdul bar bya ba yin na ni/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog tu mthong ngo // gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad
99b2(mdo sde): bsdus pa'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog tu mthong ngo // gal te sems can
99b3(mdo sde): rnams nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog tu mthong ngo // gal
99b4(mdo sde): sems can rnams nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa rin po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs
99b5(mdo sde): pa'i sku nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa rin po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong ngo / / gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge ral
99b6(mdo sde): pa can gyi kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo // gal te sems can
99b7(mdo sde): rnams nor bu rin po che seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i
100a1(mdo sde): kha dog tu mthong ngo / / 'jam dpal gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron ma'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin
100a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron ma'i kha dog tu mthong ngo / / gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che chu 'dang gi kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni/ de dag gis kyang de
100a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che chu 'dang gi kha dog tu mthong ngo / / de bzhin du sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i kha dog
100a4(mdo sde): tu mthong bas gdul bar bya ba yin na ni/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku brgya byin dang / tshungs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i kha dog tu mthong ngo // de bzhin du sbyar te/ sems can
100a5(mdo sde): rnams sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i bar gyi kha dog gis gdul bar bya ba yin na ni/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
100a6(mdo sde): sku sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / shin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i bar gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo // gzugs med par skyes pa'i bar gyi gzugs dang / lus dang /
100a7(mdo sde): kha dog dang / spyod lam gang dang gang gis sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs dang / lus dang / kha dog dang / spyod lam de dang de lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo //
100b1(mdo sde): de bzhin du sgo nga las skyes pa dang / mngal las skyes pa dang / drod gsher las skyes pa dang / rdzus te skyes pa dang / gzugs can dang / gzugs can ma yin pa dang / 'du shes can dang //
100b2(mdo sde): 'du shes can ma yin pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi sems can rnams gzugs dang / lus dang / kha dog dang / spyod lam gang dang gang gis/ 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs/
100b3(mdo sde): dang / lus dang / kha dog dang / spyod lam de dang der de bzhin gshegs pa mthong yang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can 'di dag gis gser gyi kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu
100b4(mdo sde): rin po che bai rAR+Ya'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Ya'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che an+da rnyil gyi kha dog tu mthong bar ni
100b5(mdo sde): ma gyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che an+da rnyil gyi kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/ sems can 'di
100b6(mdo sde): dag gis ni nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu
100b7(mdo sde): rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che dbang gi
101a1(mdo sde): rgyal po'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa rin po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma
101a2(mdo sde): gyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa rin po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po
101a3(mdo sde): che'i rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ga ral pa can gyi kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu
101a4(mdo sde): rin po che seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu
101a5(mdo sde): rin po che brgya byin thogs pa'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che brgya byin thogs pa'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che rdo rje snang ba'i kha
101a6(mdo sde): dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che rdo rje snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che lha thams cad snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/
101a7(mdo sde): sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che lha thams cad snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che nyi zla snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu
101b1(mdo sde): rin po che nyi zla snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che glog gi smon pa'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron ma'i kha dog
101b2(mdo sde): tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig ces mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog go/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'gro ba thams cad du skyes pa'i
101b3(mdo sde): sems can rnams la yang brjod par bya ste/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog pa de'i mdzad pa de lta
101b4(mdo sde): bu de 'byung ngo / / // bam po gnyis pa// 'jam dpal dper na/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po gang du 'byung ba der lcags dang / lcags
101b5(mdo sde): las byas pa'i yo byad rnams pa 'byung mod kyi/ 'jam dpal 'on kyang nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'di snyam du bdag gang du byung ba der lcags dang /
101b6(mdo sde): lcags las byas pa'i yo byad rnams 'byung bar ma gyur cig snyam du mi sems mod kyi/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin
101b7(mdo sde): du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba der mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa la sogs pa mu stegs can gyi gnas thams cad mi 'byung // der lta bar
102a1(mdo sde): gyur pa thams cad mi 'byung / der 'khrug pa thams cad mi 'byung / der mtshams med pa lnga po dag mi 'byung / der mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi las rnams mi 'byung /
102a2(mdo sde): der rgyal po'i bka' lung dang / chos gces pa 'dor ba mi 'byung // der 'i za'i 'od dag mi 'byung / der brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dag dang / lha thams cad kyi 'od
102a3(mdo sde): dag mi 'byung / der nor bu rin po che'i 'od rnams dang / me'i 'od rnams dang / glog gi 'od rnams mi 'byung / der yud tsam dang / yud tsam phyed dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / le
102a4(mdo sde): bgrang ba rnams mi 'byung ste/ 'jam dpal gzhan du na sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ni ma gtogs so// 'jam dpal de bzhin
102a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang sems can gyi dbang gis lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal dper na/ nor
102a6(mdo sde): bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i 'od kyis reg pa de dag thams cad nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog tu 'gyur yang / nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog
102a7(mdo sde): ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu re 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs pa'i yid la byed pa'i bod kyis reg
102b1(mdo sde): pa de dag thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi kha dog tu 'gyur yang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang 'jam dpal lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de
102b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo / / 'jam dpal dper na/ nor bu rin po che chen po bai DUR+Ya byi dor legs par byas la/ mgo'i rgyan nam/ mgul pa'i rgyan nam/ lag pa'i
102b3(mdo sde): rgyan nam/ rkang pa'i rgyan yang rung ste/ gang dang gang gi logs na rgyan du 'dug pa de dang der rgyun du shin tu lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// nor bu rin po che chen po bai DUR+Ya de nyid kyi mthus rgyan de dag
102b4(mdo sde): kyang shin tu lham me/ lhan ne/ lgang nger 'dug la/ nor bu rin po che chen po bai DUR+Ya ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ bon kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de
102b5(mdo sde): 'byung ngo / / 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang spyod lam gyi gnas gang dang gang gis nyan thos kyi spyod pa'am/ rang
102b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa 'am/ spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa'i spyod pa 'am/ dud 'gro
102b7(mdo sde): dang yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / srin po'i spyod pa 'am/ lha dang // klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za'i spyod pa 'am/ spyod pa
103a1(mdo sde): gang dang gang la gnas pa'i spyod pa de dang de nyid shin tu lham me/ lhan ne/ lgang nge'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi mthus spyod pa de shin tu l+h+wam me/ ldan nu//
103a2(mdo sde): lhang nger rnam par spyod kyang / 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo //
103a3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal dper na/ sa la gnas/ sa la brten nas/ sa bon thams cad dang / rtswa dang / shing gal ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal rnams skye zhing 'phel la/ shin tu rgyas pa nyid
103a4(mdo sde): du 'gyur yang / 'jam dpal sa ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyi grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa
103a5(mdo sde): la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la brten nas/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skye zhing 'phel te/ shin tu rgyas pa nyid du 'gyur yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/
103a6(mdo sde): rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal dper na sprin chen pos 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad khebs par byas
103a7(mdo sde): nas/ rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal rnam pa tha dad pa rnams su char pa chen po rab tu phab ste/ ro gcig pa'i chu'i rgyun des rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang
103b1(mdo sde): nags tshal rnam pa tha dad pa rnams skye bar byed cing / gnas rnam pa tha dad pa rnams su chu de ro tha dad pa dang / kha dog tha dad par yang gnas la/ 'jam dpal sprin ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang
103b2(mdo sde): lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par bya ba tha dad pa rnams 'byung ngo / / 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig
103b3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sku'i sprin gyis khyab par mdzad de/ sem can dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshog pasag pa smon lam dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa tha dad cing // mos
103b4(mdo sde): pa tha dad pa la gnas pa thams cad la chos kyi char chen po mngon par phab ste/ 'jam dpal chos kyi char de yang ro gcig pa yin mod kyi/ 'jam dpal sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs bsags
103b5(mdo sde): pa/ smon lam dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa tha dad cing / mos pa tha dad pa la gnas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / smon lam dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa tha dad pa la zhugs
103b6(mdo sde): pa rnams la rnam pa tha dad pa nyid kyi chos tha dad pa kho na'i char pas nus pa ji lta ba dang / mthu ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed kyang / 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'di
103b7(mdo sde): lta ste/ sems can 'di dag la ni nyan thos kyi ye shes sa 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o// sem can 'di dag la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par
104a1(mdo sde): bskyed par bya'o/ / sems can 'di dag la ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o// sems can 'di dag la ni rgyal chen
104a2(mdo sde): bzhi pa'i lha'i gnas su skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o/ / sems can 'di dag la ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o//
104a3(mdo sde): de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / de bzhin du tshangs pa rnams dang / tshangs chen
104a4(mdo sde): rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad mang 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dgra
104a5(mdo sde): rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong
104a6(mdo sde): rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris rnams dang / bog min rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o// bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par
104a7(mdo sde): bya'o snyam du/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog go/ sems can 'di dag la ni rgyal por skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o//
104b1(mdo sde): sems can 'di dag la ni mir skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o// sems can 'di dag la ni dbang phyug tu 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs dag rnam par
104b2(mdo sde): bskyed par bya'o snyam du 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni lhun gyis grub cing / rnam par mi rtog par sems can
104b3(mdo sde): smon lam dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar bsags pa bzhin du mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad du btang
104b4(mdo sde): snyoms su bzhugs shing btang snyoms la rnam par mi rtog go/ 'jam dpal dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ma thag tu 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa btang
104b5(mdo sde): nas/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mun pa mun nag thams cad med par 'gyur yang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par
104b6(mdo sde): bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo / / 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ma thag tu ye shes kyi 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig pa bum phrag grangs med pa btang bas
104b7(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi lta bar gyur pa'i mun pa thams cad med par gyur te/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams
105a1(mdo sde): su lta bar gyur pa 'byung ba ni ma gtogs so/ / 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni ngas sems can rnams kyi lta bar gyur pa bsal lo snyam mam/ bsal bar
105a2(mdo sde): bya'o snyam du mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'jam dpal lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ste/ 'jam dpal
105a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad du rnam par mi rtog cing mnyam ste/ btang snyoms pa'o// 'jam dpal dper na sgyu ma sprul pa ni/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi dbang gis bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs
105a4(mdo sde): dang / lus tha dad pa sna tshogs ston kyang / bajam dpal sgyu ma sprul pa de ni brjod du med pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ yi ge med pa/ sgra med pa/ yul mang pa/ dngos po
105a5(mdo sde): med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ gnyis su med pa/ kun tu spyod pa med pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam zhing gnyen po med pa yin yang // 'jam dpal sgyu ma
105a6(mdo sde): sprul pa ni sgyu ma mkhan gyi dbang gis lhun gyi grub cing rnam par mi rtog par bya ba sna tshogs ston to/ / 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
105a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyang sems can gyi dbang gis/ 'khor gyi nang na gzugs kyi sku dang / kha dog dang / spyod pa dang / spyod lam dang / bya ba la 'jug pa'i gnas sna tshogs 'byung mod kyi
105b1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa de ni brjod du med pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ yi ge med pa/ sgra med pa/ yul med pa/ dngos po med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/
105b2(mdo sde): mtshan nyid med pa/ gnyis su med / kun tu spyod pa med pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs shing gnyen po med pa/ khams gsum las yang dag par 'das pa ste/ 'od kyang 'jam dpal
105b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa ni lhun gyis grub cing / rnam par mi rtog par sems can gyi dbang gis mdzad pa sna tshogs dag ston to// 'jam dpal dper na/ nyi ma ni gcig kho na yin na/ ri'i
105b4(mdo sde): rgyal po ri rab kyi dbang gis gling bzhi rnams su sems can rnams kyis rnam pa mang por mthong ste/ kha cig gis ni de 'char bar mthong / kha cig gis ni shar zin par mthong / kha cig gis
105b5(mdo sde): ni bag dros pa tsam du mthong / kha cig gis ni dros chen tsam du shes/ kha cig gis ni nam phyed/ kha cig gis ni nyi ma phyed/ kha cig gis ni nyi ma mal tse thun gcig tsam du shar bar shes/
105b6(mdo sde): kha cig gis ni nyi ma phyed yol tsam du shes/ kha cig gis ni nyi ma snar tsam du shes/ kha cig gis ni tho rangs tsam du shes te/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang
105b7(mdo sde): gling bzhi dag tu sems can rnams kyis gzhan dang gzhan du mthong yang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog bzhin du/ ri rab kyi
106a1(mdo sde): dbang gis gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bya ba sna tshogs ston to/ / 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
106a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyang sems can gyi dbang gis 'khor gcig kho na'i nang nas kyang / sems can kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar shes/ kha cig gis ni
106a3(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par shes so// 'khor de nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das
106a4(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'das par shes/ kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas lo bcu lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni de bzhin
106a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo bcu lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa snying por gyur par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa nub
106a6(mdo sde): par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan nas/ lo bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan
106a7(mdo sde): 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas le bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par
106b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas nas/ lo brgya dang / lo stong lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya dang / le stong lon par shes/ kha cig gis
106b2(mdo sde): ni bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ le stong phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das
106b3(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo stong phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par
106b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas nas/ bskal pa bya ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya
106b5(mdo sde): ngan las 'das nas/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu lon par shes so// 'jam dpal 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang
106b6(mdo sde): nas lha dang / mi kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa lon par shes/ 'jam dpal
106b7(mdo sde): 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas lha dang / mi kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa lon par shes
107a1(mdo sde): kyang / 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog bzhin du sems can gyi dbang gis de
107a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo / / 'jam dpal dpar na/ 'dzam bu gling du rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po langs pas rtswa dang / shing gal ba dang / sman dang
107a3(mdo sde): nags tshal dang / lo ma thams cad g.yo/ rab tu g.yo/ kun tu rab tu g.yo/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur bur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur
107a4(mdo sde): 'ur/ 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs shing / le ma kha cig ni/ shar phyogs su dma' la/ nub phyogs su mtho / kha cig ni nub phyogs su dma' la/ shar
107a5(mdo sde): phyogs su mtho/ lo ma kha cig ni mtha' dma' la/ dbus su mtho/ kha cig ni byang phyogs su dma' la/ lho phyogs su mtho yang / rtswa dang / shing ge la ba dang / sman dang /
107a6(mdo sde): nags tshal dang / lo ma rnams mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang 'jam dpal rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbang gis bya ba sna tshogs ston to// 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin
107a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang sems can gyi dbang gis rtag tu skad cig skad cig la gzugs kyi sku dang /
107b1(mdo sde): kha dog dang / spyod pa dang / smon lam dang / bya ba la 'jug pa'i gnas grangs med pa dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa rnams su 'byung ngo // 'jam
107b2(mdo sde): dpal sems can rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs pa yid la byed pa ji snyed 'byung ba de snyed kyi bskal par sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang /
107b3(mdo sde): gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i rgyun chad cing ldog ste/ 'jam dpal de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan te
107b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la dmigs pa'i yon tan gyi mtha' yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa
107b5(mdo sde): rnams kyis kyang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med pa dag gis kyang rtogs par mi nus so/ / 'jam dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha
107b6(mdo sde): rnams dang / mi rnams ni ches nyung gi/ phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ 'dod pa dag la 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyis lha'i mig gis shing rta'i 'phang
107b7(mdo sde): lo'i tshad tsam gyis phyogs gcig na sems can dag mthong ba ni ches mang ngo / / 'jam dpal phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ 'dod pa dag la 'dod chags dang
108a1(mdo sde): bral ba rnams kyis lha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can dag mthong ba ni ches nyung gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos
108a2(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pas lha'i mig gis shing rta'i 'phang lo'i tshad tsam gyis phyogs gcig na/ sems can dag mthong ba ni ches ma
108a3(mdo sde): ngo ngo/ / ba jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pas/ lha'i mig gis stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i
108a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed mthong ba de bas ni/ 'jam dpal rang sangs rgyas kyi lha'i mig gis shing rta'i 'phang lo'i tshad tsam gyis phyogs gcig na sems can dag mthong
108a5(mdo sde): ba ni ches mang ngo / / 'jam dpal rang sangs rgyas kyi lha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed mthong ba de bas ni/ 'jam dpal byang
108a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pas/ lha'i mig gis shing rta'i 'phang lo'i tshad tsam gyis phyogs gcig na/ sems can
108a7(mdo sde): dag mthong ba ni ches mang ngo / / 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pas/ lha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong
108b1(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed mthong ba de bas ni/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas lha'i spyan gyis shing rta'i 'phang lo'i tshad tsam gyis phyogs gcig na/
108b2(mdo sde): sems can dag gzigs pa ni ches grangs med do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad/ shing rta'i 'phang lo'i tshad tsam gyi sa phyogs
108b3(mdo sde): thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can re re'i sems dang / sems las byung ba'i chos byung ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang dag gzigs pa de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par
108b4(mdo sde): thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa rnams kyis kyang / bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du yang bgrang ba 'am/ bsam pa'am/ grangs su bya bar sla ba
108b5(mdo sde): ma yin te/ 'jam dpal sems can 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba de dag gi sems dang / sems las byung ba de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
108b6(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis lhun gyis grub par skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig la rab tu mkhyen to/ / 'jam dpal phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs
108b7(mdo sde): pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / sems las byung ba rnams rgyu gang dang / dmigs pa gang dang / rkyen gang gi ji ltar byung ba dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
109a1(mdo sde): sems can de dag gi spyod pa dang / spyod lam dang / bya ba la 'jug pa'i gnas gang dag byung ba dang / 'byung ba dang // 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag de bzhin gshegs
109a2(mdo sde): pas lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par mi rtog par skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ / 'jam dpal sems can de dag ji ltar
109a3(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'dul ba yang lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par mi rtog par skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig la rab tu mkhyen to/ / 'jam dpal
109a4(mdo sde): sems can re re'i ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa'i nyon mongs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bas mang ba de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pas lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par mi rtog par
109a5(mdo sde): skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig la rab tu mkhyen to/ / 'jam dpal rgyu gang dang / dmigs pa gang dang / rkyen gang gis nyon mongs pa de dag ji ltar 'byung ba dang / thabs kyi shes
109a6(mdo sde): p a gang gis sems can de dag gi nyon mongs pa ji ltar zhi bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par mi rtog par skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig la rab tu mkhyen
109a7(mdo sde): to/ / 'jam dpal de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no// 'jam dpal dper na//
109b1(mdo sde): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni nyi ma'i dbang gis 'dzam bu'i gling du gzugs dang / kha dog dang / gzi brjid dang / 'od rab 'bring tha mar snang yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni 'bri ba 'am/
109b2(mdo sde): 'phel ba yang med de/ 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pas nyi ma bgrang ba dang / yud tsam dang / yud tsam phyed kyi grangs brtsi bar bya ba de lta bu de yang 'byung
109b3(mdo sde): la/ 'jam dpal zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing / rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin
109b4(mdo sde): du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du bsam pa rab 'bring tha mas sems can
109b5(mdo sde): rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs dang / kha dog dang / gzi brjid dang / 'od rab 'bring tha mar mthong yang / 'jam dpal sems can gang gi dag pa'i rtsa ba dang /
109b6(mdo sde): spyod pa dang / mos pa dang / smon lam gyi stobs dang / byin gyi rlabs ci 'dra ba yin pade 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la ni rab 'bring tha ma med do//
