109b7(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos kyi sku ste/ shin tu ma skyes pa/ ma byung ba/ ma 'gags pa yin na//
110a1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi bsam pa rab 'bring tha mas de bzhin gshegs pa rab 'bring tha mar mthong gi/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/
110a2(mdo sde): rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzin/ wa dang /
110a3(mdo sde): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang
110a4(mdo sde): midang / mi ma yin pa rnams dang / zan dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la bshos gsol ba dang / gang dag bshos mi gsol ba dang
110a5(mdo sde): gang dag mthong ba dang / gang dag mi mthong ba dang / gang dag sdod pa dang / gang dag mi sdod pa dang / gang dag gshe ba dang / gang dag mi gshe ba dang / gang dag reg pa dang / gang dag mi reg
110a6(mdo sde): bde dag thams cad kyi bya ba de ltabu rnams kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus spun gyis grub ci rnam par mi rtog par 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal dper na// gang dag gis nor bu rin po che mngonas
110a7(mdo sde): chen po mthong ba dang / reg pa dang / spyod yul du gnas pa de dag thams cad ni nor bu rin po che mngon ga chen po'i kha dag tu 'gyur yang / nor bu rin po che mthor gaben don mi rtog// rnam
110b1(mdo sde): par mi rtog go/ / 'jam dpal de bzhin du sems can gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa tha na ri mor bris pa dang / gzugs su byas pa mthong ba dang / reg pa dang / de'i spyod yul
110b2(mdo sde): yang shes pa de dag thams cad ni gzugs dang / kha dog bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su grub pa thob par 'gyur yang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog go// 'jam
110b3(mdo sde): dpal dper na/ rtsi'i rgyal po legs par mthong zhes bya ba sems can gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung / gang dag gis mthong ba de dag
110b4(mdo sde): gi mig rnam par dag par 'gyur/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung / gang dag gis rna bas de rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgra thos pa de dag gi rna ba
110b5(mdo sde): rnam par dag par 'gyur/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung / gang dag gis dri tshor ba de dag gi sna rnam par dag par 'gyur/
110b6(mdo sde): gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung / gang dag gis lces de'i ro myong ba de dag gi lce'i dbang po rnam par dag par 'gyur/ gnod sems kyi
110b7(mdo sde): sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung / gang dag gis lus kyis reg pa de dag gi lus rnam par dag par 'gyur yang / 'jam dpal rtsi'i rgyal po legs par
111a1(mdo sde): mthong ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du gnod sems/
111a2(mdo sde): kyi sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung / gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa tha na ri mor bris pa dang / gzugs su byas pa mthong ba de dag gis dge
111a3(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba des mig rnam par dag par 'gyur/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba yang rung ste/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung /
111a4(mdo sde): gang dag gis de la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'jig rten gyi mgon po zhes bya ba'am// thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i sgra thos pa de dag dge
111a5(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba des rna ba'i dbang po rnam par dag par 'gyur/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung / gang dag gis de'i yon tan gyi dri tshor ba de
111a6(mdo sde): dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des sna rnam par dag par 'gyur/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung / gang dag gis de'i chos kyi ro myong ba de dag dge
111a7(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba des lce rnam par dag par 'gyur/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung / gang dag gis lus kyis reg pa de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba
111b1(mdo sde): des lus rnam par dag par 'gyur yang / 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir/ lhun gyis grub cing rnam
111b2(mdo sde): par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo / / 'jam dpal dper na/ rtsi'i rgyal po 'bral ba zhes bya bas bskus pa'i rnga sgra sems can zug rngus zug pa dang bcas pa/ dug dang
111b3(mdo sde): bcas pa/ gang dag gis thos pa de dag gi zug rngu thams cad 'byung zhing / dug kyang mi gdug par 'gyur yang / 'jam dpal rtsi'i rgyal po 'bral ba ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog
111b4(mdo sde): ste/ 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang dang / rgyu rkyen tshogs pas lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par rtsi'i rgyal po 'bral ba'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung
111b5(mdo sde): ngo / / 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos ma thag tu/ sems can rnams kyi lta bar gyur pa'i zug rngu dag 'byung zhing / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang /
111b6(mdo sde): gti mug gi dug kyang mi gdug par 'gyur yang / 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang 'jam dpal lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de
111b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo / / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni ches nyung gi/
112a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ga d+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu 'jig rten gyi khams de
112a2(mdo sde): rer yang rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag gis/ sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dag ni ches mang ngo // 'jam dpal phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
112a3(mdo sde): klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni ches nyung gi/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas rgyun mi gcod par lhun gyis grub cing / rnam par mi rtog par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
112a4(mdo sde): khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la/ sems can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par mdzad zin pa dang / yongs su smin par
112a5(mdo sde): mdzad pa dang / yongs su smin par mdzad par 'gyur pa dag ni ches mang ste/ 'jam dpal de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni sems can yongs
112a6(mdo sde): su smin par mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no/ / 'jam dpal dper na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni nyi ma'i dbang gis 'bri ba dang / skye ba dang / mi snang bar 'gyur bar yang snang la/
112a7(mdo sde): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la ni 'bri ba dang / mi snang ba dang / skye ba med de/ 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pas/ nyi ma'i grangs dang / yud tsam
112b1(mdo sde): dang / yud tsam phyed dang / zla ba phyed dang / zla ba dang / lo bgrang ba'i grangs gzhag pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bya ba de lta bu de dag 'byung yang / 'jam/
112b2(mdo sde): dpal zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la ni 'bri ba dang / 'phel ba 'am/ mi snang bar 'gyur ba med de/ bon kyang 'jam dpal sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa dang /
112b3(mdo sde): nyi ma'i dbang gis lhun gyis grub cing / rnam par mi rtog par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
112b4(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pa'i sems can rnams kyi nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa yang dag par gzhom pa'i phyir dang / sngon
112b5(mdo sde): gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la gzung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'grib pa dang /
112b6(mdo sde): nub par kun tu ston te/ 'jam dpal sems can gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos nub pa dang / 'grib pa dang / 'phel bar 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'jam
112b7(mdo sde): dpal sems can gyi dbang gis lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo / / 'jam dpal dper na/ nam mkha' la gnas
113a1(mdo sde): nam mkha' la brten nas/ sems can thams cad kyi bya ba sna tshogs dag 'byung yang / nam mkha' ni ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ 'dus ma byas pa/
113a2(mdo sde): yi ge med pa/ sgra med pa/ brjod du med pa/ brjod par bya ba ma yin pa/ gnyis su med pa/ gnyen po med pa ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba
113a3(mdo sde): sna tshogs dag 'byung ngo / / 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
113a4(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la brten nas/ sems can thams cad kyi bya ba thams cad 'byung yang / 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi skye mi 'gag ste/ bajam dpal de bzhin
113a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa ni 'dus ma byas pa/ yi ge med pa/ sgra med pa/ brjod du med pa/ brjod par bya ba ma yin pa/ gnyis su med pa/ gnyen po med pa ste/ 'on kyang sngon gyi dge ba'i
113a6(mdo sde): rtsa ba dang / spyod pa dang / smon lam gyi stobs dang / byin gyi rlabs kyis lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par sems can rnams la de'i chos kyi mdzad pa sna tshogs dag kyang 'byung ngo //
113a7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i yid la bya ba gcig gis kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med/ dpag tu med
113b1(mdo sde): pa dag tu rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag ni bla na med pa'i ye shes rtogs par 'gyur bar byed/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa
113b2(mdo sde): dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur par byedad/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag ni tshangs pa thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag
113b3(mdo sde): ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag ni 'phrul dga' lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba thob par byed/ sems can
113b4(mdo sde): dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag ni dga' ldan gyi lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag ni 'thab bral gyi lha'i gnas su skye ba thob par
113b5(mdo sde): byed/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i gnas su skye ba thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i gnas
113b6(mdo sde): su skye ba thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag ni lha'i rgyal po thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po thob
113b7(mdo sde): par byed/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med bdag ni stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po zab par byed/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag ni gru'i dbang po thob par
114a1(mdo sde): byed/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag ni gnod sbyin gyi dbang po thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag ni dri za'i dbang po thob
114a2(mdo sde): par byed/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag ni lha ma yin gyi dbang po thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag ni mi 'am ci'i dbang po thob par byed
114a3(mdo sde): sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag ni lto'i 'phye chen po'i dbang po thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag ni mi'i rgyal po thob par byed/ sems can
114a4(mdo sde): dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag ni mir skye ba thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag ni rigs chen por skye ba thob par byed na/ thal mo sbyar ba lta ci smos/ bdug
114a5(mdo sde): pa phul ba lta ci smos/ de bzhin du mar me phul ba lta ci smos/ spos phul ba lta ci smos/ me tog phul ba lta ci smos/ mchod pa rnam pa mang po gzhan phul ba lta ci smos/ tshigs su
114a6(mdo sde): bcad pa gcig tsam yang nyan pa dang / klog pa dang / 'dzin pa lta ci smos/ dam pa'i chos rnam pa mang po yongs su 'dzin pa lta ci smos te/ de bas ches grangs med pa'i sangs
114a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mdzad pas nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ / 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa'am/ bskal pa brgya'am/ bskal pa dpag tu med/ grangs med par sems can
114b1(mdo sde): dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba thob pa ni bla'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas mnyes par ma byas/ chos dang dge 'dun
114b2(mdo sde): mnyes par ma byas pa ni de lta ma yin no/ / 'jam dpal de la sangs rgyas la mi mnyes par byed pa dang / chos dang / dge 'dun mi mnyes par byed pa ni tha na bdag gi chung ma la mi tshangs
114b3(mdo sde): par spyod pa las byung ba'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par zhe sdang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
114b4(mdo sde): la khyad du gsod pa dang / chos spong ba dang / chos 'dor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' la gus par mi byed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur mi byed pa dang / sems can
114b5(mdo sde): yongs su smin par byed pa 'dor ba dang / bla ma dang / sbyin pa'i gnas dang / slob dpon dang / pha ma dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze yang dag par song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa
114b6(mdo sde): la gus par mi byed pa dang / chos smra ba/ chos khyad par can rtogs pa/ chos rgya chen po ston pa dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam gyi bya ba
114b7(mdo sde): shes pa/ gzungs dang / mdo sde'i rgyal po thob pa rnams la mi bdud cing // rdzing byed pa dang / khengs pa yin/ chos dang / chos smra ba la mi gus bskyed pa dang / sri zhu dang / rim gro mi byed
115a1(mdo sde): pa dang / chos rgya mtsho chen po bsgrags pa byung na/ la la zhig dad par 'gyur na/ mi rung ngo snyam nas/ chos smra ba'i gang zag la legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par mi
115a2(mdo sde): byed pa dang / bdag shes pa la mi 'jug pa dang / chos la nges par sems pa mi skyed pa dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal skyed de bsngags par 'os pa'i gang zag rnams kyi bsngags pa bcabs
115a3(mdo sde): shing mi snyan pa brjod pa dang / pha rol gyi yon tan dang / bsngags pa la mi dga' ba yin/ gang zag la zhe spang bas/ chos la zhe sdang bar byed cing chos spong ba dang / gzhan dag kyang
115a4(mdo sde): rtsod du 'jug pa dang / stan mthon po 'dod cing thabs tshol ba dang / gzhan las rim gror bya ba bdag gir byed cing mngon par dga' ba dang / gnas brtan rgan zhing yun ring du tshangs
115a5(mdo sde): par spad pa rnams la rim gro mi byed cing / bsu bar mi byed la bzhin khro gnyer can yin/ rtag tu sems rtsub cing klan ka tshol ba dang / glags lta ba dang / nga rgyal bskyed nas mkhas
115a6(mdo sde): pa'i gon du mi 'gro mi bsten/ bsnyen par mi byed/ bkur sti mi byed cing / dge ba ni gang / mi dge ba ni gang / bya ba ni gang / bya ba ma yin pa ni gang / ci zhig byas na/ yun
115a7(mdo sde): ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur zhes mi 'dri ba dang / nges par 'byung bar mi lta zhing / rtsod pa mang ba mang ba yin te/ 'jam dpal de ltar na sangs rgyas dang /
115b1(mdo sde): chos dang / dge 'dun mi mnyes par byed pa yin no// 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dbang bskur bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs//
115b2(mdo sde): thob par 'gyur/ rgya mtsho dam pa'i snying po dri ma med par snang ba 'od gsal ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang
115b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag tu sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i
115b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten du gnas par 'gyur ba'i las rnams tshe 'di la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ klad pa tsha bas sam/ rims tsha bas sam/ rtsib logs na bas sam/ rgyal srid 'khrugs
115b5(mdo sde): pas sam/ kla klo 'khrugs pas sam/ mu ga'i 'khrugs pas sam/ lus la gnod pa dang / yid la gnod pa gang yang rung bas brgyad bkag pas kyang tshe gcig la byang bar 'gyur
115b6(mdo sde): te/ zan rmi lam tsam gyis kyang byang bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag
115b7(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa dag las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sbyin pa las byung ba dang / mchod pa las byung ba dang / de dag gi zad nas bslab pa bzung ba las byung ba rnams snga dro gcig gis
116a1(mdo sde): zil gyis gnon te/ de ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur bya ba ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab bo// 'jam dpal dge pa'i bshes gnyen gyis
116a2(mdo sde): yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gter bcu rnyed par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la bgrang bar sbyor ba'i gter dang / sangs rgyas kyi
116a3(mdo sde): chos thams cad la nges par sems pa'i gtar dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la gzungs snang ba'i gter dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la so so yang dag par
116a4(mdo sde): rig pa rab tu ston pa'i gter dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la brjod du med pa'i tshul la mkhas pa rtogs par byed pa'i gter dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul
116a5(mdo sde): pa dang / cho 'phrul thams cad mngon sum du mthong ba'i gter dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du sgrub pa la mkhas pa'i gter dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
116a6(mdo sde): thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba'i gter dang / sgyu mar gyur pa'i bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'grub par 'jug pa la mkhas pa'i gter dang / sangs rgyas dang /
116a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dang ba chen po 'thob pa'i gter ro// bajam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i
116b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni dbang bcu thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshe'i tshad bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag tu byin gyis rlobs pa'i phyir/
116b2(mdo sde): tshol dbang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag la nges par sems pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa'i phyir/ sems la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams tha~Md
116b3(mdo sde): bkod pa dang / rgyan du mas brgyan pa'i byin gyi rlabs kun tu ston pa'i phyir/ yo byad la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba kun tu ston pa'i phyir/ skyab
116b4(mdo sde): la dbang ba dang / dus ji lta ba bzhin du las kyi rnam par smin pa byin gyis rlob pa kun tu ston pa'i phyir/ las la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyis
116b5(mdo sde): gang bar byin gyis rlob pa kun tu ston pa'i phyir/ mos pa la dbang ba dang / dus gang dang gang gi tshe/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa'i dus de dang der byang chub
116b6(mdo sde): mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du 'dod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang der byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir/ smon lam la dbang ba dang /
116b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa kun tu ston pa'i phyir/ rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / mtha' dang dpung med pa'i chos kyi sgo snang ba kun tu ston pa'i
117a1(mdo sde): phyir/ chos la dbang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po rnams dang / rdzogs pa'i
117a2(mdo sde): byang chub kun tu ston pa'i phyir ye shes la dbang ba'o/ / 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni skra'i khyon tsam gcig la phyogs bcu'i
117a3(mdo sde): nam mkha'i mthas klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams 'jug par byed kyang / sems can gang la yang gnod pa dang sgrib pa med de/ sngon ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin no//
117a4(mdo sde): bskal pa dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med pa rnams yud tsam gcig tu byin gyis rlob cing yud tsam gcig ni bskal pa dpag tu med/ grangs
117a5(mdo sde): med/ bsam gyis mi khyab par byin gyis rlob ste/ bskal pa re re la yang mes 'jig pa dang / chus 'jig pa dang / rlung gis 'jig pa byin gyis rlob kyang sems can gang la
117a6(mdo sde): yang yo byad nis kyang phongs par mi 'gyur zhing / lus la gnod pa 'am/ sems la mi bde ba yang mi 'byung la/ sems can gang ji ltar yongs su smin par 'gyur ba des bya ba
117a7(mdo sde): de lta bu yang shes so/ / 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ 'dod na phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi yul
117b1(mdo sde): gyi mthas klas pa'i bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su/ 'jig rten gyi khams re rer rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mthas klas pa'i lus rnams kyis
117b2(mdo sde): lus re res kyang dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'phos pa dang / skye ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' ba spyod par sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / bdud 'dul
117b3(mdo sde): par ston pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yang ston to// 'jam dpal
117b4(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ 'dod na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re rer rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mthas
117b5(mdo sde): klas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams 'jug par byed cing / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rgyan gyi yon tan bkod pa gang dag yin pa de dag zhing gcig tu ston par byed//
117b6(mdo sde): zhing gcig gi rgyan gyi yon tan bkod pa gang dag yin pa de dag zhing thams cad du ston par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi nang
117b7(mdo sde): na yang snang la gnas nas kyang mi g.yo'o/ / 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
118a1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi lus sems can gcig gi lus su ston to/ / sems can gcig gi lus sems can thams cad kyi lus su ston kyang lus
118a2(mdo sde): 'dres par yang mi byed de/ sems can gang la yang gnod par mi 'gyur zhing / bya ba de lta bu de yang ston to// lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par sems can rnams kyang yongs su
118a3(mdo sde): smin par byed do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad kyi sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas gcig tu byin gyis rlob cing / de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang sangs rgyas
118a4(mdo sde): kyi yul gyi mthas klas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du byin gyis rlob la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'dres par yang mi 'gyur te/ lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog/
118a5(mdo sde): pabar bya ba de lta bu thams cad kyang ston to// lus gcig gis mnyam par 'jog la/ lus dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag gis ldang zhing / lus dpag tu med grangs med
118a6(mdo sde): pa dag gis mnyam par bzhag la/ lus gcig gis ldang ngo // // bam po gsum pa ste tha ma'o// 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes
118a7(mdo sde): gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos kyi dbyings la spyod yul ba yang yin la/ sems can gyi khams la spyod yul bar yang snang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi spyod
118b1(mdo sde): yul la mngon par dga' ba yang yin la/ bdud kyi spyod yul bar yang snang ngo // mya ngan las 'das pa'i spyod yul ba yang yin la/ 'khor ba spyod yul bar yang snang ngo // thams
118b2(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes spyod yul ba yang yin la/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul bar yang snang ngo // zhi ba'i spyod yul ba yang yin la/ ma zhi ba dang / rab tu ma zhi ba dang
118b3(mdo sde): nye bar ma zhi ba'i spyod yul bar yang snang ste/ sems can rnams kyang 'dul lo// blang ba med pa dang / der ba med pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / ma spros pa dang / mtshan
118b4(mdo sde): ma med pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / shes par bya ba med pa dang / bar snang dang mtshungs pa spyod yul ba yang yin la/ spros pa dang / mtshan ma dang / dmigs pa spyod yul
118b5(mdo sde): ba'i sems can thams cad kyi nang na yang snang ngo / / stobs bkod pa spyod yul ba yang yin lo/ gzugs bzang po'i spyod yul bar yang snang ngo // chos thams cad skye ba med pa
118b6(mdo sde): dang / 'gag pa med pas gnyen po spyod yul ba yang yin la/ sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i spyod yul bar yang snang ngo // ye shes dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mngon
118b7(mdo sde): par shes pa dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i spyod yul ba yang yin la/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad kyi lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
119a1(mdo sde): dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang /
119a2(mdo sde): srin po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgus dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje
119a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten du skyes pa dang / skrod las skyes pa dang / mang nas skyes pa dang / drod gsher las skyes pa dang / rdzus te skyes pa dang / gzugs can dang / gzugs can ma yin pa dang /
119a4(mdo sde): 'du shes can dang / 'du shes can ma yin pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min nas/ gzugs med pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par yang snang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa
119a5(mdo sde): spyod pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bkod pa thams cad kyi spyod yul thob pa yang yin la/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi cho ga dang /
119a6(mdo sde): spyod yul yang kun tu ston to// 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can gyi sgra sems can gcig gi sgrar 'jug par
119a7(mdo sde): byed la/ sems can gcig gi sgra sems can thams cad kyi sgrar 'jug par byed cing / sgra rnams 'dres par yang mi 'gyur la/ sems can gang gi sgra la yang sgrib par mi
119b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab
119b2(mdo sde): 'byams thams cad du rang gi lus sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams su byin gyis rlob bo// 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen
119b3(mdo sde): gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can gyi lus la zhing gi lus kun tu ston kyang / sems can gyi lus dang 'dres par yang mi byed/ zhing gi lus la
119b4(mdo sde): sems can gyi lus kun tu ston kyang / zhing gi lus dang 'dres par mi byed do// sangs rgyas kyi sku la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus su kun tu ston kyang / sangs rgyas kyi
119b5(mdo sde): sku dman par yang mi byed de/ / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus la sangs rgyas kyi sku kun tu ston kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus rgya chen por yang mi byed do//
119b6(mdo sde): spyod pa'i lus la mngon par byang chub pa'i sku kun tu ston kyang / spyod pa'i rgyun chad par yang mi byed do// mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i skul spyod pa'i lus kun tu ston kyang
119b7(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sku nyams par yang mi byed do/ / mya ngan las 'das pa 'khor ba'i rgyun du ston kyang / mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par zhen pa yang mi skyed do//
120a1(mdo sde): 'khor ba mya ngan las 'das par kun tu ston kyang / gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang mi byed do// mnyam
120a2(mdo sde): par yang gzhag la bya ba thams cad kyang ston te/ 'di lta ste/ 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / nyal bar byed do// spyod lam thams cad kyang kun tu ston la/ ting nge
120a3(mdo sde): 'dzin rnam par 'khrugs par yang mi byed do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi zhabs kyi drung na chos nyan par yang snang la/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams
120a4(mdo sde): cadan/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag na gzugs dang / lus dang / kha dog yongs su 'grub pa gzhan dang / gzhan dag gis kyang chos kyang
120a5(mdo sde): nyan la/ ting nge 'dzin tha dad par yang mi byed cing / chos kyang len la 'dzin te 'don cing kun chub par yang byed la/ sangs rgyas de dag las chos nyan pa'i rgyun chad pa sa mi byed do//
120a6(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du gzugs dang / lus dang / kha dog yongs su 'grub pa tha dad pas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par yang
120a7(mdo sde): byed la/ lus tha dad par yang mi byed cing gnas nas kyang mi g.yo'o// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du bya ba thams cad kun tu ston kyang / ting nge
120b1(mdo sde): 'dzin tha dad par yang mi byed do/ / sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag kyang mngon par sgrub la/
120b2(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin tha dad par yang mi byed do// 'jam dpal rnam grangs des na/ rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
120b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mthas klas pa'i bskal par ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bsgrub pa mngon par bsgrub kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bsgrub pa rnams kyi mthar thug par
120b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa de dag thams cad ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen las nges par byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du
120b5(mdo sde): gzungs kyi sgo brjod du med pa mngon par sgrub pa mtha' yas dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ tshad med pa dag dang
120b6(mdo sde): gzungs thob pa phun sum tshogs pa de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen las nges par byung ngo / / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dpag tu med//
120b7(mdo sde): grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med// gzhal du med// tshad med/ brjod du med pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// 'jam dpal mdor bsdu na de lta
121a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgrub pa mtha' yas pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen las
121a2(mdo sde): nges par byung ba yin no/ / 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa'i sgo la 'jug pa sems can la kun tu ston
121a3(mdo sde): pa'i yul dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rgyan sna tshogs su mngon par bsgrub pa 'gro ba thams cad shes par byed pa'i yul dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sprul pa
121a4(mdo sde): mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byang chub sems dpa'i lus su mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur mngon
121a5(mdo sde): par bsgrub pa'i yul dang / nam mkha'i khams 'jig rten gyi khams su mngon par bsgrub pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha'i khams su mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul dang /
121a6(mdo sde): 'khor ba mya ngan las 'das par mngon par bsgrub pa dang / mya ngan las bdas pa 'khor bar mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul dang / sems can gyi skad brjod pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi
121a7(mdo sde): chos thams cad bstan pa'i yul dang / gdong dang / lus mtha' yas pa kun tu bstan pa lus gcig tu byin gyis rlob cing / lus kyi rim pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i
121b1(mdo sde): yul dang / lus gcig gis chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa'i yul dang / sems can gcig gi sems bskyed pa rnams la sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig re re la yang sgo
121b2(mdo sde): mtha' yas pas bsgrub pa'i byang chub rnam par mi rtog pa'i yul dang / 'jam dpal de la sogs pa yul bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi
121b3(mdo sde): khyab pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' la yang dag par 'grub bo/ / 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshen gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
121b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu mos shing 'jug go/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mos shing 'jug go// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad pad+ma'i
121b5(mdo sde): gdan gcig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gcig gis yongs su khyab par mos shing 'jug go// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid du kun tu ston par mos
121b6(mdo sde): shing 'jug go/ / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rgyun du mos shing 'jug/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyis yongs su khyab par mos shing 'jug
121b7(mdo sde): go/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad skra tsam gyi khor gcig la 'jog par mos shing 'jug go// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad lus gcig tu 'jug pa dang ldan par mos shing
122a1(mdo sde): 'jug go/ / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi byang chub kyi shing dang / byang chub kyi snying pos yongs su khyab par mos shing 'jug go/
122a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sgra skad gcig gis go bar byed cing / sems can gyi khams sna tshogs kyi sgra la 'jug pas tshim par byed par mos shing 'jug go/ sems can thams
122a3(mdo sde): cad kyi ngo bo nyid dang / lus su mos shing 'jug go// sems can gyi khams thams cad sems can gcig gi lus la 'jug pa dang ldan par mos shing 'jug go/ sems can gyi khams
122a4(mdo sde): thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i khong du song bar mos shing 'jug go/ sems can gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i khong du zhugs par mos shing 'jug go/ sems can
122a5(mdo sde): gyi khams thams cad sems can gcig gi lus la bsten par mos shing 'jug go/ / sems can gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snod du mos shing 'jug go// sems
122a6(mdo sde): can gyi khams thams cad brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba gang 'dod pa dang / mos pa'i gzugs dang / lus dang / kha dog dang / rtags la mngon du
122a7(mdo sde): phyogs pa ston par mos shing 'jug go/ / sems can gyi khams thams cad nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / lus dang / kha dog dang / rtags dang / tshul du
122b1(mdo sde): ston par mos shing 'jug go/ / sems can gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyis legs par brgyan pa'i byin gyi rlabs kun tu ston par mos shing 'jug go//
122b2(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po dang / gzugs dang / lus dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / spyod
122b3(mdo sde): lam dang / spyod pa kun tu ston pa gzhan shes par byed par mos shing 'jug go/ 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod pa'i
122b4(mdo sde): khams nas kyang mi g.yo la/ gzugs dang / gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang snyems
122b5(mdo sde): par 'jug cing / de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye'o// nyan thos kyi lam mngon du shes pa la zhugs pa yang yin la/ snying rje chen po'i stobs kyang rgyun mi gcod do// rang sangs rgyas
122b6(mdo sde): kyi lam mngon du shes shing mthong ba la mkhas pa yang yin la/ snying rje chen po'i stobs kyang rgyun mi gcod do// g.yog 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor ba yang yin la/ lha dang
122b7(mdo sde): mi'i g.yog 'khor mang po rnam par dag pa dang yang ldan no/ / lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag dag glu dbyangs rjes su sgrogs shing / sil snyan 'bum dag sil khrol 'byin pa dang yang
123a1(mdo sde): ldan la/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang ldan pa'i bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang mi 'dor ro// 'gro ba
123a2(mdo sde): dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / bzhad gang dang / 'jo sgeg thams cad dang / sems can brkam chags pa'i 'du 'dzi thams cad kyi nang na gnas pa yang yin la/ sems kyi skad cig
123a3(mdo sde): gcig la yang byang chub kyi sems kyi mnyam pa nyid kyang mi 'dor ro/ / 'jig rten las 'das pa yang yin te/ 'jig rten thams cad dang ma 'dres la/ pha rol tu 'gro ba'i lam
123a4(mdo sde): la slob par yang snang zhing las dang nyon mongs par bying ba'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par yang byed do/ / lam la gnas shing lam ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa mthong ba la zhugs
123a5(mdo sde): pa yang yin la/ lam ngan par lhung ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ lam ngan pa na yang snang zhing / lam de la snying por 'du shes pa yang ma yin la/ des dag
123a6(mdo sde): par 'dod pa yang ma yin no/ / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' kha na ma tho ba med pa yang yin te/ rtag tu tshul khrims legs par bsrungs shing / de bzhin gshegs
123a7(mdo sde): pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa la yang gzhol la/ sems can tshul khrims 'chal pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ byis pa so so'i skye bo phal pa'i spyod yul pa la yang kun
123b1(mdo sde): tu snang ngo / / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags shing / byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba la yang gzhol la/ ngan 'gror skyes pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i
123b2(mdo sde): phyir/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi khom pa dang / dbul po'i khyim du 'gro ba'i skye ba yang kun tu ston la/ 'gro
123b3(mdo sde): kha der yang dag par gzhol ba yang ma yin no/ / ye shes dang / spobs pa thogs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la zhugs pas gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa
123b4(mdo sde): yang yin no/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang / lus gzugs gcig tu gyur pa dang /
123b5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i chos kyi tshul dang / dgongs pa snang ba rtogs pa dang / theg pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas
123b6(mdo sde): thams cad kyi spyod yul la mngon du phyogs pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyis bsngags par 'os pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad kyis gdong du blta ba dang / 'gro ba thams
123b7(mdo sde): cad kyi slob dpon du gyur pa dang / zab cing brtan pa'i rgya mtsho'i chu'i dus rlabs lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa yongs
124a1(mdo sde): su 'grub pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs thob pa yang yin la/ chos yongs su tshol ba'i rgyun yang mi gcod do// lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas
124a2(mdo sde): pa'i 'jig rten gyi slob dpon dam pa yang yin la/ cog cog pur 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas mkhan po dang / slob dpon las chos len par yang kun tu ston cing / gus par bya ba
124a3(mdo sde): thams cad kyis nye bar gnas par yang snang ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam la gnas nas thabs gang dang gang gis sems can rnams yongs su smin pa'am/ 'dul bar 'gyur ba
124a4(mdo sde): thabs de dang de nyid sems can rnams la ston to/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad shin tu bsdus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi rtse mor phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
124a5(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba dang / chos kyi dbang phyug gi bdag po dam pa'i mchog thob pa dang / chos kyi cod pan thogs pa med cing dri ma med pa bcings pa dang /
124a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du thogs pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku kun tu ston pa dang / thogs pa med par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa dang / lus gzugs
124a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du zhugs pa dang / ltar ba dang / chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug dam pa'i mchog thob pa dang ldan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad thob pa dang /
124b1(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i zhing thams cad du skye ba ston pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang yul gcig tu gyur pa yang yin la/
124b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyun yang mi gcod/ byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par 'du bya ba'i stobs las kyang yongs su mi nyams/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i byin gyi rlabs las
124b3(mdo sde): kyang thag ring du mi 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid kyang mi 'dor/ byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi mtha' las kyang mi 'da'/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam las kyang phyir mi ldog/
124b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba la zhum par yang mi byed do// 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos thams cad la blang ba med pa dang / dor ba
124b5(mdo sde): med pa dang / bdeg pa med pa dang / 'jog pa med pa dang / sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / chu zla dang / stong pa nyid
124b6(mdo sde): dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / brjod du med pa dang / smrar med pa dang / bsnyad du med pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang /
124b7(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / rnam par 'jig pa med pa dang / mnyam pa nyid dang / dbyer med pa dang / gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba de ni de'i dmigs pa yin te/ chos thams cad ni
125a1(mdo sde): gnyen po med pa'i phyir ro/ / chos thams cad ces bya ba de ni de'i dmigs pa ste/ 'du shes 'dzin pa'i phyir dmigs pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems med pa
125a2(mdo sde): las sems su dmigs pa ni 'du shes phyin ci log yin pa'i phyir te/ sems phyin ci log tu gyur na/ sems myos par 'gyur ro// sems myos na sems bslad par 'gyur ro//
125a3(mdo sde): sems bslad pa las sems skrag par 'gyur ro// sems skrag pa las byang chub kyi sems nyams par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems la
125a4(mdo sde): sems kyis rjes su blta bar bya'o/ / 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dbang bcu thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste
125a5(mdo sde): tshel dbang ba dang / sems la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon las la dbang ba dang /
125a6(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang ba dang / ye shes la dbang ba'o// rnam par sprul pa bcu yang 'thob ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rnam par sprul pa dang
125a7(mdo sde): zhing rnam par sprul pa dang / chos rnam par sprul pa dang / lus rnam par sprul pa dang / smon lam rnam par sprul pa dang / spyod yul rnam par sprul pa dang / ye shes rnam par sprul
125b1(mdo sde): pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnam par sprul pa dang / rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa dang / stobs rnam par sprul pa'o// 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub
125b2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i ni sems can gyi khams thams cad kyis mos pa la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa nyid la 'jug pa dang / phyogs thams cad kyi dri ba rnam par 'a byed pa la 'jug pa
125b3(mdo sde): dang / 'jig rten gyi khams steng 'og med cing gzhi phyal ba'i rgyud thams cad la 'jug pa dang / chos thams cad gcig pa dang / tha dad pa nyid rab 'byams rnam par gzhag pa la mkhas pa
125b4(mdo sde): la 'jug pa dang / las thams cad bsgyur bar gzhug pa la 'jug pa dang / 'du shes phyin ci log gis phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa tha dad pa nyid kyi 'du shes can tha dad pa nyid la
125b5(mdo sde): 'jug pa dang / chos thams cad bsgyur ba la 'jug pa'i mtha' nges par 'byung ba gcig la 'jug pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul par byin gyis rlob pa
125b6(mdo sde): la 'jug pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad dus gsum la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad pa la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub bo// 'jam dpal dge ba'i
125b7(mdo sde): bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa sbyin pa las byung ba dang /
126a1(mdo sde): mchod pa las byung ba dang / de dag gi zad nas bslab pa gzung ba las byung ba rnams snga dro gcig gis zil gyis gnon te/ 'jam dpal de ltar dge ba'i bshes
126a2(mdo sde): gnyen ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no/ / 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
126a3(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu 'jig rten gyi khams re re na yang rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la dus
126a4(mdo sde): gsum la 'jug cing bskal pa'i phyi ma'i mtha' mur thug par bskal par byin gyis brlabs te/ dus gsum la 'jug pa'i chos ston to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal de bzhin
126a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rtag pa/ brtan pa/ zer zug pa yin pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis
126a6(mdo sde): yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro/ / 'jam dpal 'du shes phyin ci log gis sems phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams
126a7(mdo sde): 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so/ / 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma yin no zhes mngon par zhen nas chos spong bar byed do// mi dge ba'i las sna tshogs kyang byed do// 'jam dpal sangs
126b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos rnams ni skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa med de/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ yi ge med pa/ sgra med pa/ gnyis su med pa/
126b2(mdo sde): gnyen po med pa/ sgra las yang dag par 'das pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gnyen po med pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi
126b3(mdo sde): chos ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di gnyis ni mtha' ste/ 'jam dpal mtha' gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma yin te/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi chos ni mtha' med pa'i ngo bo nyid do//
126b4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal mtha' med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni mi skye/ mi 'gag go// 'jam dpal mi skye mi 'gag pa gang yin pa de ni mtha' dang / mtha' med pa yongs su spangs pa ste/ yi ge med pa/
126b5(mdo sde): sgra med pa/ sgra las yang dag par 'das pa gdags par bya ba ma yin pa/ gnyis su med pa/ gnyen po med pa'o// 'jam dpal gang gnyen po med pa de ni mi skye mi 'gag go/
126b6(mdo sde): gang mi skye mi 'gag pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku ste/ shin tu ma skyes pa/ ma byung ba/ ma 'gags pa'o// /
126b7(mdo sde): de la ni tshig med mod kyi/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / spyod pa dang / smon lam gyi stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ sems can dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo // 'jam
127a1(mdo sde): dpal dper na/ nor bu rin po che chu 'dang par byed pa/ chu'i nang du bcugs thag tu/ 'dam dzab dang / rnyog ma thams cad 'dang bar byed kyang / 'jam dpa' shod
127a2(mdo sde): rin po che chu' dang bar byed pa ni/ mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs
127a3(mdo sde): pa byung ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i 'dam rdzab dang / rnyog pa thams cad 'dang bar byed kyang / de bzhin
127a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal dper na/ rdzu mkhan gyi 'khor lo shin tu myur zhing
127a5(mdo sde): stobs kyi shugs kyis 'phangs pa ni/ rdza mkhan gyi dbang gis snod spyad sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed kyang / 'jam dpal rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog /
127a6(mdo sde): 'on kyang lhur gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo // bajam dpa' de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sngon gyi dge pa'i
127a7(mdo sde): rtsa ba dang / spyod pa dang / smon lam gyi stobs kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi shugs kyis/ sems can gyi dbang gis sems can rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs mngon par 'du mdzad kyang /
127b1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa ni mi tog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ bon kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro//
127b2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la bshos gsol ba dang / gang dag bshos mi gsol ba dang / gang dag gis mthong ba dang / gang dag gis ma mthong ba dang / gang
127b3(mdo sde): dag stong pa dang / gang dag mi stod pa dang / gang dag gshe ba dang / gang dag mi gshe ba dang / gang dag zhu ba byed pa dang / gang dag zhu ba mi byed pa de dag thams cad kyi bya ba rnams kyang /
127b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa thams cad kyang dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyis yongs
127b5(mdo sde): su zin pa las 'byung ngo / / 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa yongs su 'grub pa bsgrub pa'i
127b6(mdo sde): gzungs 'thob s+ho/ gzungs de thob pas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi skus khyab par byed do// 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang mngon par rdzogs
127b7(mdo sde): par byang chub pa'i sku ston to/ / lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bgrangs med pa dang chos tha dad pa nyid grangs med pa ston te gnas nas kyang mi g.yos/
128a1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de ltar na dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yin no// 'jam dpal de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa'
128a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la bya ba bzhin du dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bstan par bya'o/ / bsnyen par bya'o// bsnyen bkur bya'o// 'jam dpal mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni
128a3(mdo sde): brag gi bya skyibs rab tu 'bar ba bzhin du yongs su spang bar bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang / 'du shes
128a4(mdo sde): phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro/ / sems phyin ci log tu gyur na/ kun tu 'khrul par 'gyur ro// sems kun tu 'khrul par gyur na/ rnam par rmongs par 'gyur ro// sems rnam par rmongs
128a5(mdo sde): na skrag par 'gyur ro/ / sems skrag par gyur na/ byang chub kyi sems 'dor bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi sems bor na lha yongs su gtong bar 'gyur ro// lha yongs su gtong na/
128a6(mdo sde): lha rnams kyang de la bsngags pa ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur ro// klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang
128a7(mdo sde): mi rnams dang / mi ma yin pa rnams nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bar dag kyang de la bsngags pa ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de lta bas na byang chub sems dpas dge ba'i bshes
128b1(mdo sde): gnyen rnams la bstan par bya'o/ / bsnyen par bya'o// bsnyen bkur bya'o// 'jam dpal dper na/ skyabs zhes bya ba'i sman ni gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i
128b2(mdo sde): sems dang ldan pas mthong yang rung ste/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba de dag gi nad thams cad med par 'gyur yang / skyabs zhes bya ba'i sman ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ ma 'dres
128b3(mdo sde): pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir/ lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i sems
128b4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ri mor bris pa dang / gzugs su byas pa mthong na/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba yang rung ste/ de dag gis nyon mongs pa'i nad
128b5(mdo sde): thams cad med par 'gyur yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir/ lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par bya ba de lta bu
128b6(mdo sde): de 'byung ngo / / 'jam dpal dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho chen po las mngon par 'phags te/ nam mkha'i spyod yul la gnas nas/ 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag
128b7(mdo sde): grangs med pa btang bas/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad du mthong ba sbyin par byed cing / mun
129a1(mdo sde): pa sel bar byed/ 'dam rdzab dang / rnyog pa thams cad skems par byed/ pad+ma rnams kyang kha bye bar byed/ rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dung
129a2(mdo sde): nags tshal thams cad kyang skye bar byed/ sman thams cad yongs su smin par byed/ las kyi gnas thams cad ni gnas par byed la/ chu klung dang / mtshe'u dang / mtsho bran
129a3(mdo sde): thams cad la yang dus gcig tu snang ba thob par 'gyur yang gnas las kyang mi g.yo zhing / 'jam dpal nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ bon kyang ma 'dres pa'i
129a4(mdo sde): chos dang ldan pa'i phyir/ lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de rtag tu 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
129a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyang srid pa'i rgya mtsho las mngon par 'phags te/ chos kyi dbyings kyi nam mkha'i spyod yul la gnas nas/ ye shes kyi 'od zer byed pa khrag khrig grangs med pa btang
129a6(mdo sde): bas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du snang ba sbyin par mdzad cing / sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag dang / rab rib dang / ling
129a7(mdo sde): tog rnams rnam par sel bar mdzad/ nyon mongs pa'i 'dam rdzab dang rnyog pa thams cad skems par mdzad/ yun ring po nas gnyid kyis log pa'i sems can gyi khams ni sad par
129b1(mdo sde): mdzad/ sems can thams cad kyi dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad ni skye bar mdzad/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad ni yongs su smin par mdzad/ dag pa'i
129b2(mdo sde): rtsa ba'i sgo thams cad ni rab tu 'jog par mdzad de/ dus gcig tu de'i mdzad pa thams cad 'byung yang gnas nas kyang mi g.yo zhing / 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/
129b3(mdo sde): rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de ltar de bzhin gshegs
129b4(mdo sde): pa'i lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i gnas rnams kyang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa las 'byung ngo // 'jam
129b5(mdo sde): dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rab tu rnam par 'byed cing / dpyod pa la mkhas par 'gyur te/ de chos rnams la 'di ltar dpyod do//
129b6(mdo sde): mig ni gzugs kyi dmigs pa'i rgyu ma yin/ gzugs kyang mig gi dmigs pa'i rgyu ma yin la/ dmigs pa'i rgyu rkyen nyid kyis kyang rnam par shes pa 'byung ste/ rnam par
129b7(mdo sde): shes pa de yang mig las kyang ma byung / gzugs las kyang ma byung zhing / rnam par shes pa de ni byung nas zhig la/ zhu zhing mi gnas pa'o// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang
130a1(mdo sde): lus kyang de bzhin no/ / yid kyang chos kyi rkyen ma yin zhing / chos kyang yid kyi rkyen ma yin la/ dmigs pa'i rgyu rkyen gyis kyang rnam par shes pa 'byung ste/
130a2(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa de ni yid las kyang ma byung / chos rnams las kyang ma byung zhing / yid kyi rnam par shes pa de ni byung nas zhig la zhu zhing mi gnas pa'o// de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba
130a3(mdo sde): yang byang chub kyi rkyen ma yin/ byang chub kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rkyen ma yin mod kyi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang byang chub kyi rkyen las dmigs pa las/ sems skye ba rnams kyis skye ste/
130a4(mdo sde): dedag kyang skyes nas zhig cing zhul mi gnas pa'o// de la sems gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus byos pa dang / sems gang gis byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa de gnyis ni
130a5(mdo sde): phan tshun mi sbyor ro/ / dper na me ni gang nas kyang mi 'ong/ gang du yang mi 'gro ste/ 'on kyang rgyu dang rkyen gyis 'bar ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi me
130a6(mdo sde): 'bar ba yang gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du yang mi 'gro ste/ 'on kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu la brten nas byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi me 'bar te/ shes pa de lta bu dang ldan pa de ni
130a7(mdo sde): myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ / 'jam dpal de ltar na dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa yin no// 'jam dpa' rigs
130b1(mdo sde): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas/ nyan thos
130b2(mdo sde): dang bcas pa rnams la rtag par nyin gcig bzhin du zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang / lha'i na bza' dag phul la/ de ltar 'bul ba bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bya ma snyed dag tu phul zhing de
130b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i phyir yang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang
130b4(mdo sde): mchod rten 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byas pa/ nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron mas spras pa/ nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i stegs bus yongs su bskor ba/ nor bu dang / mu
130b5(mdo sde): tig dang / rin po che'i 'brang bas mdzes par byas pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba/ dril bu g.yar ka'i dra ba'i bla ra bres pa/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i byug pas
130b6(mdo sde): byugs pa/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i dra bas khebs par byas pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag byas te/ mchod rten de dag la stong gsum gyi stong
130b7(mdo sde): chen po'i tshad tsam gyi lha'i na bza' dag dang / gdugs kyi sprin dag dang / rgyal mtshan gyi sprin dag dang / ba dan gyi sprin dag dang / me tog gi sprin dag dang / spos kyi sprin dag dang
131a1(mdo sde): @#/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i sprin dag dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i sprin dag gis gtor/ mngon par gtor la nyid gcig bzhin de ltar mchod cing bskal
131a2(mdo sde): pa ga d+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu mchod la/ sems can gzhan dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag kyang mchod pa de nyid la 'god pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu
131a3(mdo sde): mo gzhan dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang / ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul la 'jug pa bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la zan mos par byed na/ 'di nyid de bas
131a4(mdo sde): bsod nams ches grangs med par bskyed do/ / 'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni pha rol tu phyin pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med/ grangs med
131a5(mdo sde): pa dag yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / sa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag gnon to// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med/ grangs med pa
131a6(mdo sde): dag phyir snyil bar byed do/ / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag rab tu shes so// nga rgyal gyi ri dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag
131a7(mdo sde): rnam par 'jig par byed do/ / phrag dog dang / ser sna'i rgyal mtshan dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag snyol bar byed do// sred pa'i chu klung dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag skems par
131b1(mdo sde): byed do/ / skye ba'i rgya mtsho dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag las rgal bar byed do// bdud kyi zhags pa dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag gcod do// nyi zla rnams dang / brgya byin dang /
131b2(mdo sde): tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyi gzi brjid zil gyis mnan te 'dug go// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o// sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang /
131b3(mdo sde): yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi skyabs su 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang yang phrad par 'gyur ro//
131b4(mdo sde): mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// chos thams cad yang dog par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// chos thams cad la dbang byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
131b5(mdo sde): kyang 'thob bo/ / rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// /
131b6(mdo sde): pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// 'jig rten thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob
131b7(mdo sde): bo/ / dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// yul la dbang byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// cher bsgyings zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//
132a1(mdo sde): rnam pa dang sems la dbang byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// seng ge bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge
132a2(mdo sde): 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ / mtha' yas 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// rab tu g.yo ba'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i
132a3(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ / rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// rdo rje lte ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//
132a4(mdo sde): sa 'dzin ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// lhun po sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// lhun po rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// rin po che'i mdzod ces
132a5(mdo sde): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ / sems la dbang byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// sems can thams cad kyi sems la dbang byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//
132a6(mdo sde): spyod pa thams cad kyi yul las nges par byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// sbyor ba zab cing gsang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// sna tshogs snang ba'i spobs pa zhes bya
132a7(mdo sde): ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ / bltar mi mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thobabo// chos thams cad la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// rnam par rom
132b1(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ / mngon par shes pa thams cad las nges par skyes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// bdud gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya/
132b2(mdo sde): ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// gzugs thams cad kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// gzugs thams cad kyi khyad par zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// lus
132b3(mdo sde): rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ / spyod pa thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//
132b4(mdo sde): mngon sum du byang chub snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// so so yang dag par rig pa rin po che bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// yon tan gyi rnam pa thams cad la
132b5(mdo sde): 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ / chos thams cad 'dul bar rnam par nges pa bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul zhes bya
132b6(mdo sde): ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ / dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// zab cing brtan pa'i rgya mtsho'i chu'i dus rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob ste// de dag
132b7(mdo sde): la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag 'thob bo/ / sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa yongs su 'grub pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo// ye shes
133a1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'beba'o/ / sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo// mi zad pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo//
133a2(mdo sde): mtha' yas 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo// rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo// pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo// chags pa med pa'i sgor
133a3(mdo sde): 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo/ / so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo// sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyis byin gyis brlabs pa zhes
133a4(mdo sde): bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thong ngo / / sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa yongs su 'grub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob ste/ de dag la sogs pa gzungs bye khrag khrig 'bum
133a5(mdo sde): phrag grangs med pa dag kyang 'thob bo/ / chos thams cad la spyod pa'i khyad par nyid kyang 'thob bo// chos thams cad la gzhan la rag ma las pa'i shes pa yang 'thob bo// chos thams cad la
133a6(mdo sde): som nyi gcod pa nyid kyang 'thob bo/ / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa stong phrag grangs med pa dag kyang 'thob bo// sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i bye brag la mkhas pa yang 'thob bo// 'jam
133a7(mdo sde): dpal dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni ri thams cad zil gyis mnan nas/ lham me/ lhan ne/ ljang nge'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems
133b1(mdo sde): dpa' yang / sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad zil gyis mnan nas lham me/ ldan ne/ lhang de'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/
133b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' sa gang dag la mos pas yon tan gyi khyad
133b3(mdo sde): par 'di dag dang / gzhan dag kyang 'thob pa'i chos kyi bye brag gzhan dag kyang yod dam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas/
133b4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sa gang dag la mos na/ yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag dang / gzhan dpag tu med pa dag kyang 'thob
133b5(mdo sde): pa'i chos lnga po 'di dag ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ chos thams cad gnyen po med pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa dang / brjod du med par mos pa dang / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par
133b6(mdo sde): skad cig skad cig la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa dang / spyod lam la 'jug pa'i gnas 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul las kyang lhag pa dag la lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog
133b7(mdo sde): par 'jug par mos pa dang / seng ge bran bzangs kyi bu'i rdzogs pa brjod pas/ sems can yongs su smin par byas pa de/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
134a1(mdo sde): snyed nas/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te mdzad par mos pa dang / mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan pa nas bzung ste/ mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i bar der
134a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gang yin pa de thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mthas klas pa'i bskal pa nas/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bstan/
134a3(mdo sde): pa yin par mos pa dang / shAkya thub pas bstan pas sems can yongs su smin par byas pa gang yin pa de sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mthas klas pa'i bskal pa nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya
134a4(mdo sde): thub pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas mdzad pa yin par mos pa ste/ 'jam dpal lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sa gang dag la mos pas yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag dang /
134a5(mdo sde): gzhan dpag tu med pa dag kyang 'thob pa yin no// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dgra bcom pa mngon
134a6(mdo sde): par shes pa drug dang ldan pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang / lha'i gos dag byin te/ de ltar na byin pa bskal
134a7(mdo sde): pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis rang sangs rgyas gcig la nyi ma gcig zas byin na/ de ni de
134b1(mdo sde): bas bsod nams ches grangs med par skyed do/ / 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang gtsug lag khang 'dzem bu'i chu bo'i
134b2(mdo sde): gser las byas pa/ nor bu rin po che glog gi 'phreng bas spras pa/ nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i stegs bus yongs su bskor ba/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / nor bu
134b3(mdo sde): rin po che'i 'phreng bas mdzes par byas pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i bla re bres pa/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i byug pas byung
134b4(mdo sde): pa/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal pos khebs par byas pa/ rgya mtshon gnas pa'i rin po che rnam par dag pa/ bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i nor bu rin po che'i kab mang pos dkrig pa/ nor bu rin po che se ge ral pa zhes bya ba'i spang leb byes pa/
134b5(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che seng ge rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo las byas pa'i sgo khang dang / rta babs dang / skar khung gis brgyan pa dar gyi lda ldi mang pos bres pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
134b6(mdo sde): khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag byas te/ rang sangs rgyas kyi gnas stong phrag grangs med pa dag dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag la nyin gcig bzhin lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang /
134b7(mdo sde): lha'i gos dag kyang byin zhing / de ltar byin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis sangs rgyas
135a1(mdo sde): zhe 'am/ 'jig rten gyi mgon po zhe'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhe'am/ thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i sgra bos na/ 'di ni debs ches bsod nams
135a2(mdo sde): grangs med par sbyang na/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ri mor bris pa 'am/ gzugs su byas pa mthong ba lta ci smos te/ 'di nyid de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed
135a3(mdo sde): do/ / gang gis mar me phul ba 'am/ bdug pa 'am/ spos sam/ me tog dag gam/ rol mo'i sgra'am/ mchod pa sna tshogs gzhan dag byed pa lta ci smos te/ 'di nyid
135a4(mdo sde): bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir/ nyi ma gcig bslab pa gcig bsrung ba lta ci smos te/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs
135a5(mdo sde): med par skyed do/ / 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa/ nyan thos dang bcas pa/ phyog
135a6(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab snyed rnams las nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang / lha'i na bza' dag kyang 'bul la/ de ltar 'bul ba bsgral
135a7(mdo sde): pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu 'dul zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i re'i phyir/ mchod rten tshang gling ba'i
135b1(mdo sde): pa tsam rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byas pa/ nor bu rin po che klog gi sgron mas spras pa
135b2(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i stegs bus yongs su bskor ba/ nor bu dang / mu tigaM dang / rin po che'i 'phreng bas mdzes par byas pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
135b3(mdo sde): dang / ba dan bsgreng ba/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i bla re bres pa/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i byug pas byugs pa/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i dra bas g.yogs pa/ phyogs
135b4(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag byas te/ mchod rten de dag la nyin gcig bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshad tsam gyi lha'i gos dag dang / gdugs kyi sprin
135b5(mdo sde): dag dang / rgyal mtshan gyi sprin dag dang / ba dan gyi sprin dag dang / me tog gi sprin dag dang / spos kyi sprin dag dang / nor bu rin po che'i sprin dag dang / rol mo'i sgra'i sprin dag dang
135b6(mdo sde): rgyan gyi sprin dag dang / seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i zla ba'i sprin dag dang / lha'i sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs kyi sgra'i sprin rnams kyis gtor/ mngon par
135b7(mdo sde): gtor la/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu gzhan gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang / ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab
136a1(mdo sde): pa'i yul la 'jug pa bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos shing zan dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gcig la zan kham gcig byin na/ 'di nyid
136a2(mdo sde): de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ / 'jam dpal mdo sde 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig gis mdo sde 'di las ji skad smos pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
136a3(mdo sde): rnams la mchod pa byed pa bas/ byang chub sems dpa' mdo 'di nyid la mos pa gzhan gang zhig gis mdo 'di nyid la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig mthong nas/ byang
136a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' 'di ni mdo 'di nyid la mos pa'o snyam ste/ dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen po rnyed la/ de sems dang bas langs te/ de la thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal te/
136a5(mdo sde): ci nus ci lcogs su de la yongs su gzung ba byas na/ 'di nyid de bas ches sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thob par 'gyur ba'i bsod nams grangs med par skyed do// 'jam dpal de lta bas
136a6(mdo sde): na sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams mes yongs su gang ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang rgal
136a7(mdo sde): 'gro bar bya'o/ / 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig gis bskal pa bye ba stong phrag brgyad du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga la spyad pa bas/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'
136b1(mdo sde): gzhan gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa'o snyam du mos par byed na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhi
136b2(mdo sde): gis/ sangs rgyas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag la lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang / lha'i na bza' dag nyin gcig bzhin du 'bul zhing de
136b3(mdo sde): ltar 'bul ba bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu 'bul ba bas/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang / ye shes bsam
136b4(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa'i yul la 'jug pa bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur nas/ khyod chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa
136b5(mdo sde): legs so legs so/ / khyod ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi phyag bya ba'i 'os yin no zhes bsam pa thag pa nas legs so zhes bya ba byin la/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams
136b6(mdo sde): cad kyi gsang ba'i gnas rnams su zhugs la/ chos kyi 'khor lo sker cig ces byas na/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' de ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par 'phel
136b7(mdo sde): bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba 'di la sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams snga ma des brgya'i cha'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang
137a1(mdo sde): bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi n+ya dang / bye ba 'bum gyi mdang / bye ba khrag khrig 'bum gyi chadang / grangs dang / ma dang / bgrang ba dang / dpedang
137a2(mdo sde): zladang / rgyur yang mi bzod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas de skad ces smras nas/ byang chub
137a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i
137a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang / ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul
137a5(mdo sde): la 'jug pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+ha ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te ga tan
137a6(mdo sde): la phab pa'o/ / mdo sde snyan gyi gong rgyan zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// lo kaM las 'das pa/ rma mtsham ching
137a7(mdo sde): rnam ste/ de bar med na rdo rje brtan pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na yangs par yongs su dag pa'i gser grags pa'i mngon mtshan rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i dri
137b1(mdo sde): chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na rdul gyi 'og gnas bstan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na snang bas lgang nge zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching
137b2(mdo sde): rnam ste/ de na rnam pa tha dad par las kyis snyoms par brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na sgra skar zhi ba zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho
137b3(mdo sde): mching rnam ste/ de na rab tu 'phyang ba'i mngon du ba'i mngon pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas ste/ de lta bu la sogs pa rjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
137b4(mdo sde): zhing gi mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam rnams kyi phyi rol gyi kho ra khor yug gi mtshams na/ 'od 'phro stug pa'i sprin rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho
137b5(mdo sde): mching rnam ste/ de na rgyan thams cad kyi dmigs pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas pa/ byang chub kyi dkyil thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyis
137b6(mdo sde): 'khor gyi sgra ma lus pa'i gzhi'o/ / der thams cad kyi 'og ma ni/ legs mig bris pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i
137b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' gcig tu yongs su dag pa'i 'khor rnams te/ de na rdo rje zla ba phyogs thams cad du rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'o// de'i gong sangs
138a1(mdo sde): r gyas kyi zhing bcu'i mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams las 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs kyi dbus rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi 'jin
138a2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams kyi 'og dang mnyam pa na/ pad+ma dpal gyi be'u'i kha dog ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khamra ta/ de na brtson 'grus chen po shin tu blo gros zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'o//
138a3(mdo sde): de'i gong mi mjed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'og dang mnyam pa na/ rdo rje sra ba'i mtshams bris pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams te/ de na shing sA la'i rgyal po rgyal mtshan zhes
138a4(mdo sde): bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ / de'i gong du sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdun gyi mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams las 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ri
138a5(mdo sde): kyi spyi bo na/ rgya mtsho mching rnam dag pa bris pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams te/ de na zil gyis ma mnan par shin tu gong du 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs
138a6(mdo sde): pa'o/ / yang rin po che 'byung gnas snod kyis brtsegs pa'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam/ de'i bar med na rin po che thams cad snang ba'i bod rnam par ldang ngo zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho
138a7(mdo sde): mching rnam ste/ de na grags pa dri ma med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med ma tshad med pa'i rin po che rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho
138b1(mdo sde): mching rnam ste/ de na mtshan nyid nam mkha' rnam par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na rnam par snang mdzad kyi dpal bla re zhes
138b2(mdo sde): bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na thogs pa med par kun tu snang ba'i rgyan ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na tsan dan gyi sdong po'i ka
138b3(mdo sde): sa ra zhes bya ba dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na 'khyil ba mtha' med pa phyogs su 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na gser rin
138b4(mdo sde): po che'i rgyal po dpal 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo zhing 'khyil pa rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so//
138b5(mdo sde): de'i mtshungs pa'i 'dab chags na/ kun tu rdo rje'i me tog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na bsam du med pa'i rnam pa'i cha ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams
138b6(mdo sde): kyi rigs rab tu gnas so/ / de'i bar med na bsam pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po 'khor los 'og bris pa zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na chags pa med pa'i rnam par shes
138b7(mdo sde): par byed pa sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so/ / de'i bar med na rin po che'i se mo de 'og tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho
139a1(mdo sde): mching rnam ste/ de na rnam pa'i blo gros dge ba mtha' med kyig zi brjid ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na mu tig
139a2(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis snyoms par brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na sangs rgyas kyi yul smon lam 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rig
139a3(mdo sde): rab tu gnas te/ de lta bu la sogs pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ thams cad
