175a3(mdo sde): gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ram/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ ci sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ram snyam du sems la mi
175a4(mdo sde): bya ste/ 'on kyang bsgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bsgrim mi dgos par yongs su
175a5(mdo sde): dag par 'gyur ro/ / 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ nam nangs pa'i dus kyi tshe/ ci nyi ma 'char ram snyam du sems la mi bya ste/ 'on kyang nam nangs pa'i dus kyi tshe
175a6(mdo sde): bsgrim mi dgos par nyi ma 'char ba de bzhin du/ 'jam dpal sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ ji ltar bdag
175a7(mdo sde): gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa yongs su dag par 'gyur snyam du sems la mi bya ste/ 'on kyang sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa
175b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa nas brjod du med pa'i bar du bsgrim mi dgos par yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ / 'jam dpal sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar
175b2(mdo sde): pa la spyod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa yongs su dag go// sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa dang / bsam
175b3(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa dang / mtshungs pa med pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / brjod du med pa yongs su dag go/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan
175b4(mdo sde): 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams
175b5(mdo sde): cad grub pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji tsam du rgya cher yongs su dag pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad
175b6(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to/ / 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji
175b7(mdo sde): tsam du rgya cher yongs su dag pa ni/ tshig gis go bar sla ba ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dper bgyir rung lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
176a1(mdo sde): stsal pa/ 'jam dpal rung ngo // 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bzhi bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul skyed kyi 'jig
176a2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams grong khyer gcig tu gyur la/ 'di lta ste/ phye ma 'am/ phye ma'i rnam pa gzhan gyis gang ba bzhin du yungs kar gyis gang par gyur te/ mi la la zhig gis yungs kar
176a3(mdo sde): de rdul phra rab tu btags na/ yungs 'bru re re yang yungs 'bru ji snyed pa de snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul du byas la/ des rdul phra rab de dag phrag pa la thogs nas/ shar phyogs
176a4(mdo sde): su song ste/ gom pa gcig bor bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'da' la/ gom pa 'dor ba 'di 'dra ba dang ldan zhing 'di lta ste/ sems kyi mgyogs
176a5(mdo sde): pa'i rdzu 'phrul lta bu'i mgyogs pa dang ldan te/ gom pa 'dor ba de lta bu dang / mgyogs pa de lta bu dang ldan pas bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du song zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul
176a6(mdo sde): gcig bor la/ de lta bu'i tshul gyis shar phyogs su rdul phra rab kyi rdul de thams cad bor te/ de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / phyogs mtshams rnams su de snyed kyi rdul
176a7(mdo sde): phra rab kyi rdul por zhing de bzhin du steng dang 'og gi phyogs su yang rdul phra rab kyi rdul de snyed bor na/ 'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/ yungs kar gyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul
176b1(mdo sde): gang du bor ba dang / ma bor ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang mang / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdul phra rab kyi rdul bor ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de ni nyung lags kyi
176b2(mdo sde): ma dor ba de ni ches mad lags so/ / bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams gang du rdul phra rab kyi rdul bor ba dang / gang du ma bor ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de
176b3(mdo sde): dag thams cad grong khyer gcig tu gyur la/ 'di lta ste/ phye ma 'am/ phye ma'i rnam pa gzhan gyis gang ba bzhin du yungs kar gyis gang bde la/ mi la la zhig gis yungs
176b4(mdo sde): 'bru de dag btags te/ yungs 'bru re re yang yungs 'bru de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul du byas te/ des rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag thams cad phrag pa la thogs
176b5(mdo sde): nasashar phyogs su song ste/ gom pa gcig bor bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'da' zhing / 'di lta ste/ sems kyi mgyogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul
176b6(mdo sde): lta bu'i mgyogs pa dang ldan pa de lta bu'i gom pa 'dor zhing / de lta bu'i mgyogs pas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par song ste/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig bor zhing
176b7(mdo sde): lta bu'i tshul gyis shar phyogs su rdul phra rab bor ba de bzhin du lho phyogs su rdul phra rab kyi rdul de snyed 'dor zhing / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub
177a1(mdo sde): dang / nub byang gi mtshams dang / steng dang / 'og gi phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams su rdul phra rab de snyed bor na/ 'jam dpal de ji snyam du sama?/
177a2(mdo sde): gang du rdul phra rab de dag bor ba dang / kang du ma bor ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang mang / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang du rdul phra rab de dag bor ba nyung lags kyi/
177a3(mdo sde): ma bor ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de ni ches mang lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams gang du rdul phra rab bor ba dang / gang du ma bor ba de dag thams
177a4(mdo sde): cad grong khyer gcig tu gyur la/ 'di lta ste/ phye ma 'am/ phye ma'i rnam pa gzhan gyis gang ba bzhin du yungs kar gyis gang ste/ mi la la zhig gis yungs 'bru de dag
177a5(mdo sde): btags nas/ yungs 'bru re re yang yungs 'bru de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul du byas te/ des rdul phra rab de dag thams cad phrag pa la thogs nas/ shar phyogs
177a6(mdo sde): su song ste/ gom pa gcig bor bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'da' zhing 'di lta ste/ sems kyi mgyogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul lta bu mgyogs pa dang
177a7(mdo sde): ldan te/ gom pa de lta bur 'dor ba dang / de lta bu'i mgyogs pa dang ldan pas/ kang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par song ste rdul phra rab gcig zer la/ de lta bu'i tshul
177b1(mdo sde): gyis shar phyogs su rdul phra rab de thams cad bor la/ de bzhin du lho phyogs su rdul phra rab de snyed bor zhing dub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang shar lho dang / lho nub
177b2(mdo sde): dang / nub byang gi mtshams dang / steng dang 'og gi phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams re rer yang rdul phra rab de snying bor na/ 'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/ gang du rdul
177b3(mdo sde): pra rab bor ba dang / gang du ma bor ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gang mang / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang du rdul phra rab bor ba ni nyung lags kyang / ma bor ba ni chas
177b4(mdo sde): mang lags so/ / bka' sprul pa/ 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams gang du rdul phra rab ma bor ba dang / gang du bor ba de thams cad grong khyer gcig tu gyur nas/ yungs
177b5(mdo sde): kar gyis gang ba ni ji ltar sngar dpe bstan pa de bzhin du rgyas par bya ste stong phrag sum cur bsgyur ba/ 'jam dpal de thams cad kyi ba ma'i rdul phra rab kyi phung po bzhag pa snyed kyi
177b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams kyi rgyu ji tsam par/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub pa'i byang chub kyi shing gi rgya yang de
177b7(mdo sde): tsam mo/ / byang chub kyi shing de ni rin po che sna bdun te/ 'bras bu ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'o// byang chub kyi shing de'i yal ga ni tha ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed do// yal ga gcig cing
178a1(mdo sde): yang ba ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi yal kA phre'u yod de/ yal ka phre'u gcig cing yang tha ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'bras bu yod do// 'bras bu
178a2(mdo sde): re re la yang ma shas ni dpag tu med do/ / 'jam dpal byang chub kyi shing de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa'i legs par spyod pa'i 'bras bus 'grub pa ste/ de ni
178a3(mdo sde): mig yongs su ma sbyangs pa'i sems can rnams kyi mig lam du snang bar mi 'gyur ro/ / 'jam dpal 'di lta sted par na/ bar snang gi gnod sbyin rnams kyi gzhal med khang dag
178a4(mdo sde): mi rnams kyi mig lam du snang bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ byang chub kyi shing de yang mig yongs su ma sbyangs pa'i sems can rnams kyi mig lam du snang bar mi 'gyur ro// 'jam
178a5(mdo sde): dpal byang chub kyi shing de la sems can rnams mi thogs par 'gro ste/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ bar snang gi gnod sbyin ngag gi gzhal med khang rnams la mi thogs par
178a6(mdo sde): 'gro ba de bzhin du/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi shing de la sems can rnams mi thogs par 'gro ste/ byang chub kyi shing de yang yongs su dag pa'i las dang ldan pa'i sems can
178a7(mdo sde): rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su grub pa'i phyir ro/ / 'jam dpal yang de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni/ shar phyogs su yang
178b1(mdo sde): tha ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de snyed yongs su dag go/ / lhor yang de snyed/ nub tu yang de snyed/ byang du yang de snyed/ shar lhor yang de snyed/ lho nub tu yang de snyed
178b2(mdo sde): nub byang du yang de snyed/ byang shar du yang de snyed/ steng dang / 'og gi phyogs su yang de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de tsam du rgyu chu
178b3(mdo sde): yongs su dag go/ sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la brten na de'i brgyar yang bsgres pa de snyed du rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag go// 'jam dpal byang chub kyi shing de'i
178b4(mdo sde): 'bras bu 'byung ba dang / skye ba dang / rgyal ba dang / 'gas pa rgyun mi 'chad cing bar skabs med de/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ byis pa lnga brgya tsam rtse na kha cig 'grang
178b5(mdo sde): kha cig 'dug pa'i rgyun mi 'chad cing bar skabs med pa de bzhin du/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi shing de'i 'bras bu 'byung ba dang / skye ba dang / smin pa dang / 'gas pa yang
178b6(mdo sde): rgyun mi 'chad cing bar skabs med do/ / 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ char gyi 'bru rags pa 'bab pa'i tshe/ tshul chu bur kha cig 'byung / kha cig 'jig pa rgyun mi
178b7(mdo sde): 'chad cing bar skabs med pa de bzhin du/ 'bras bu de dag 'byung ba dang / skye ba dang / rgyal ba dang / 'gas pa yang rgyun mi 'chad cing bar skabs med do// 'bras bu gas
179a1(mdo sde): pa de'i cha shas gcig las kyang / gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ste/ mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ lus dpe byad
179a2(mdo sde): bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa/ / srad med kyi bu ltar lus mkhregs pa/ srid pa tha mar gyur pa'i sems can 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med par
179a3(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa'i bar du ste/ de dag thams cad kyis kyang de tsam du rgya cher sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par sbyangs te/ de dag de nas byung nas
179a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub pa de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs
179a5(mdo sde): gcig tu 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag la/ de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pas rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa 'chad de/ dus gsum mnyam pa
179a6(mdo sde): nyid kyang ston to/ / de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa nyan cing kun 'dzin te/ thos ma thag tu mngon par shes pa lnga thob bo// mngon par shes pa lnga thob ma thag tu de bzhin
179a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'dong ngo // de dag rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs
179b1(mdo sde): kyis rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa don thams
179b2(mdo sde): cad grub pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgoms te/ rab tu goms par byas/ lam du byas/ rten du byas/ ru shing bzhin du
179b3(mdo sde): byas/ rab tu rtogs par byas shing / legs par brtsams so// ting nge 'dzin gsum gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shugs ldan zhes bya ba dang / byang chub
179b4(mdo sde): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhi gnas zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad la dbang byed pa zhes bya'o// 'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das
179b5(mdo sde): pa'i dus bskal pa dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ me tog gi
179b6(mdo sde): tshogs zhes bya ba'i bskal pa byung ste/ me tog gi tshogs kyi bskal pa de la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/
179b7(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog dam pa
180a1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog dam pa de la nyan thos thog mar 'dus pa/
180a2(mdo sde): ninyan thos khrag khrig brgyad cu yod do// dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin
180a3(mdo sde): tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/
180a4(mdo sde): sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag go// byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de'i nyis 'gyur yod de/ thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa'i
180a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la
180a6(mdo sde): yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dang / mtshungs pa med pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su
180a7(mdo sde): dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag go/ yang nyan thos pa dus pa gnyis pa la ni/ nyan thos khrag khrig yod do// byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa ni de'i nyis
180b1(mdo sde): 'gyur yod do/ / nyan thos 'dus pa gsum pa la ni/ nyan thos khrag khrig phrag brgya yod de/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur
180b2(mdo sde): pa nas/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i bar du'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa ni de'i nyis 'gyur yod de/ nyin re zhing chos ston pa'i bar thams
180b3(mdo sde): cad la/ nyan thos 'dus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa rnams kyis mnyam du de bzhin gshegs pa des chos bstan pa kun shes so// 'jam dpal yang de bzhin gshegs
180b4(mdo sde): pa dkon mchog dam pa de'i nyan thos 'dus pa ni/ rtsis mkhan nam/ rtsis mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pas bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa
180b5(mdo sde): stong phrag brgya'am/ bskal pa bye ba'am/ bskal pa khrag khrig gam/ bskal pa gtams sam/ bskal pa dkrigs sam/ bskal pa 'gyur yas kyi bar du yang nyan thos 'dus
180b6(mdo sde): pa 'di skad ce'am/ nyan thos 'dus pa brgya phrag 'di snyed ce'am/ nyan thos 'dus pa stong phrag 'di snyed ce'am/ nyan thos 'dus pa brgya stong phrag 'di snyed ce'am/ nyan thos 'dus
180b7(mdo sde): pa bye ba phrag 'di snyed ce'am/ nyan thos 'dus pa khrag khrig phrag 'di snyed ce'am/ nyan thos 'dus pa gtams phrag 'di snyed ce'am/ nyan thos 'dus pa dkrigs phrag 'di snyed ce 'am/
181a1(mdo sde): nyan thos 'dus pa khyad phyin phrag 'di snyed ce'am/ nyan thos 'dus pa 'gyur las phrag 'di snyed yod ces brtsi bar mi nus so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/
181a2(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi skar ma'i gzugs rnams la/ skar ma'i gzugs 'di snyed ce'am/ skar ma'i gzugs brgya phrag 'di skad ce'am/ skar ma'i
181a3(mdo sde): gzugs stong phrag 'di snyed ce'am/ skar ma'i gzugs brgya stong phrag 'di snyed ce'am/ bya ba phrag 'di snyed ce'am/ khrag khrig phrag 'di snyed ce'am/ gtams phrag 'di skad ce
181a4(mdo sde): 'am/ dkrigs phrag 'di snyed ce'am/ 'gyur yas phrag 'di snyed yod ces/ rtsis mkhan nam/ rtsis mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pas kyang brtsi bar mi nus so// 'on kyang skar
181a5(mdo sde): ma'i gzugs dpag tu med pa'i grangs su 'gro ba de bzhin du/ 'jam dpal nyan thos 'dus pa de rnams kyi mtha' yang rtogs par mi nus so// 'jam dpal de'i dus
181a6(mdo sde): na/ rgyal po bde gnas blo gros zhes bya ba chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po zhig yod pa de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad la dbang zhing bdag po byed de/ las kyi rnam par smin
181a7(mdo sde): pa las byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog dam pa de nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun du bcas
181b1(mdo sde): pa la/ lo bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu'i bar du/ ro sde brgya pa'i zhal zas sbyar te/ rim gro byas so// yul ka shi pa'i na bza' gsol cing / yo byad thams cad kyang sbyar te
181b2(mdo sde): 'di ltar chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad kyis rim gro byas so// de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la
181b3(mdo sde): ro sna brgya pa'i zas kyis rim gro byas pas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya che zhing / dpag tu med pa mngon par 'dus byas so// dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya che zhing dpag tu med pa mngon par 'dus byas pas dge ba'i
181b4(mdo sde): rtsa ba shugs rgya che zhing dpag tu med pa skyed do/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya che zhing grangs med pa mngon par 'dus byas so// dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya che zhing grangs med pa mngon par 'dus byas nas/ dge ba'i
181b5(mdo sde): rtsa ba shugs rgya che zhing grangs med pa bskyed par gyur to/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa'i
181b6(mdo sde): yang brjod du med pa mngon par 'dus byas nas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs rgya che zhing bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med//
181b7(mdo sde): brjod du med pa bskyed par gyur to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa rgya chen po mngon par 'dus byas te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
182a1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa rgya chen po mngon par 'dus byas nas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba shugs dpag tu
182a2(mdo sde): med pa rgya chen po bskyed do/ / de bzhin du sbyar te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge pa'i rtsa ba grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du
182a3(mdo sde): mad brjod du med cing / rgya cher mngon par 'dus byas so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dag pa'i rtsa ba grangs med pa nas/ brjod du med cing rgya che ba'i bar du mngon
182a4(mdo sde): par 'dus byas nas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs rgya che zhing grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du ma da
182a5(mdo sde): brjod du med pa bskyed do/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya che zhing grangs med/ dpag tu med pa mngon par 'dus byas te/ ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
182a6(mdo sde): phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'dus pa de bzhin du/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grub kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtam gyi pha rol tu phyin
182a7(mdo sde): pa yang rgyas par bya'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya che zhing / dpag tu med pa mngon par 'dus byas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i
182b1(mdo sde): rtsa ba rgya che zhing dpag tu med pa mngon par 'dus byas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs rgya che zhing dpag tu med pa bskyed do// de bzhin du sbyar te/
182b2(mdo sde): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya che ba/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa mngon par 'dus byas
182b3(mdo sde): teshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba brjod du med pa'i bar du mngon par 'dus byas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs grangs
182b4(mdo sde): med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa bskyed do// 'jam dpal rgyal po bde gnas blo gros kyis/ de lta bur pha rol tu phyin
182b5(mdo sde): pa drug dang ldan pa'i dge pa'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed nas/ dga' ba dang / dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba mang bas/ ta la bdun srid du nam mkha' la 'phags nas/ bcom ldan
182b6(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog dam pa de la pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ / stobs bcu shes rab mtha' yas pa// chu bo bzhi rgal
182b7(mdo sde): mi'i seng ga/ khyod la phul ba dpag med 'gyur// sbyin pa de yang zil gi mi mnon// ba tsha med pa'i zhing dag la// rdo dang bong ba gyo mo med// kun sbangs rab tu rmos pa na//
183a1(mdo sde): mi mnyam med phyogs rtswa med par// ji ltar sa bon btab nas su// rmed pa'i mi de bder nyal yang // dus su rtsa ba brtan par zug/ myu gu sngon por 'byung bar
183a2(mdo sde): byed/ / klu yis sa la chu btab pas// lo ma sdong bu rnams kyang 'byung // dus tshigs dus kyi rims bzhin du// nges par 'bras bu smin par 'gyur// de bzhin 'dod chags zhe sdang
183a3(mdo sde): bcom/ / gti mug bral ba nges pa'i blos// ma smad yon tan zhing khyod la// shes rab gshol gyis rmos pa ni// sa bon nyung ngu btab pa yang // de bzhin sbyin bdag mi brtson kyang //
183a4(mdo sde): pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs shing // thams cad mkhyen pa'i myu gu s+ye// mgon po khyod la sbyin phul na// byams pa snying rje nyon mongs med// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang // tha mar
183a5(mdo sde): 'bras bu mya ngan 'dab/ / sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba// sa la dong ka men rgyas bzhin// bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa bsags pas// ji ltar bde gshegs de bzhin shog/ ji ltar bsod
183a6(mdo sde): nams mtshan mnga' ba/ / legs spyad bsags pa thub pa'i tog/ ji ltar mi mchog dam pa bzhin// bdag kyang bde gshegs de bzhin gyur// ji ltar dpe med blo can khyod// shes rab
183a7(mdo sde): gnas la khyod gnas nas/ / lta bar rab tu bying ba yi// skye bo ma log 'god par mdzad// bdag kyang byang chub reg nas ni// de bzhin bden la rab gnas te// log pa'i lam song skye bo
183b1(mdo sde): rnams/ / bden pa bzhi yi lam du 'god// ji ltar khyod ni phung po med// bla med phung po zad par zhugs// byis pa phung pos bcings pa rnams// thams cad phung po 'dor du btsud//
183b2(mdo sde): bdag kyang phung po med pa dang // bung med byang chub mchog thob nas/ phung pos bcings pa'i skye bo rnam// phung po 'dor bar rab tu dgod// ji ltar khyod kyis nyon modra spangs// chu yis me rnams zhi ba bzhin// nyon
183b3(mdo sde): mongs ma yis 'bar ba yi/ / skye bo sdug bsngal thar par mdzad// bdag kyang byang chub rab reg ste// khro glen 'dod gsum me zhi nas// nye bar zhi ba'i lam ston pa'i// skye bo rab tu
183b4(mdo sde): zhi bar dgod/ / sar sna'i zhags pas bcings pa dang // phrag dog kun sbyor mun pas bsgribs// srid par chags pa mgon med rnams// yan lag brgyad kyi lam la 'god// ji ltar
183b5(mdo sde): rang byung khyod nyid ni/ / stobs bcu ye shes rab gnas te// srid sgom sems can khrag khrig la// stobs bcu ye shes ngoms par mdzad// bdag kyang byang chub rab reg cing // bla
183b6(mdo sde): med ye shes thob nas su/ / srid skom sems can khrag khrig la// stobs bcu ye shes ngoms par bgyi// 'jam dpal de ltar rgyal po bde gnas blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das
183b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog dam pa de la/ lo bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu'i bar du/ zas ro sna brgya pa sbyar zhing / yul ka shi pa'i na bza' gsol te/ bar snang la 'dug
184a1(mdo sde): nas/ tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod de/ de dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs tshad med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med
184a2(mdo sde): gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa bskyed nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs des/ bskal pa brjod du med par/ nams kyang sems can dmyal bar ma skyes/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang
184a3(mdo sde): gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin gyi rigs su yang ma skyes/ mi khom pa rnams su ma skyes/ rigs dma' bar ma skyes/ dbul po'i rigs su ma skyes so// bskal pa brjod
184a4(mdo sde): du med par nam yang lus la rlung las gyur pa 'am/ mkhris pa las gyur pa 'am/ bad kan las gyur pa'i nad ma byung ste/ nams kyang dbang po ma tshang bar ma gyur/ nams kyang mig
184a5(mdo sde): ser ba dang / 'jigs pa'i mig dang / mig yo ba dang / bzhin yo bar ma gyur to// nams kyang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis lus ma brgyan par ma gyur/ nams
184a6(mdo sde): kyang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang bral bar ma gyur/ lha'i nang du lhar gyur tam/ mi'i nang du mir gyur na/ nams kyang dbang po dang / bdag po ma byas pas ma gyur/ nams kyang smon
184a7(mdo sde): lam phun sum tshogs pa dang bral bar ma gyur/ nams kyang sangs rgyas med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ma skyes/ nams kyang nad med pa dang / gzugs dang / longs spyod dang / g.yog
184b1(mdo sde): 'khor dang / phyug pas de sngon dregs par ma gyur/ nams kyang bud med kyi dregs pa dang / gos kyi dregs pa ma skyes/ nams kyang sbyin pa dag ma byas par ma gyur/ de rnams kyang
184b2(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi dregs pa ma skyes/ nams kyang tshul khrims dang ldan pa ma yin par ma gyur/ de rnams kyang thos pas dregs pa ma skyes/ nams kyang mang du thos pa ma yin par ma gyur
184b3(mdo sde): nams kyang 'dod pa'i 'du shes ma skyes/ nams kyang btsun mo'i 'khor gyis ma bskor bar ma gyur/ nams kyang tshangs par mi spyod par ma gyur te/ bsams ma thag tu bu rnyed par gyur
184b4(mdo sde): to/ / nams kyang gnod sems kyi 'du shes ma skyes/ nams kyang rnam par 'tshe ba'i 'du shes ma skyes/ de ltar rgyal po des shugs dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di bskyed nas/ byang
184b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i yon tan 'di rnams dang / gzhan yang rab tu bsgrubs so// 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'jam dpal de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po bdag nas blo gros zhes bya
184b6(mdo sde): bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/ de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub
184b7(mdo sde): pa de ni/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de rgyal po bde gnas blo gros zhes bya bar gyur to// 'jam dpal de lta bas na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i pha
185a1(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs btsal bar bya'o zhes de ltar bslab par bya'o/ / 'jam dpal theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sem
185a2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la spyod pa des/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po mngon par 'dus byas te/ tshul khrims
185a3(mdo sde): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs rgya chen po bskyed par bya'o/ / // bam po gnyis pa// 'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das
185a4(mdo sde): pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med/ dpag tu med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa me da/ gzhal du ma da brjod du med pa na/ rgyal po drang srong tshangs pa'i lha zhes bya
185a5(mdo sde): ba dang / mas byin zhes bya ba gnyis byung ste/ de gnyis gnas shig na 'khod do// de dag dgon pa nas dgon par/ nags tshal nas nags tshal du/ gshong nas gshong du
185a6(mdo sde): nags thibs po nas nags thibs por 'gro zhing / bdag cag bud med dang lhan cig gnas par 'gyur na/ bdag cag 'dod chags kyi rgyu las byung ba'i bslab pa las 'gal
185a7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ yongs su bzung ba dang bcas pa dang lhan cig tu 'grogs na yang bdag cag gnod sems kyi rgyu las byung ba'i bslab pa las 'gal bar 'gyur/ yongs su bzung ba dang bcas
185b1(mdo sde): pa'am/ yongs su bzung ba la nyes par mi lta ba dang lhan cig 'grogs par gyur na yang / bdag cag gti mug gi rgyu las byung ba'i bslab pa las 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes/ de lta bu'i nyes
185b2(mdo sde): pa rnams mthong nas/ dgon pa nas dgon par/ nags tshal nas nags tshal/ gshong nas gshod/ nags thibs po nas nags thibs por rgyu'o// 'jam dpal de'i dus na
185b3(mdo sde): rgyal po sde mi pham pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de rgyal por dbang bskur ba'i tshe/ khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba rnams rtswa dang / shing dang / tshul ci bder sprod du gnang ste/ rjes
185b4(mdo sde): su yi rang ngo zhes tshig de skad smras pas/ drang srong de gnyis kyang / rgyal po sde mi pham pa'i khams na gnas so// de'i tshe rgyal po snga mi pham pa la chom rkun nor 'phrog pas gnod pa'i
185b5(mdo sde): las byas te bros pa dang / drang srong de dag gis chom rkun bros pa mthong ngo // chom rkun de dag gis kyang / drang srong nags kyi nang na gnas par mthong nas/ chom rkun de dag gis thal mo
185b6(mdo sde): sbyar te/ 'di skad ces smras so// drang srong khyod la bdag cag mthong ngam zhes la la zhig gis dris na/ khyod kyis ma ston cig/ de nas drang srong tshangs pa'i lhas/ drang srong mes
185b7(mdo sde): byin la smras pa/ kye ma'o mes byin byung ba de ni shin tu dka' na ji ltar bya/ gal te 'di ma mthong ngo zhes smras na/ gzhan du smras par 'gyur/ ji lta ba bstan na ni gnod par byas par
186a1(mdo sde): yang 'gyur na/ 'di ji ltar bya khyod smros shog/ de skad ces smras pa dang / drang srong mes byin gyis/ drang srong tshangs pa'i lha la 'di skad ces smras so//
186a2(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i lha/ 'di la gnod par 'gyur bar ma 'dzin cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshangs pa'i lha gang la la dag lus dang srog la lta ba dang bcas par gnas pa de dag ni/ yongs su
186a3(mdo sde): zag pa byung ba byung ba rnams kyis sems zin nas 'dug go/ / tshangs pa'i lha 'di lta ste dper na/ gos snum can la rdul reg na chags par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i lha gang
186a4(mdo sde): dag kha cig lus dang srog la lta ba dang bcas par gnas pa de dag ni/ yongs su zag pa byung ba byung ba rnams kyis sems kun zin nas 'dug go// tshangs pa'i lha gang dag kha cig lus
186a5(mdo sde): dang srog la mi lta ba de dag la ni/ yongs su zag pa byung ba byung ba rnams kyis sems kun zin cing 'dug par mi 'gyur ro// tshangs pa'i lha 'di lta steng par na/ gos yongs su dag
186a6(mdo sde): pa la rdul gyis reg kyang / sprugs ma thag tu med par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i lha gang dag kha cig lus dang srog la mi lta ba de dag ni/ yongs su zag pa byung ba rnams kyis
186a7(mdo sde): sems kun zin cing gnas par mi 'gyur ro/ / de lta bas na tshangs pa'i lha bdag cag kyang lus dang srog la mi blta bar bya'o// tshangs pa'i lha gal te bdag cag lus dang srog la ma bltas
186b1(mdo sde): na/ bdag cag yongs su zag pa 'byung ba des sems zin nas gnas par mi 'gyur ro// kye tshangs pa'i lha/ lus dang srog la lta ba dang bcas pa'i brtul zhugs 'grub bo zhes
186b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bka' stsal to/ / de nas drang srong tshangs pa'i lha la drang srong mes byin gyis mi lta ba bstan pas lus dang srog la mi lta ba rnyed ngo // de nas rgyal
186b3(mdo sde): po sde mi pham pas chom rkun de dag tshol zhing nags stug po der phyin te/ rgyal po snga mi pham pas nags stug po'i nang na drang srong de dag gnas pa mthong ngo // mthong nas drang srong de dag ga la ba
186b4(mdo sde): der song ste/ mi kha cig nags stug po der chom rkun tshol du bkye'o// de nas rgyal po sde mi pham pas drang srong de dag gi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/
186b5(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ rgyal po sde mi pham pas/ drang srong de gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so// drang srong khyed gnyis kyis chom rkun nags stug po 'di'i nang du 'ongs pa 'am/
186b6(mdo sde): phyir byung ba lta mthong ngam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / drang srong de gnyis kyis/ rgyal po snga mi pham pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po bdag cag gis bdag nyid kyang mi mthong na/
186b7(mdo sde): chom rkun lta ga la mthong / rgyal po sde mi pham pa dang / drang srong de dag gtam 'di byas pa dang / rgyal po'i mi de dag gis chom rkun de dag zin te/ de dag gis dngag zin nas/ rgyal po
187a1(mdo sde): sde mi pham pa ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas/ 'di skad ces smras so// chom rkun de dag bzung ste mchis pa 'di lags zhes byas so// de nas rgyal po sde mi pham pas
187a2(mdo sde): drang srong de gnyis kyis smras pa'i don khong du ma chud nas/ drang srong de gnyis la smras pa/ khyed ni brdzun zer ba yin te/ drang srong ma yin no zhes de dag gnyis kyi rkang pa dang lag pa gcod
187a3(mdo sde): du bcug go/ / 'on kyang drang srong de dag gis gzhan la gnod pa ma byas so// de nas yang drang srong mas byin rkang lag bcad pa dang / rgyal po sde mi pham pa la 'di skad ces smras so//
187a4(mdo sde): kye rgyal po khyod nyid la bdag kun tu btsal na/ rgyal po sde mi pham pa zhes bya ba'i rgyal po gang yin/ ci mig rgyal po sde mi pham pa 'am/ 'on te rgyal po sde mi pham pa mig las gzhan nam/
187a5(mdo sde): ci rgyal po snga mi pham pa de rna ba 'am/ sna'am/ lte ba ma/ lus sam/ yid dam/ 'on te rgyal po snga mi pham pa de rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang /
187a6(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa las gzhan nam zhes/ drang srong des bdag mi dmigs par bstan pa dang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rtog go// de nas rgyal po sde mi pham pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
187a7(mdo sde): brtags na/ bdag nyid ma dmigs so// don dam par bdag nyid ma dmigs pas/ 'gyod pa chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ nyes pa med pa'i drang srong gis bshad pa'i don ma
187b1(mdo sde): shes pas 'phral du sdig pa'i las byas pa des/ chos nyid de yang dag ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste 'gyod nas/ sa'i phyogs den 'gre
187b2(mdo sde): zhing ldog go/ / de nas drang srong mas byin de rgyal po sde mi pham pa 'gyod par rig nas 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po khyod ji ltar bdag nyid mi dmigs pa de bzhin du su'i rkang lag bcad
187b3(mdo sde): pa de'ang mi dmigs so/ / de nas rgyal po sde mi pham pa la drang srong mes byin gyis stong pa nyid bstan pas kun nas dkris pa de myur du bsal te/ chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid myur du
187b4(mdo sde): rtogs nas/ des de gnyis la ston par 'du shes bskyed do// drang srong de dag gis de la tshul khrims kyi gtam brjod do// rgyal po chen po tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i phyir
187b5(mdo sde): tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sems la smon pa 'grub ste/ rgyal po chen po tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i mthu la gzigs/ rgyal po chen po bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis
187b6(mdo sde): bskal pa brjod du med par yang yang sems ma rung bar byas par mi dran pa lta na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag cag gnyis kyi lag pa g.yas pa snga ma bzhin du gyur cig ces
187b7(mdo sde): byas ma thag tu bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ de gnyis kyi lag pa g.yas pa snga ma bzhin du gyur to// rgyal po chen po bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bskal pa brjod du med par
188a1(mdo sde): lus kyi las ma rung bar byas pa mi dran pa lta na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des/ bdag cag gnyis kyi lag pa g.yon pa snga ma bzhin du gyur cig ces byas ma
188a2(mdo sde): thag tu/ bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ de gnyis kyi lag pa g.yon pa snga ma bzhin du gyur to// rgyal po chen po bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bskal pa brjod du med par 'tsho
188a3(mdo sde): pa ma rung bar byas pa mi dran pa lta na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des/ bdag cag gnyis kyi rkang pa snga ma bzhin du gyur cig ces byas pa dang / 'di ltar drang srong mes byin de'i bden
188a4(mdo sde): pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis drang srong de gnyis kyi rkang pa dang lag pa snga ma bzhin du gyur to/ / de nas rgyal po sde mi pham pas de gnyis kyis bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi rdzu 'phrul mthong nas
188a5(mdo sde): spu zing zhes byed par gyur to/ / des drang srong mas byin gyi bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs zos pas/ lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir
188a6(mdo sde): brtson par gyur to/ / de de na 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par gyur to// des de nyid nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na tshad mer pa'i sangs
188a7(mdo sde): rgyas bye ba khrag khrig mthong ste/ la la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog par 'tshang rgyal la ni bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor la la ni rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe
188b1(mdo sde): 'phrul rnam pa du mas sems can rnams la 'doms/ la la ni tshe'i 'du byed 'dor/ la la ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das
188b2(mdo sde): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi spun snga na drang srong mas byin rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed pa mthong ngo / / drang srong mas byin de rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa du mas/ sangs
188b3(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bstan pa sems can rnams la ston cing / bla na med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu brjod pa mthong ngo // de nas rgyal po sde mi
188b4(mdo sde): pham pas de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams dang sems can bye ba khra khrig du ma mthong ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i shugs rnams kyis ta la bdun srid tsam
188b5(mdo sde): du nam mkha' la ba phags te/ bar snang la 'dug nas/ drang srong mas byin de dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang ldan pa/ tshul khrims
188b6(mdo sde): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis mngon par bstod ngo / / ji ltar dri med ma long dkyil 'khor la// lus la mchis pa'i nyes dang yon tan gda'// de bzhin
188b7(mdo sde): tshul khrims yongs dag dge ba la/ / sems la mchis pa'i nyes dang yon tan gda'// 'dod bzhin 'bras bu 'byung ba'i shing chen ltar// bsams pa bzhin du 'bras bu kun kyang sbyin/
189a1(mdo sde): de bzhin tshul khrims phung po gtsang dag pas// bsams pa bzhin du 'bras bu kun kyang sbyin// ji ltar sa la rab tu las byas te// bsams pa bzhin du snod kyi rnam par
189a2(mdo sde): 'gyur/ / de bzhin tshul khrims phung po yongs sbyangs pas// bsams pa bzhin du yon tan thams cad sbyin// ji ltar yid bzhin nor bu byi dor bgyis// bsams pa bzhin du longs spyod sna tshog
189a3(mdo sde): sprin/ / de bzhin tshul khrims phung po byi dor bgyis// bsams pa bzhin du yon tan thams cad sbyin// rgyal sras rnams kyis thog mar spyad gsungs pa// tshul khrims yongs ngag thog
189a4(mdo sde): ma'i rkang pa ste/ / rgyal ba rnams ni dri mad rkang pa des// byang chub zhi pa'i mchog rnams yang dag sgrub// ji ltar shing rgyal n+ya gro gzhon nu 'dir// sa gzhi mnyam par btsugs shing rab
189a5(mdo sde): bskyed na/ / yal ga byung zhing mngon par rab tu skyes// me tog 'bras bur ldan zhing khyad par 'dzin// de bzhin tshul khrims phung por su gnas pa// rgyal ba'i sras de yon tan rnams
189a6(mdo sde): kyis te/ / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'dir reg nas// 'gro ba sdug bsngal rnams las thar byed 'gyur// tshul khrims ldan pas dpal dang gzi brjid rnyed// tshul khrims
189a7(mdo sde): ldan pa gzugs rab mdzad par 'gyur/ / tshul khrims dag la rgyal sras rtag dga' ba// rnyed par dka' ba'i chos kyang rab tu rnyed// spyod pa yongs dag tshul khrims kun spyod pa// dri med
189b1(mdo sde): khrims ldan drang srong mes byin 'di/ / sangs rgyas yon tan mnga' ba brgya dag gis// kun tu bstod pa mdzad par bdag gis mthong // tshul khrims yongs dag kun tu spyod pa la/
189b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas brgyas ni mngon par bstod gyur pa// ji ltar bdag gi slob dpon mas byin la// sangs rgyas brgya yis mngon par bstod pa ltar// de bzhin tshul khrims gzi brjid ldan pa bdag/
189b3(mdo sde): legs par spyad pa brgya yis mngon par bstod// skyes nas bdag gi khrims stobs gdung med de// rims nad btab pa gso ba byas pa bzhin// dri med tshul khrims gnas pas bdag gis kyang //
189b4(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bzhugs pa'i bde bar gshegs// bye ba khrag khrig mang po rgyu ba dang // tshul khrims bsngags pa yongs su brjod pa mthong // dri med tshul khrims gnas pas bdag
189b5(mdo sde): gis kyang / / bde gshegs bye ba khrag khrig mang po rnams// bla med byang chub rim par sangs rgyas te// bdud rnams bye ba khrag khrig btul ba mthong // dri med tshul khrims gnas pas/
189b6(mdo sde): bdag gis kyang // bde gshegs bye ba khrag khrig mang po rnams// dgra bcom bstod cing mtshungs med 'khor lo mchog/ 'gro la phan phyir rgyal bas bskor ba mthong // dri med tshul khrims
189b7(mdo sde): gnas pas bdag gis kyang / / bde gshegs bye ba khrag khrig mang po dag/ skye bo mun pas bsgribs shing mi mkhas pa// bde gshegs sdug bsngal brgya las 'grel ba mthong // dri med
190a1(mdo sde): tshul khrims gnas pas bdag gis kyang / / bde gshegs bye ba khrag khrig mang po rnams// sems can khrag khrig btul te mdzad pa mdzad// bde gshegs dang bas
190a2(mdo sde): bsgral phyir bzhugs pa mthong / / dri med tshul khrims gnas pas bdag gis kyang // bde gshegs bye ba khrag khrig mang po rnams// 'gro ba'i don chen mdzad pa mdzad nas su// yang 'byung
190a3(mdo sde): med par mya ngan 'da' ba mthong / / dri med tshul khrims gnas pas bdag gis kyang // bde gshegs bye ba khrag khrig mang po rnams// mya ngan 'das nas ring bsrel rab rgyas shing // skye bo bde bas
190a4(mdo sde): mngon du tshim mdzad mthong / / de ring slob dpon khyod kyi gsung thos nas// bdag gi mig kyang bsam mi khyab par dag/ de phyir phyogs bcu dag gi rgyal ba rnams// sgrib pa med pa'i mig gi stobs
190a5(mdo sde): kyis mthong / / bdag gi mtshungs med tshul khrims yongs dag pas// de las bdag gi sgrib me mig 'di skyes// tshul khrims phung po yongs su sbyangs pa las// sgrib pa med pa'i mig
190a6(mdo sde): ni bdag gis thob/ / 'di ltar thal sbyar slob dpon mchog khyod la// gang gi mthu che ba ni de 'dra ba// de la thal mo sngon sbyar phyag 'tshal zhing // mtshungs med rdul bral byang chub reg par 'gro//
190a7(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po snga mi pham pas// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shug de rnyed pas// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis rab tu bsngags par gyur to// tshul
190b1(mdo sde): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs de rnyed pas/ phyogs bcu mun pa med par gyur to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang mthong ste/ gang
190b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang len cing 'dzin to/ / de tshun chad nams kyang dran pa nyams par ma gyur te/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i bar du dus
190b3(mdo sde): thams cad du'ang thos pa 'dzin par gyur to/ / de la chos kyi sgo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa mngon du gyur te/ 'di ltar sgrib pa med pa'i chos la bzod pa khong du chud cing sems la
190b4(mdo sde): kun nas dkris pa med pas/ gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der skyes ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
190b5(mdo sde): bdas de dag dang lhan cig tu smra zhing gtam zer te/ 'di ltar mun pa med pa'i lus dang ldan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bod cing yang dag par mgu bar bya ba yin no//
190b6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong mas byin zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o//
190b7(mdo sde): ngo ci'i phyir zher/ de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i spyan de/ de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong mas byin zhes bya bar gyur to// 'jam dpal 'di ji sam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus narba
191a1(mdo sde): srong tshangs pa'i lha zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs
191a2(mdo sde): pa spyan mchog de de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong tshangs pa'i lha zhes bya bar gyur to/ / 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po sde mi pham pa zhes bya ba gang tshul khrims yongs
191a3(mdo sde): su dag pa thos ma thag tu kun nas dkris pa gsal bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/ bajam dpal khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa don
191a4(mdo sde): thams cad grub pa de/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po snga mi pham pa zhes bya bar gyur to// 'jam dpal de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrims ma nyams par bya'o//
191a5(mdo sde): tshul khrims la skyon med pa dang / tshul khrims shin tu bsdams pa dang / tshul khrims ma 'dres pa dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag pa dang / tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang
191a6(mdo sde): tshul khrims rdzogs par byas te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la chags par mi bya/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchog tu 'dzin par mi bya'o// de ltar
191a7(mdo sde): tshul khrims yongs su dag pa la sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa mngon du 'gyur ro/ / sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa mngon du gyur pas
191b1(mdo sde): ji ltar bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa yongs su dag par 'gyur snyam sems la mi bya ste/ 'on kyang sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa mngon du gyur na/ bsgrim mi dgos par sangs
191b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa yongs su
191b3(mdo sde): dag par 'gyur ro/ / 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag na/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te tshul khrims
191b4(mdo sde): la mchog tu 'dzin pa med na/ de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ de ltar mchog tu 'dzin pa gang gis kyang / tshul khrims la mchog tu 'dzin pa med do//
191b5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dpag tu med pa nas/ brjod du med pa'i bar du de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ mi 'chi ba kun tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i bskal pa byung ste//
191b6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal mi 'chi ba kun tu 'phags pa'i bskal pa de la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/
191b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //
192a1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong mi 'khrugs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir drang srong de mi 'khrugs pa'i blo gros zhes bya zhe na// 'jam
192a2(mdo sde): dpal sngon byung ba bskal pa mi 'chi ba kun tu 'phags pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ bskal pa grangs med brjod du med pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan pa zhes
192a3(mdo sde): bya ba byung ste/ de'i tshe'i tshad ni dpag tu med de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med cing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan no// yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
192a4(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na blo gros 'bar ba zhes bya ba/ bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu sangs rgyas khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams la dag
192a5(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa zhig yod de/ blo gros 'bar ba bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu de la mi phyed pa'i g.yog sangs rgyas khrag khrig dpag tu med pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i bram ze
192a6(mdo sde): khrag khrig brgyad cu yod do/ / yang 'jam dpal blo gros 'bar ba bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu des/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan pa de la/
192a7(mdo sde): lo bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcur mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings zhes gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das
192b1(mdo sde): mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings de gang lags ci'i slad du mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings zhes bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rgyal ba dang
192b2(mdo sde): ldan pas/ blo gros 'bar ba bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// blo gros 'bar ba mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings
192b3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba de ni/ 'dus ma byas pa'i dbyings kyi tshig bla dgas so// blo gros 'bar ba ci'i phyir dbyings de mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings zhes bya zhe na/ blo gros 'bar ba 'dus ma byas pa'i dbying
192b4(mdo sde): ni sogs pa yang med/ bri ba yang med/ len pa yang med/ 'god pa yang med/ zad pa yang med/ 'gog pa yang med/ 'grib pa yang med/ 'phel ba yang med/ rigs
192b5(mdo sde): kyang ma yin/ rigs med pa yang ma yin/ 'gyur ba yang ma yin/ 'dzin pa yang ma yin/ 'dor ba yang ma yin/ gzung ba yang ma yin/ gtong ba yang ma yin/ phra ba yang ma yin/
192b6(mdo sde): zab pa yang ma yin/ mun pa yang ma yin/ snang ba yang ma yin/ nyin par yang ma yin/ mtshan mo yang ma yin/ ring po yang ma yin/ thung ngu yang ma yin/ nye ba yang ma yin/ ring
192b7(mdo sde): ba yang ma yin/ yangs pa yang ma yin/ dog pa yang ma yin/ gcig pu yang ma yin/ thun mong yang ma yin/ gzugs kyang ma yin/ snga ba yang ma yin/ 'phyi ba yang ma yin/
193a1(mdo sde): 'gro ba yang ma yin/ 'ong ba yang ma yin/ 'pho ba yang ma yin/ mi 'pho ba yang ma yin/ 'chi 'pho ba yang ma yin/ skye ba yang ma yin/ de ltar 'dus
193a2(mdo sde): ma byas pa'i dbyings de ni mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya'o/ / de'i phyir de'i ming mi 'khrugs pa'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur to// drang srong mi 'khrugs pa'i blo gros des de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
193a3(mdo sde): par snang mdzad de la yang mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings kun dris so/ / de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des/ lo bye ba khrag khrig drug cu'i
193a4(mdo sde): bar du mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings de bstan pa bshad do/ / des mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings pos ma thag tu/ 'di lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs rnyed de/ de lta bu'i dge
193a5(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs kyis nam mkha' la ta la bdun srid du 'phags nas/ drang srong mi 'khrugs pa'i blo gros de bar snang la 'dug ste/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa
193a6(mdo sde): rnams bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa mthong ngo / / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa yang /
193a7(mdo sde): mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i 'khor re ren yang byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig dpag tu med pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / yongs su
193b1(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings la gnas pa dud/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig tshad
193b2(mdo sde): med pa rnams mthong ngo / / de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i chos ston pa re re la yang byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
193b3(mdo sde): pa dang / yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings la gnas pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang / nges pa'i stobs bskyed pa la zhug pa dang / nges pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i rjes su 'jug pa
193b4(mdo sde): mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de la/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bsngo/
193b5(mdo sde): / bde gshegs chos tshul bzhin du thos nas su// mi mchog bdag gis bzod pa zhi ba rnyed/ bgyid po gang yang ma mchis bgyid ma mchis// chos nyid dag la gnas par the tsom bral//
193b6(mdo sde): bdag gis 'jig rten rig khyad gsung thos nas// chos 'di thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings 'drar 'tshal// bdag gis ring nas stor rnyed mthun bgyis te// gter tshan ji ltar yun ring
193b7(mdo sde): stor ba bzhin/ / deng bdag bzod pa'i shugs ni rgya chen skyes// chos kyi tshul ni yang dag ji bzhin 'tshal// de ring bdag gi the tsom dogs kun spangs// 'jig rten mkhyen pa khrag
194a1(mdo sde): khrig mtha' yas mthong / / ji ltar bya rnams sgong 'khrugs nas ni// sgo nga'i steng ngam zhabs su mchus brtol te// rang gis sgo bcag nas byung ba bzhin//
194a2(mdo sde): bde gshegs khyod gsung thos nas bdag kyang byung // bdag gis ji ltar 'dod pa'i sa kun por// 'jig rten mkhyen pa khrag khrig mtha' yal mthong // rgyal ba bye ba mtha' yas
194a3(mdo sde): bzod stobs ldan/ / bde gshegs ye shes mnga' bas bdag lung bstan// bde gshegs mtha' yas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na// rgyal sras lung bstan de dag de bzhin
194a4(mdo sde): bstod/ / bzod stobs rnyed pas seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa// nam mkha'i bya lam 'dir mchis bdag gis mthong // nam mkha' 'di la mchis nas bdag gis kyang // rgyal ba
194a5(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa mtha' yas kyis/ / bzod thob sras la bde gshegs rang byung 'gyur// skye bo bdud zhags 'grol zhes lung bstan mthong // nam mkha' bya lam 'dir mchis
194a6(mdo sde): bdag gis kyang / / bde gshegs bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas rnams// dgra yi tshogs bcom kun mkhyen legs 'chang sras// 'gro mgon zil mi non 'gyur lung ston
194a7(mdo sde): mthong / / bdag gis rgyal sras spyad pa spyod pa dag/ 'gro phan byang chub rdul med btsal slad du// rgyal srid rin chen mgo mig gtong ba dang // mthu rnyed brtan pa thub pa'i khu
194b1(mdo sde): khyer mthong / / rgyal sras dga' ldan gnas nas shi 'phos te// lha yi bu mo brgya yis glu blangs shing // bkra shis bcas pa'i dbyangs kyis mngon bstod nas// rgyal
194b2(mdo sde): rigs drang srong bram ze rigs skye mthong / / bdag gis rgyal sras zla bcu mngal gnas pa// lha yi gnas na lha yi bu bzhin du// snying rjes chos sngon lha rnams rab tu 'dul// mngal/
194b3(mdo sde): na gnas pa mi yis mngon mchod mthong // bdag gis rgyal sras yum gyi lhums nas su// lha rnams kyis kyang mngon par mchod cing byung // sems dge bas na mi gtsang rdul mi chags//
194b4(mdo sde): rin chen nyes pas mi gos bzhin du mthong // bdag gis rgyal sras rgyal rigs rin chen bdun// brgya phrag bcu po bu yi tshogs rnams dang // rta dang glang pos gang ba'i sa spangs te//
194b5(mdo sde): bdud kyi zhags bcad mngon par byung ba mthong // bdag gis rgyal sras 'gro la sman slad du// khrag khrig bdud rnams zil mnan byang chub reg/ nyon mongs ring bsags rnam
194b6(mdo sde): mang dpa' bos spangs/ / bde gshegs nyi ma bzhin du lhan pa mthong // bdag gis rgyal sras rang gi nyon mongs thul// mtshungs med dam pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// lha
194b7(mdo sde): mi sems can khrag khrig rnams btul zhing / / zad mthar 'gro ba lan gsum bskor ba mthong // bdag gis rgyal ba stong phrag mtha' yas pa// rgyal ba'i zhing rnams rma zhing sems
195a1(mdo sde): can 'dul/ / 'gro la sman slad 'gro ba stong par ston// pad+ma nyi bzhin sems can sad mdzad mthong // bdag gis rgyal ba stong phrag mtha' yas pa// sem
195a2(mdo sde): can btul nas sangs rgyas mdzad pa mdzad/ / lce stong byung ba'i mchil ma mis bor bzhin// de bzhin bde gshegs tshogs gnas 'dor ba mthong // bdag gis sangs rgyas stong
195a3(mdo sde): phrag mtha' yas pa/ / zhi bar 'gro ba ma la chus btab bzhin// 'gro ba sdug bsngal khur skyo mya ngan 'das// stobs bcu nyon mongs kun spangs 'das pa mthong // bdag gis
195a4(mdo sde): rgyal ba stong phrag mtha' yas pa/ / 'gro la sman don mdzad cing sku gdung phral// mya ngan 'das kyang skye bo mya ngan zlo// mya ngan 'das kyang bstan pa brjod pa mthong // de ltar 'gro la
195a5(mdo sde): sman slad skyabs su mchi/ / dge ba bsags pa 'di yis sangs rgyas gyur// bdag nyid grol nas sems can khrag khrig dgrol// mgon med bdud zhags bcings pa zhi bar bgyi//
195a6(mdo sde): de nas drang srong mi 'khrugs pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de la/
195a7(mdo sde): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshogs su bcad pa rnams kyis mngon par bstod nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des byang chub sems dpa'i spyang ba spyod pa na/ bskal pa brjod du
195b1(mdo sde): med par nams kyang gti mug par ma gyur/ nams kyang 'dod pa ma spyad/ nams kyang bud med kyi dbang du ma gyur/ nams kyang bdud kyi spyod yul la ma spyad/ nams kyang mngal
195b2(mdo sde): gyi gnas su ma zhugs/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rdzus te skyes/ nams kyang bdud kyi las kyis ma bsgribs/ nams kyang bdud kyi las kyi dbang du 'gro bar ma gyur/ nams kyang
195b3(mdo sde): byang chub kyi sems dang bral bar ma gyur/ nams kyang 'khor bas skyo ba'i sems ma bskyed/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa rnams kyang phan pa med pa'i sems
195b4(mdo sde): ma bskyed do/ / bskal pa brjod du med par rnams kyang sangs rgyas dang bral ba'i yid la byed pa ma bskyed/ nams kyang chags pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa ma bskyed/ bskal pa
195b5(mdo sde): brjod du med par nams kyang skye ba dang ldan pa'i sems ma bskyed/ nams kyang yang 'byung ba ma btsal// nams kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang bral bar ma gyur
195b6(mdo sde): nams kyang dman pa'i sems dang ldan par ma gyur/ nams kyang thams cad mkhyen pa yid la byed pa dang bral bar ma gyur/ nams kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral bar ma gyur//
195b7(mdo sde): nams kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs par ma gyur/ nams kyang dag pa'i bshes gnyen dang mi ldan par ma gyur/ nams kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la dngos por
196a1(mdo sde): ma dmigs/ des nams kyang 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams tha dad par ma bsams/ des rnams kyang dus gsum mnyam pa las lam log par
196a2(mdo sde): ma bstan/ des nams kyang dus gsum la dmigs par ma gyur to// 'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong mi 'khrugs pa'i blo gros zhes bya
196a3(mdo sde): bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de/ de'i tshe de'i
196a4(mdo sde): dus na drang srong mi 'khrugs pa'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur te/ de sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la spyad pas/ ji ltar ngas brjod pa bzhin du de tsam du rgya cher sangs rgyas kyi zhing
196a5(mdo sde): yongs su dag par byas so/ / 'jam dpal de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya cher yongs su sbyong bar 'dod pas/ sgrib pa med pa'i
196a6(mdo sde): rnam par thar pa'i phyir brtson pa mi 'dor ro/ / sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la mos par bya'o// yang 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de/ sngon byang chub
196a7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa rgya chen po mngon par 'dus byas so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
196b1(mdo sde): pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs dpag tu med cing rgya chen po bskyed do/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba grangs med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa nas
196b2(mdo sde): brjod du med pa'i bar du rgya chen po mngon par 'dus byas so/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/
196b3(mdo sde): gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa rgya chen po bskyed do// 'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dpag tu med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshus
196b4(mdo sde): pa med/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa na rin chen 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la de bzhin gshegs pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig
196b5(mdo sde): rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzang po'i lha zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste
196b6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lha de'i tshe tshad nI/ bskal pa khrug khrig brgyan nur gyur to// 'jam dpal po'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po
196b7(mdo sde): lha de'i gsung rab la dge slong mos pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ shin tu rtogs pa dang ldan pa/ shin tu blo gros dang ldan pa/ shin tu dran pa dang ldan pa/ shin tu
197a1(mdo sde): brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/ shin tu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs bskyed pa rnyed pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ rgyal po
197a2(mdo sde): rigs las rab tu byung ste/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lha de ma gtogs par sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na
197a3(mdo sde): mos pa'i blo gros ji tsam du mdzes pa de tsam gyis mdzes pa'i sems can su yang med de/ blta bas chog mi shes pa/ sangs rgyas khrag khrig dpag tu med pa la bsnyen bkur
197a4(mdo sde): byas pa/ yongs su sbyang ba byas pa/ tshad med pa'i chos nyid las nges par byung ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bzhi rnyed de/ 'dod pa bzhin rnyed cing / nyon mongs pa
197a5(mdo sde): med par rnyed/ tshegs med par rnyed nas/ 'dris par byas te re zhig ni de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar sems mi 'jug go/
197a6(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i pha rol tu son pas 'dod na sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa rnams su 'gro'o// de nas dge slong mos pa'i blo gros de/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
197a7(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzang po'i lha ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lha'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan gsum bskor
197b1(mdo sde): ba byas te/ thal mo sbyar nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / dge slong mos pa'i blo gros des/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lha nga
197b2(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das gzings chen po bca' bar 'tshal ba dang / zam pa chen po gdags par 'tshal ba dang / 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las brgal bar
197b3(mdo sde): 'tshal ba dang / sems can thams cad bsgral bar 'tshal ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad ma mchis pa yongs su sbyang bar 'tshal ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing grags ma
197b4(mdo sde): mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa ma mchis/ gzhal du ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa yongs su sbyang bar 'tshal ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas
197b5(mdo sde): pa yongs su dag pa bsgrub par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang la brtson par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa bzang
197b6(mdo sde): po'i lhas/ dge slong mos pa'i blo gros de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong de dag dang yon tan tshad med pa/ gzhan yang bsgrub par 'dod pa'i byang
197b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa khong du chud par bya ba'i brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ / mtshan mor 'du shes yid la mi byed pa dang / nyin par
198a1(mdo sde): 'du shes pa dang / grang bar 'du shes pa dang / dro bar 'du shes pa dang / bkres par 'du shes pa dang / zas su 'du shes pa dang / skom du 'du shes pa dang /
198a2(mdo sde): btung bar 'du shes pa dang / gos su 'du shes pa yid la mi byed pa dang / stobs su 'du shes pa yid la mi byed cing 'du shes thams cad yid la mi byed par sgrib pa med pa'i
198a3(mdo sde): rnam par thar pa mngon du byas te brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ / sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa de khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ des brtson 'grus brtsams nas//
198a4(mdo sde): sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa mngon du 'gyur ro// sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med
198a5(mdo sde): pa rnams yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i bar du yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// de nas dge slong mos pa'i blo gros de
198a6(mdo sde): la/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po 'i lha des de bzhin du bstan cing gdams nas/ des 'du shes thams cad yid la ma byas te/ sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa rtogs par
198a7(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir/ bskal pa khrag khrig brgyad kyi bar du brtson 'grus brtsams nas spyod do// de nas bskal pa khrag khrig brgyad 'das pa dang de sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la rab tu
198b1(mdo sde): gnas par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang bcus nges par byung ste/ des sprul pa khrag khrig tshad med pa mngon par sprul nas/ lnga la dad pa rnams
198b2(mdo sde): la lhar mngon par sprul/ klu la dad pa rnams la kluraganod sbyin la dad pa rnams la gnod sbyin du/ dri za la dad pa rnams la dri zar
198b3(mdo sde): grul bum la dad pa rnams la grul bum du/ lha ma yin la dad pa rnams la lha ma yin du/ nam mkha' lding la dad pa rnams la nam mkha' lding du/ mi 'am ci la dad pa
198b4(mdo sde): rnams la mi 'am cing/ lto 'phye chen po la dad pa rnams la lte 'phye chen por mngon par sprul to// de ltar dge slong mos pa'i blo gros des/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sem
198b5(mdo sde): can sprul pa ji lta bu la dad pa bzhin du rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par sprul te/ des der sems can tshad med pa yongs su smin par byed pa'i sbyor bas/ myur du brtson 'grus
198b6(mdo sde): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzang po'i lha des/ dge slong mos pa'i
198b7(mdo sde): blo gros de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mkhyen nas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar byas/
199a1(mdo sde): yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par rab tu mgu bar byas nas/ de'i tshe brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsngags so// de bzhin
199a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa bzang po'i lha de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar byas/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs
199a3(mdo sde): bstod/ / yang dag par rab tu mgu bar byas nas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs 'di lta bu rnyed de/ de lta bu'i dag pa'i rtsa
199a4(mdo sde): ba'i shugs kyis nam mkha' la ta la bdun srid du 'phags te 'dug go/ / 'jam dpal de nas dge slong mos pa'i blo gros par snang la 'dug nas/ 'di
199a5(mdo sde): 'dru ba'i ye shes rnyed de/ gang gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa rnams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi sngon
199a6(mdo sde): gyi spyod pa shes/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes/ sems can de dag thams cad kyi sems dang spyod
199a7(mdo sde): pa shes so/ / des ye shes de rnyed nas/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la the tsom med cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sngon gyi spyod pa la'ang the
199b1(mdo sde): tsom med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lha de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis mngon par bstod do// stobs bcu
199b2(mdo sde): stobs 'chang stobs ldan pa/ / nor mang 'gyed cing sras rnams nor ldan mdzad// bde gshegs khyod kyi sras rnams nor mang rnyed// 'gro 'di shin tu sdug bsngal nor
199b3(mdo sde): ldan mdzad/ / bde gshegs khyod kyi nor rnams gtor cing bgos// rgyal ba khyod kyi sras mchog nor rnyed nas// dga' zhing 'gro la sman pa'i spyod mchog spyod//
199b4(mdo sde): rgyal mchog rgyal ba kun dang 'dra bar 'gyur// thub mchog khyod sras yon tan brgyas gtam pa// spyod pa nges pa mchog 'di rnams spyod la// skye bar nub cing rga shis
199b5(mdo sde): gtses pa dang / / 'gro ba sdug bsngal brgya ldan gzir ba rnams// sdug bsngal bdag med stong par rtogs pas na// shi 'phos 'gror mchis 'khor ba'i 'gror chag pa//
199b6(mdo sde): mthong nas 'gro ba sdug bsngal bder 'god ces// de dag snying rje rlabs chen rnyed par 'gyur// 'gro la sman sems snying rje skyes nas su// 'khor ba'i sred pa bcom yang
199b7(mdo sde): skye ba 'dzin/ / dge ba tshad med rnams kyang kun bsags shing // 'gro ba rnams la sman bde zhi bar bgyid// log pa'i lam mchis sems can stong rnams ni// stobs
200a1(mdo sde): bcus bstan pa'i lam mchog rnams su ste/ / zhi ba'i grong khyer 'khor zhi ba de dge bar// gang nas sngon gyi rang byung gshegs par 'god// de dag
200a2(mdo sde): gtong ba tshad med gtong ba ni/ / mgo lag mig bzang bu sdug de bzhin te// tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus ting nge 'dzin// thos dran mkhas shing mos dang stobs la
200a3(mdo sde): gnas/ / shing dbang drung du bdud sde bcas pa btul// dpe med ye shes go 'phang mchog der rnyed// rang byung sems can stong mang khrid nas su// mi 'chi 'byung zhi ba de
200a4(mdo sde): bzhi par gshegs/ / nam mkha' 'di la de ring bdag mchis nas// phyogs bcu'i phyogs bcu ma nor de bzhin gsung // rgyal sras rgyal ba'i yon tan spyod spyad la//
200a5(mdo sde): shin tu lung ston pa ni du ma mthong // de dag rang gi spyod thos dga' mgu ste// rab tu 'dzum dmul yid gnyis the tsom bral// thal mo sbyar te mngon par lus btud nas//
200a6(mdo sde): stobs bcu yon tan mnga' ba mkhas las bstod// de ring nam mkha' 'dir mchis bdag gis mthong // 'khor ba brgyar ni rgyal sras dge spyad na// dga' ldan lha yi nang
200a7(mdo sde): nas shi 'phos te/ / dri bral dpe med glang chen mchog gyur nas// lha yi gnas nas rab tu babs nas su// yum bde nyal ba'i lhums su zhugs pa la// lha rnams stong
200b1(mdo sde): gis shin tu rab mchod cing / / lha mi lha mo rnams kyis gtsor bgyis te// de dag yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa na// lha yi gnas 'dra rab tu mdzes par gyur// mngal
200b2(mdo sde): gyis mi gos chu las pad+ma ltar/ / yum la bde zhing yang bar gnas nas su// lha rnams brgya la rab tu chos bshad de// lha mchog 'khor rnams dge ba'i lam du btsud//
200b3(mdo sde): de dag chos tshig rgya chen thos nas su// skom pas chu la sa bzhin bdud rtsi 'thung // nam mkha'i ngos 'dir bdag mchis mthong ba ni// rgyal sras dri med blo gros dran mkhas
200b4(mdo sde): pa/ / yum gyi phyag gis shing gi yal ga gzung // mchan khung nas ni byung bar rab tu mthong // lha dang mi yi dbang pos rab mchod cing // sa yi stang na 'jigs med gom
200b5(mdo sde): pa 'dor/ / de yis thams cad phyogs su bltas nas su// 'dzum dmul tshig smras nga 'dra khams gsum med// nam mkha'i ngos 'dir bdag mchis mthong ba ni// rgyal
200b6(mdo sde): sras mang po 'gro la sman dga' ba/ / grong dang grong khyer rin chen bltam pa yi// rab tu 'byor cing ldan pa'i sa bor te// ba glang rmis pas bcings pa bcad pa lhur// rma
200b7(mdo sde): gros mchog gis khyim chags bsal bcom ste/ / 'gro la sman slad dpa' bo mngon par byung // sdug bsngal zhi zhing srid zad bdud rtsi tshol// nam mkha'i ngos 'dir bdag
201a1(mdo sde): mchis mthong ba ni/ / rgyal sras brtul zhugs dka' thub drag spyad de// skyil mo krung bcas byang chub shing dbang drung // g.yo can bdud btul byang chub
201a2(mdo sde): dam pa reg/ rgyal ba thams cad dang ni mnyam rnyed nas// zhing dga' bde gnas shing mchog lta bzhin du// smon lam rgya chen bdag gis 'dir rdzogs te// 'khor brgyar
201a3(mdo sde): legs spyad brtul zhugs 'dir grub bo/ / nam mkha'i ngos 'dir bdag bachis mthong ba ni// phyogs bcu'i stobs bcu shin tu mang po dag/ 'khor lo rgya chen rab tu bskor ba ni//
201a4(mdo sde): pha rol rgol 'dul 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal zhi// skal yod 'gro ba rnams kyi nyon mongs bcom// mun pa'i rdul bsal 'gro rnams bde ba sbyin// 'jig rten gtso bo rnams
201a5(mdo sde): kyis de thos nas/ / 'khor ba'i rgyud bsal ma song phyogs su song // de ring nam mkha' 'di la bdag mchis nas// rgyal ba brgya dag lU mi 'khor 'dul zhing // lha mi gnas
201a6(mdo sde): na 'gro la snying brtsa yid/ / 'jig rten dag na rab tu bzhugs par mthong // rgyal ba brgya phrag du ma gzhan dag kyang // 'khor ba zang song zhi ba rdul med gnas// lha mi brgya
201a7(mdo sde): rnams yid dgar gyur nas su/ / ring bsrel dam pa de la mchod pa mthong // 'jig rten gtso bo rkang gnyis mchog khyod la// lha dang mi dang khyim bdag khyod drung mchis// zhal
201b1(mdo sde): nas zhi rab chos kyi rang bzhin thos/ / khyod kyi spyod ldan myur du stabs su 'gro// mi dbang khyod kyi yon tan bstod// khyu mchog pan byed stobs bcu yon tan 'chang // zhi ba
201b2(mdo sde): ldan zhing dul ba zhi ba rnyed/ / 'khor ba'i rgyud bral 'jigs med phyogs su sngo// bde gshegs mi yi seng ge khyed kyi mthus// blo mchog bdag kyang steng gi nam mkhar gnas//
201b3(mdo sde): mngon shes lnga las nyams pa med rnyed nas// phyogs bcur 'khor rgyud rab 'byams rnams mang ba// mtshungs med du ma de ring mthong ba ni// rgyal ba'i yon tan sna tshogs dri med
201b4(mdo sde): spyod/ / yang dag yon tan gyis ni de dag bstod// rgyal ba khyod kyi yon tan mtha' mi rnyed// de nas dge slong mos pa'i blo gros des de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i
201b5(mdo sde): lha de la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis bstod nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des phyin chad bskal pa brjod du med par nams kyang mngon par shes pa lnga dang bral bar
201b6(mdo sde): ma gyur te/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad na sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rjel
201b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten stongs par byas/ lha ma yin gyi ris thams cad yongs su chad cing mi khom pa thams cad rgyun chad par gyur to// de smon lam gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der
202a1(mdo sde): yang dang yang skyes nas sems can rnams kyis sangs rgyas thog mar byung ba bzhin du shin tu ngo mtshar du shes te/ gang dang gang du skye bar gyur pa de dang der gang de
202a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa byung ba de na lhas byung ba de dag de skye ba'i lhas su byung ngo / / de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba na/ lhas gang byung ba de dag kyang de mngon par
202a3(mdo sde): shes pa lnga thob nas byung ngo / / de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/ ltas gang byung ba de dag des mngon par shes pa lnga bshad pa'i tshe'ang ltas de dag byung ngo //
202a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa che'i 'du byed 'dor ba'i tshe ltas gang byung ba de tshe'i 'du byed 'dor ba'i tshe yang ltas de dag byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshe//
202a5(mdo sde): ltas gang byung ba de 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na yang ltas de dag byung ngo // des tshe rabs re re la yang sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa theg pa chen po la btul/ sems
202a6(mdo sde): can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la btul lo/ / re zhig ni byang chub sem dpa' des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog par sangs rgyas te/ sangs rgyas kyi
202a7(mdo sde): bya ba de lta bu dag sems can rnams la bstan to/ / 'jam dpal de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong mos pa'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du yid gnyis
202b1(mdo sde): dang the tsom za na/ 'jam dpal khrod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong mongs pa pa sgo/
202b2(mdo sde): gros zhes bya bar gyur to// 'jam dpal de lta bas na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par sgrub pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge slong mos pa'i blo/
202b3(mdo sde): gros de brtson 'grus kyi stobs gang dang ldan par gyur pa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs de lta bu dang ldan par bya'o// brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
202b4(mdo sde): chen po ni/ tshegs chung ngus sems mnyam par gzhog par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni//
202b5(mdo sde): dbang po'i don las sems slar sdud de dbang po'i don mi dmigs shing dbang po'i don ni dbang po'i don gyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong par mthong / dbang po'i don dang dbang po'i mtshan ma yang
202b6(mdo sde): mi dmigs gang gis dbang po'i mtshan mar dmigs pa na yang mi dmigs so/ / 'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa tshad med
202b7(mdo sde): grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ bdud rtsi snying po zhes bya ba'i bskal pa byung
203a1(mdo sde): ste/ 'jam dpal bdud rtsi'i snying po'i bskal pa de la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten
203a2(mdo sde): mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mtha' yas rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //
203a3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas rnam par gnon pa de 'byung ba de'i tshe/ thams cad kyi thams cad du 'phags pa'i bden pa dang bral ba'i sgra ma byung ngo // gang sems
203a4(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi sgra de yang sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas rnam par
203a5(mdo sde): gnon pa de'i rim gro byed pa dge slong snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ don shes/ chos shes/ dus shes/ chod shes/ bdag shes 'khor shes/ gang zag
203a6(mdo sde): rab dang tha ma shes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas rnam par gnon pa la/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu'i bar du yid du 'ong bas bsnyen bkur byas te/ yid du
203a7(mdo sde): mi 'ong bas ma yin no/ / des bshad pa rnams kyang bzung ste/ bdag gi don kyang mi gtong ngo // des bskal pa dgu bcu po de dag gi bar du 'dod pa'i 'du shes ma bskyed/ gnod
203b1(mdo sde): sems kyi 'du shes ma bskyed/ rnam par 'tshe ba'i 'du shes ma bskyed srog dang ldan pa dang / gang zag dang ldan pa'i rtog pa ma bskyed/ dngos po dang ldan pa yang ma yin
203b2(mdo sde): chos dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa yang ma bskyed/ gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa yang ma yin//
203b3(mdo sde): rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa yang ma yin/ nye du la rtog pa yang ma yin/ nye du ma yin pa la rtog pa yang ma yin/ shes pa la rtog pa yang ma yin/ mi shes pa la rtog
203b4(mdo sde): pa yang ma yin/ / ljongs la rtog pa yang ma yin/ mi dga' bar rtog pa'ang ma bskyed/ sems can dang ldan pa'i rtog pa'ang ma bskyed/ srog dang ldan pa yang ma yin//
203b5(mdo sde): gang zag dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ dngos po dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ chos dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mtshan ma dang ldan pa yang
203b6(mdo sde): ma yin/ mtshan ma med pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ smon lam dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ smon lam ma yin pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ 'khor ba dang ldan pa yang ma yin/
203b7(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ ye shes dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ ye shes ma yin pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ sangs
204a1(mdo sde): rgyas ma yin pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ nyan thos dang ldan
204a2(mdo sde): pa yang ma yin/ nyan thos ma yin pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo ma yin pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ rnam par rtog pa
204a3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ rnam par rtog pa med pa yang ma yin pa dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa yang ma bskyed de/ 'du shes thams cad dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms
204a4(mdo sde): rtog pa dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la nams kyang bsnyen bkur ma byas par ma gyur to// sangs rgyas bye ba
204a5(mdo sde): k hrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa la bsnyen bkur byas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de thams cad la des g.yog dang bsnyen bkur byas pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi ting
204a6(mdo sde): nge 'dzin la bstan cing bsgoms te/ mang du byas pas/ de phyin chad bskal pa brjod du med pa'i bar du sangs rgyas med pa'i zhing du nams kyang ma skyes/ nams kyang zhing
204a7(mdo sde): du 'du shes dang / sangs rgyas su 'du shes kyang ma skyes/ nams kyang byang chub kyi sems rtag tu mi 'byung bar ma gyur/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
204b1(mdo sde): rnams la bsnyen bkur dang g.yog byas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cang du sprul pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas/ gang dang gang du sprul pa sprul pa de dang de na sems
204b2(mdo sde): can rnams kyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba snyam du shes te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa du mas sems can de dag la ston to// gang dang gang du sprul pa sprul pa de dang der sems can ji
204b3(mdo sde): lta bu la mos pa de lta bur sprul pa sprul te/ 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi rgyu dang sbyar te/ rnam par 'dul ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sprul pa rnam pa du mar sprul to//
204b4(mdo sde): sprul pa de dag gis kyang gzhan yang sprul te bstan to// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa mngon par sprul te/ sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa de dag gis kyang //
204b5(mdo sde): sprul pa gzhan mngon du sprul pa de bzhin du/ 'jam dpal dge slong snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis kyang sprul pa mngon par sprul te/ sprul pa de dag gis kyang gzhan mngon par
204b6(mdo sde): sprul to/ / 'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/ 'jam dpal
204b7(mdo sde): khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya bar gyur to// 'jam
