266b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi 'chang zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / / de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi grags pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung po//
266b2(mdo sde): de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ji ma med pa'i spyan zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi
266b3(mdo sde): ldog pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / / de'i pha rol gyi long ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i mig ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang chas
266b4(mdo sde): pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dri mchog rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dri mchog dpal zhes bya ba 'jig
266b5(mdo sde): rten du byung ngo / / de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin
266b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa blo gros spos zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / / de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ut+pa la'i spyan zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol
266b7(mdo sde): gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas snang ba'i spyan zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra thams
267a1(mdo sde): cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / / de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i ri rgyal brgyan pa zhes
267a2(mdo sde): bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / / de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i tog ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/
267a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pas skyabs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ bskal pa gcig la sangs rgyas drug khri 'jig rten du byung ste/ de dag
267a4(mdo sde): gi thog mar ni 'od byed ces bya/ / tha mar ni de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bzhi
267a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten du byung ngo / / de dag gi thog mar ni de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de dag gi tha mar ni de bzhin gshegs pa spyan rig ces bya ba 'jig rten
267a6(mdo sde): du byung ngo / / de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ bskal pa gcig la sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu byung ste/ de dag gi thog mar ni de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba spyad ces bya ba 'jig
267a7(mdo sde): rten du byung ngo / / tha mar ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'byed pas rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
267b1(mdo sde): dga' mchog ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / / de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mchog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na grags sbyin zhes bya ba dang / dpa' mkhas zhes bya ba dang / tshangs
267b2(mdo sde): pa'i mig ces bya ba dang / tsan dan zhes bya ba dang / rab mdzes zhes bya ba dang / seng ge 'dzin ces bya ba dang / kun nas mdzes zhes bya ba dang / spobs pa mtha' yas
267b3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba dang / blo gros mi zhen ces bya ba dang / des pa zhes bya ba dang / 'grogs na bde zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shing 'grogs na bde
267b4(mdo sde): ba yon tan 'bum phrag mang po dang ldan pa bcu gcig tshangs par spyad pa spyod do/ / de'i tshe na yang bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu nyi mas byin zhes bya ba mkhas shing/
267b5(mdo sde): yid rno ba shes rab kyi rang bzhin can zhig yod de/ de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu nyi mas byin grogs bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig tu
267b6(mdo sde): rin chen ldan zhes bya ba'i grong khyer chen po nas/ phyi rol du 'khyam pa'i phyir byung nas dong ste/ de dag dga' ba sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i tshal ga la ba der phyin to// de'i tshe dga' ba sna
267b7(mdo sde): tshogs zhes bya ba'i tshal de na/ byang chub sems dpa' bcu gcig 'jig rten rnams kyi don la sems/ phan par sems/ bde bar sems shing 'khod pa bram ze'i rigs shing sla
268a1(mdo sde): la chen po lta bu nyi mas byin de/ dga' ba sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i tshal de na 'khyams pas/ dga' ba sna tshogs kyi tshal de na 'khod pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag
268a2(mdo sde): des shing 'grogs na bde la mi rgod/ ma khengs/ mi g.yeng / mu cor mi smra/ smra ba mi mang zhing / dran pa nye bar gzhag la/ shes rab can/ shes rab dang ldan
268a3(mdo sde): pa/ shin tu grims par gnas pa mthong ngo // mthong nas des dge pa'i rtsa ba bskyed cing / yun ring por shes rab yongs su bsgoms pa dang / 'phags pa'i rigs la bsten
268a4(mdo sde): pas skyes bu dam pa de dag las sems rab tu dang bar gyur to/ / de sems rab tu dang bas skyes bu dam pa bcu gcig po de dag ga la ba der bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta
268a5(mdo sde): bu'i bu g.yog rnams dang lhan cig tu dong ngo / / skyes bu dam pa grags byin des bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo // mthong nas
268a6(mdo sde): bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu de'i 'gro ba dang / ldog pa dang / lta ba dang / smyung ba dang / bskum pa'i spyod pa kun kyang tshangs par spyad pa yun ring du spyad pa'i spyod
268a7(mdo sde): yul bzhin te/ skyes bu dam pa 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi snod du 'gyur ro snyam du sems so// de nas rigs kyi bu grags byin gyis/ skyes bu dam pa
268b1(mdo sde): bcu gcig po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di ltar nyi mas byin skyes bu dam pa sangs rgyas kyi sras kyi tshul du 'gro ba/ bla na med pa sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam
268b2(mdo sde): kyi snod du gyur pa 'ong gis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di la skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis snying rje skyed la gdams pa dang / rjes su bskur pas ci nas rigs kyi bu 'di skye bo phal
268b3(mdo sde): tshe'i don byed cing / snang ba ston pa snang bar bya ba'i phyir legs par dgongs shig/ de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin skyes bu dam pa bcu gcig po de
268b4(mdo sde): dag gi drung du song nas 'di dag ni ston pa'o/ / 'di dag ni 'phags pa'o zhes skyes bu dam pa de dag la ston par 'du shes bskyed de/ des skyes bu dam pa de dag gi rkang pa la mgo bos
268b5(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'greng ngo / / de nas rigs kyi bu grags byin gyis bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin de la/ kye bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta
268b6(mdo sde): bu'i bu nyi mas byin khyod 'dug cig ces smras nas/ bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin skyes bu dam pa de dag la shin tu ri mo bskyed de/ 'dug pa ni 'di lta ste
268b7(mdo sde): dper na rigs kyi mna' ma gyos skyug gi mdun na 'dug pa bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de dag la ri mo skyes par gyur to/ / 'di lta ste/ dper na nad pa nad kyis btab ras yun rang ba
269a1(mdo sde): las sman pa mthong na/ dbugs byung ba de bzhin du/ bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin de yang rigs kyi bu de dag mthong ma thag tu
269a2(mdo sde): dbugs byung bar gyur to/ / 'di lta ste/ dper na bsad pa la thug pa'i mi gsang du bkri ba las/ don bya bar 'dod/ phan par 'dod/ bde bar 'dod pa'i mi la la zhig
269a3(mdo sde): byung ste/ des de bsad pa las thar par byas nas/ de mi de la 'di ni bdag gi skyabs/ bdag la snying brtse ba can no zhes de byas pa gze ba char skyes pa bzhin du/ bram
269a4(mdo sde): ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin yang / skyes bu dam pa de dag la bdag gi skyabs/ bdag la snying ba rtse ba can no zhes byas pa gzo ba skyes so// de nas
269a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu grags byin gyis/ bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin la smras pa/ nyi mas byin de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
269a6(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du byung ba rnyed par dka' 'o/ / 'di lta ste/ dper na su dum wa ra'i me tog brgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/
269a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang brgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ gang 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa
269b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal ba/ zab pa mthong bar dka' ba/ rtogs par dka' ba/ brtag tu med pa/ mu stegs can gzhan thams cad kyi rtog ge'i spyod pa ma yin pa
269b2(mdo sde): nyan thos rnams kyis ma chud pa/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mi shes pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pa'i chos ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa de la
269b3(mdo sde): khyod kyis gus pa bskyed par bya'o/ / bsti stang dang bcas/ ri mo dang bcas pa la ni shes rab yang dag par gnas shing byams pa skyed/ ye shes rab tu 'byung / rig pa skyed
269b4(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa mngon du 'gyur/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams mdun na gnas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i chos ji lta ba
269b5(mdo sde): bzhin du ston ce na/ nyi mas byin chos thams cad ni nam mkha' la bris pa bzhin du dngos po med pa ste/ chos de dag ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'o// nyi mas
269b6(mdo sde): byin 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni ma byung / mi 'byung ba de bzhin du/ nyi mas byin gzugs ni nam mkha' lta bu ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis 'gags pa'o//
269b7(mdo sde): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang nam mkha' lta bu ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis 'gags pa'o// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/ dper na nam
270a1(mdo sde): mkha' la bris pa ni ma skyes pa ste/ de bzhin du gzugs kyang ma skyes pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang
270a2(mdo sde): ma skyes pa'o/ / nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni ma 'gags pa ste/ de bzhin du nyi mas byin gzugs kyang ma 'gags pa'o// tshor ba dang
270a3(mdo sde): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang ma 'gags pa'o// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni mi khong mi 'gro ba de bzhin du/ nyi
270a4(mdo sde): mas byin gzugs kyang mi 'ong mi 'gro ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang mi 'ong mi 'gro'o// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/ dper na
270a5(mdo sde): nam mkha' la bris pa ni ma skyes ma byung ba de bzhin du/ gzugs kyang ma skyes ma byung ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang ma skyes ma byung ngo //
270a6(mdo sde): nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bris pa'ang ma 'phos ma skyes pa de bzhin du/ gzugs kyang ma 'phos ma skyes te/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
270a7(mdo sde): byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang ma 'phos ma skyes so// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni ma byung kun nas ma byung ba de bzhin du/ gzugs kyang ma
270b1(mdo sde): byung kun nas ma byung ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang ma byung kun nas ma byung ngo // rims byin 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la
270b2(mdo sde): bris pa ni ma skyes shing med pa de bzhin du/ gzugs kyang ma skyes shing mad pa ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang ma skyes shing med pa'o// /
270b3(mdo sde): nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni ma grub mngon par ma grub pa de bzhin du/ gzugs kyang ma grub mngon par ma grub ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang
270b4(mdo sde): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang ma grub mngon par ma grub bo// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni brjod du med cing brjod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du/
270b5(mdo sde): gzugs kyang brjod du med cing brjod pa ma yin te/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang brjod du med cing brjod pa ma yin no// nyi mas
270b6(mdo sde): byin 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bris pa btags pa med cing gdags pa ma yin pa de bzhin du/ gzugs kyang btags pa med cing gtags pa ma yin te/ tshor ba
270b7(mdo sde): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang btags pa med cing gdags pa ma yin no// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni
271a1(mdo sde): tha snyad tsam ste/ nam mkha' la bris pa tha snyad tsam las/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du/ gzugs kyang tha snyad tsam ste/ gzugs tha snyad tsam las
271a2(mdo sde): gzhan ma yin no/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang tha snyad tsam ste/ tha snyad tsam las rnam par shes pa gzhan ma yin no// nyi mas
271a3(mdo sde): byin 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni 'di ltar kun rdzob tsam ste/ kun rdzob las nam mkha' la bris pa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du/ nyi mas byin gzugs kyang
271a4(mdo sde): 'di ltar kun rdzob tsam ste/ kun rdzob las gzugs gzhan ma yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang 'di ltar kun rdzob tsam ste/
271a5(mdo sde): kun rdzob las rnam par shes pa'i bar du gzhan ma yin no// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni 'di ltar ming tsam ste/ mid tsam las nam mkha' la bris
271a6(mdo sde): pa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du/ gzugs kyang ming tsam ste/ ming tsam las gzhan ma yin no// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang 'di ltar ming tsam sa/ ming
271a7(mdo sde): tsam las rnam par shes pa'i bar du gzhan ma yin no/ / nyi mas byir 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni 'di ltar brjod pa tsam te/ brjod pa tsam las nam mkha'
271b1(mdo sde): la bris pa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du/ gzugs kyang 'di ltar brjod pa tsam ste/ brjod pa tsam las gzugs gzhan ma yin no// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du
271b2(mdo sde): yang 'di ltar brjod pa tsam snga/ brjod pa tsam las rnam par shes pa gzhan ma yin no// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni 'di ltar btags pa tsam
271b3(mdo sde): btags pa tsam las nam mkha' la bris pa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du/ gzugs kyang 'di ltar btags pa tsam ste/ btags pa tsam las gzugs gzhan ma yin/
271b4(mdo sde): no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang 'di ltar btags pa tsam ste/ btags pa tsam las tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
271b5(mdo sde): dang / rnam par shes pa gzhan ma yin no// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni 'di ltar 'du shes tsam ste/ 'du shes tsam las nam mkha' la bris
271b6(mdo sde): pa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du/ gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang 'di ltar 'du shes tsam ste/ 'du shes tsam las gzugs nas/ rnam par shes pa'i bar
271b7(mdo sde): du gzhan ma yin no/ / nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni brda tsam ste/ brda tsam las nam mkha' la bris pa ni 'di ltar gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du/
272a1(mdo sde): gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang 'di ltar brda tsam ste/ brda tsam las gzugs nas/ rnam par shes pa'i bar du gzhan ma yin no//
272a2(mdo sde): mas byin 'di lta ste/ dper na tshig gang gis nam mkha' la bris par brjod pa'i tshig ni don dam par mi dmigs pa de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang
272a3(mdo sde): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i chos de dag kyang 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang ma dmigs ma byon pa dang / da ltar
272a4(mdo sde): gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang ma dmigs so/ / nyi mas byin ye shes de rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sngon byang chub sems
272a5(mdo sde): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ sdug ning 'phongs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su btang yang zhum par mi 'gyur te/ gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni 'jig rten du
272a6(mdo sde): gtogs par mi blta'o/ / gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni 'jig rten gyi grangs su mi 'gro'o// gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni gdags par bya ba ma yin no//
272a7(mdo sde): gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so// gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni 'khor ba las bskyod pa ma yin no// gang
272b1(mdo sde): ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni 'khor ba'i chos can yang ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos can yang ma yin no// gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni kun
272b2(mdo sde): nas nyon mongs pa'i chos can ma yin/ rnam par byang ba'i chos can ma yin no// gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni zhi bar spyod pa'ang ma yin// ma zhi bar spyod
272b3(mdo sde): pa'ang ma yin no/ / de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin skyes bu dam pa grags byin gyis bshad pa la legs so zhes shin tu bstong pa
272b4(mdo sde): rjes su yi rang ngo / / de nas yang skyes bu dam pa bcu gcig po de dag gis/ bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin de rab tu dga' bar bya ba'i phyir/ bram
272b5(mdo sde): ze'i rigs shing sba la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin de la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos zab mo 'di thos kyang ma skrag/ skrag par ma gyur/ shin tu skrag
272b6(mdo sde): par ma gyur/ ma myos myos par ma gyur pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang la bslab par bya ba'i sa ni 'di yin no// de nas bram ze'i rigs shing
272b7(mdo sde): sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin zab mo gos pa med pa'i chos bstan pa 'di thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu ste/ yi rangs nas rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba
273a1(mdo sde): sbyid nas sangs rgyas kyi chos pab mom par byin par gyur/ bam po 'dun pa sab man/ danas zab
273a2(mdo sde): rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin dang / skyes bu dam pa bcu gcig po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs nas dga' mag
273a3(mdo sde): bya ba de gal ba der nong ste byon nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo ba phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khor do// de nas skyes bu dam pa grags byin des bcom ldan
273a4(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mchog de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ / zhi ba'i dbyings la rab tu zhugs pa'i tshul rnams la/ mkhas pa 'dren pa rnams ni leg
273a5(mdo sde): so zhes/ / gang gis mi mchog shin tu 'thob 'gyur ba// de ni mi rnams dam pa bstan du gsol// 'jig rten mkhas pas bstan pa thos nas su// byang chub mchog la
273a6(mdo sde): mi gnas rab tu 'jug/ kang thos drang srong chen por 'gyur ba dag/ tshul de srog chags rnams la sman slad gsungs// bde gshegs bdag gi rigs la gnas nas
273a7(mdo sde): su/ / grub pa sangs rgyas ye shes mngon par bstod// rgyal bas de yid rab tu dga' bar mdzad// de dag zis nas shin tu gnas par 'gyur// rgyal ba dag gis
273b1(mdo sde): lhur 'tshal ba rnams/ / 'dren pa dag gis chos rnams bshad lags te// ston pas ji ltar chos rnams kun mkhyen pa// 'dren pas legs par ma lus bstan du gsol//
273b2(mdo sde): de la dga' mchog 'jig rten 'dren pa yis// rgyal sras spyod pa gang la spyad pas na// mi yi gtso bo 'dren par 'gyur ba yi// sangs rgyas chos rnams ma lus nges par
273b3(mdo sde): bstan/ / thams cad chos zhes bya ba mtshan nyid gcig/ mtshan nyid brel zhing mtshan nyid ma mchis te// zhi ba mi g.yo dang gis ma mchis la// yon tan ma mchis ma
273b4(mdo sde): spros 'tshe med zhi/ / kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang ba stong // dngos po ma mchis ci yang ma lags te// 'di ni bstan pa ma lags ston ma mchis// bshad pa ma
273b5(mdo sde): mchis 'chad par bgyid ma mchis/ / tshor ba ma lags tshor ba po ma mchis// shes pa ma lags shes par bgyid ma mchis// su la'ang ma lags gang gis kyang ma lags
273b6(mdo sde): 'di dag ma bgyis bgyid du stsal ma mchis/ sus kyang blang ba ma mchis btang ma mchis// sus kyang bsgrags pa ma mchis thos ma mchis// sus kyang mi rig rnam par shes
273b7(mdo sde): ma mchis/ / 'di dag dngos por sus kyang mthong ma mchis// 'di ni zhi ba ma lags rgod ma lags// zhi bgyid ma lags zhi bar bgyid ma lags// bgyid pa ma lags/
274a1(mdo sde): bgyid pa ma mchis min// sems pa ma mchis tshor bar bgyid ma mchis// 'dus byas ma lags 'dus ma byas ma lags// 'pho ba ma lags mi 'pho ba
274a2(mdo sde): ma lags/ / 'ongs pa ma mchis 'gro ba ma mchis te// 'di ni kun tu ma mchis sgyu ma mchis// skye ba ma mchis skyed pa'ang ma lags te// 'di ni 'gags pa ma mchis
274a3(mdo sde): 'gags ma lags/ / 'di ni bstan pa ma mchis bshig ma mchis// de ltar rgyal po'i chos rnams rtogs par bgyi// 'dren pa bde bar gshegs pa gang 'das pa//
274a4(mdo sde): de dag gis kyang tshul 'dir rab tu bstan// 'dren pa sangs rgyas ma byon 'byung ba rnams// de dag kyang ni tshul 'di 'chad par 'gyur// rnam par 'dren pa da ltar gang byung ba//
274a5(mdo sde): rgyal ba de dag kun kyang tshul 'di ston// chos nyid 'di dag rab tu rtogs pa ni// byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa ma mchis 'gyur// zhi ba'i sa yang rab tu rtogs
274a6(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ / mkhas pas rtogs par dka' ba rab tu bstan// rgyal ba'i thugs sras ji tsam rtogs pa dag/ 'gro ba gtses 'dir mya ngan ma mchis lags// de las
274a7(mdo sde): snying rje bla na med pa skye/ / 'gro ba kun la byams pa shin tu gnas// stong pa nyid la gnas par gyur pas na// rgyal ba'i bstan pa dag la the tsom bral// mtshan ma ma mchis
274b1(mdo sde): rtogs par gyur pas na/ / de la smon lam 'debs pa'ang yod ma mchis// rlung rnams nam mkha' dag la mi thogs bzhin// dpa' bo de yang 'gro bar yong mi chags//
274b2(mdo sde): bskal pa mang po bya bar kun 'khor zhing // sems can bya ba mang la ston par bgyid// kun tu kun nas nyon mongs mi 'gyur te// des ni byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgya nus// kal
274b3(mdo sde): te bdud kyis sangs rgyas bye bstan te/ / de dag nyan thos kyis shes smra na yang // ngas ni chos nyid yang dag rab rtogs te// khyed ni 'dren pa min zhes de smra lags// dri ma
274b4(mdo sde): bral ba'i ye shes mog sbyangs te/ / bdagra ni the tsom ma lus rnam par byed// stong par bdag ni gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog/ khyod nI gang zag mchog min par deng zhig/ de ltar rgyal/
274b5(mdo sde): bas chos nyid bstan pas na// gang la 'dren pa'i sra rnams gnas pa la// bye ba khrag khrig bdud kyis thub dka' ste// ji ltar ri bo bskyod par mi nus bzhin//
274b6(mdo sde): de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mchog de las stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag thos nas/
274b7(mdo sde): 'di lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs thob ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu thob pas ta la bdun srid du nam mkha' la 'phags te/ des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ 'jig
275a1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag dpag tu med pa rnams thabs mkhas pa rnams tha dad pas byang chub
275a2(mdo sde): yang dag par sgrub pa mthong / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'phos te/ yum gyi rum du zhugs pa yang mthong
275a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bye ba dpag tu med pa rnams lha 'bum gyis mchod cing yum gyi rum du 'gro ba yang mthong / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu
275a4(mdo sde): med pa rnams btsas nas gom pa bdun 'dor ba yang mthong / / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams mngon par 'byung ba yang mthong / byang chub
275a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa yang mthong / / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams la brgya byin dang /
275a6(mdo sde): tshangs pa dag gis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba yang mthong / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang mthong / sangs rgyas
275a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams spyod lam dpag tu med pas sems can rnams 'dul ba mthong / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig
275b1(mdo sde): rten na phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yang mthong ngo / / de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i
275b2(mdo sde): bu nyi mas byin par snang la 'dug bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mchog de la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa// legs so legaso rkang
275b3(mdo sde): gnyis kun gyi mchog/ 'dren pa khyod kyis 'di dag chos bstan pa// bar snang gnas kyi bya yi rjes bzhin du// dngos bral mtshungs med ci yang ma lags pa// mtshan ma
275b4(mdo sde): ma mchis nam mkha' bris pa bzhin/ / de ltar bde bar gshegs pas chos bstan te// sprul pa dag gis ji ltar gzhan sprul bzhin// yang dag tu na rgyal bas bstan ma mchis//
275b5(mdo sde): sos ka'i dus kyi smig rgyu ji bzhin du// yang dag par ni bden par mchis ma lags// de bzhin bde bar gshegs pas chos bstan te// ston pa gang lags de yang de dang 'dra/
275b6(mdo sde): sngon chad the tsom nem nur gang byung ba// de yang 'dren pa deng du bral gyur te// bde bar gshegs pa sa gsungs pa'i chos kyang rig/ 'gro ba grol mdzad rnam par 'dren par
275b7(mdo sde): shog/ stobs bsungag gis bslags pa ci 'dra bar// rgyal ba'i zhing mchog bzang po sbyang bar bgyi// sangs rgyas rgyal ba rkang gnyis gtsor gyur te// skye bo ma rtog
276a1(mdo sde): #/ rab tu rtogs par bgyi// srid pa'i rgya mtshos khyer ba'i 'gro ba rnams// gnas dang skyabs dang rten kyang ma mchis pa'i// skyabs su 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal
276a2(mdo sde): thar bgyi ste/ / rga shi bral ba'i gnas kyang bstan par bgyi// bye ba khrag khrig bdud kyi spyod yul ni// thams cad rgyal ba'i spyod yul du yang bgyi// sems can bdud kyi yul
276a3(mdo sde): nas bton nas su/ / drang srong chen po'i yul du drang bar bgyi// bde bar gshegs pas zhi ba'i chos bstan pa// gang gis thos nas gang la'ang mi reg pa// de dag mchog gi
276a4(mdo sde): tshul la gnas par 'gyur/ / 'dren pa srog chags rnams kyi ston par 'gyur// chos nyid 'di ltar mi gang rab rtogs shing // ston pa rgyal ba'i dbang po'i spyan snga nas// bstan
276a5(mdo sde): bcos kun la mkhas shing 'jigs bral ba/ / de dag bla na med pa'i bde gshegs 'gyur// stong pa 'di nyid gang gis rab rtogs shing // stong par dmigs pa'i 'du shes bral
276a6(mdo sde): gyur na/ / de dag ma spang bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// srog chags bye ba mang po 'grol bar bgyid// mkhas pa sogs pa la ni mi dga' ste// zas kyi ro rnams la yang
276a7(mdo sde): chags ma mchis/ / rtogs pa dgon pa'i gnas la shin tu mos// de dag rkang gnyis dam pa mkhas par 'gyur// sbyangs pa gang dag stobs bcus bsngags pa dag/ de la
276b1(mdo sde): rtag tu rab tu gnas par 'gyur/ / 'phags pa'i rigs la de dag rtag tu dga'// rab tu dga' bas byang chub mchog kyang thob// de dag chos rnams bde bar gshegs pas bsngakra/
276b2(mdo sde): de la mkhas pa gnas pas 'di thob ste// zhi ba gang la bde gshegs gnas pa yi// byang chub de ni 'jig rten 'dren pas bsngags// 'dren pa khyod las stong pa deng thos te//
276b3(mdo sde): ye shes bla na med pa'ang bdag gis bsgrubs// sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso bor 'gyur ba bgyi// mi mkhas 'gro ba dag kyang rnam par dgrol// thub pa khyod la bdag ni
276b4(mdo sde): skyabs su mchi/ / gang la log pa'i blo gros mi dmigs shing // chos rnams kun la khyod ni the tsom bral// de slad 'jig rten khyod dang 'dra ma mchis// 'dren pa bde
276b5(mdo sde): bar gshegs la gang bstod pa'i/ / bsod nams mi chung bdag gis bsags pas na// bdag ni de yi dge ba'i las 'di yis// mi yi gtso bo 'dren par 'gyur bar
276b6(mdo sde): shog/ de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mchog de la tshigs su bcad pa de dag
276b7(mdo sde): mngon par bstod nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskal pa brjod du med par rnams kyang myos pa dang glen par ma gyur to// gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der 'dren pa skyes bu chen por
277a1(mdo sde): gyur to/ / nams kyang log par ltung bar ma gyur to// nams kyang gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog par gyur to// nams kyang gzhan gyi ngor lta bar ma gyur to//
277a2(mdo sde): nams kyang bskal pa brjod du med pa/ tha na se gol gtogs pa tsam gyi bar du sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma byas par ma gyur to// thams cad zil gyis
277a3(mdo sde): gnon pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu grags byin zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/ thams cad zil gyis gnon pa khyod kyis de
277a4(mdo sde): ltar mi blta'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu bzang skyong zhes bya ba de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu grags byin zhes bya bar gyur to// thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 'di
277a5(mdo sde): ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na mkhas pa'i snying por gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub
277a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba de/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu mkhas pa'i snying po zhes bya bar gyur to// thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 'di ji snyam
277a7(mdo sde): du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na tsan ngan snying po zhes bya bar gyur pa gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems
277b1(mdo sde): dpa' skyob byin zhes bya ba'i/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu tsam ngan snying po zhes bya bar gyur to// thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 'di ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus
277b2(mdo sde): na rigs kyi bu tshangs pa'i mig ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ded
277b3(mdo sde): dpon bzang po de/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu tshangs pa'i mig ces bya bar gyur to// de bzhin du sbyar te/ gang rigs kyi bu des pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de ni byang chub sems
277b4(mdo sde): dpa' mes byin yin no/ / de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu blo gros 'chang zhes bya bar gyur pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus na gang rigs kyi
277b5(mdo sde): bu kun tu mdzes par gyur pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' dbang pos byin yin no/ / de'i tshe de'i dus na gang rigs kyi bu spobs pa mtha' yas su gyur pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' chu'i lha yin/
277b6(mdo sde): no// thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa
277b7(mdo sde): snyam du 'dzin na/ thams cad zil gyis gnon pa khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i
278a1(mdo sde): rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin zhes bya bar gyur to/ / thams cad zil gyis gnon pa de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan
278a2(mdo sde): gyi dring la mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri bar 'dod pa dang / gzhan gyi ngor mi blta bar 'dod na/ chos kyi dbyings la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la
278a3(mdo sde): bsnyen par bya/ 'grogs par bya/ bsnyen bkur bya'o// chos zab mo mnyan pa'i phyir yongs su 'dri ba'i ngang tshul tsan du bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur
278a4(mdo sde): gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar stobs bskyed pas chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bam
278a5(mdo sde): cad zil gyis gnon pa 'dis/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed lags sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig la yongs su zhu ba
278a6(mdo sde): zhus lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen
278a7(mdo sde): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyis dang / rtswa dang / shing dang / yal ga dang / lo ma rnams rdul phra rab tu byas kyang bgrang bar nus kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad zil
278b1(mdo sde): gyis gnon pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la chos kyi dbyings yongs su zhus pa dang / chos kyi/
278b2(mdo sde): dbyings la 'jug pa dang / babs mkhas pa la 'jug pa yongs su dris pa ni bgrang bar mi nus so// 'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grang
278b3(mdo sde): med/ dpag tu med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ zhi ba'i phung po'i bskal pa la
278b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshang med par yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang ldan par/ de bzhin gsha/
278b5(mdo sde): pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs
278b6(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das dbang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i rgyal mtshan de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na'ang dge slong dpa' sra zhes bya ba
278b7(mdo sde): mkhas pa/ yid gzhungs pa/ bye brag phyed pa/ rtogs pa/ shes rab kyi rang bzhin can zhig byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
279a1(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i rgyal mtshan de la rim gror byed par gyur to/ / des de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i rgyal mtshan de la lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya
279a2(mdo sde): cu'i bar du shin tu gus par byas te/ bshad pa rnams kyang gzungs su 'dzin cing rang gi don kyang mi gtong ste/ des de bzhin gshegs pa la lo bye ba khrag khrig brgyad cu'i bar du thams
279a3(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis rim gro byas te/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa bas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams mnyes par byas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
279a4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi rim gro byed par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis bsnyen bkur byas so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams
279a5(mdo sde): cad kyis thog ma dang / / bar dang / tha mar dus gsum du bstan pa rnams yongs su bzung bar gyur to// de'i 'og tu zhi ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i bskal pa de la sangs rgyas bye ba phrag
279a6(mdo sde): dgu byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' des yang mnyes par byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi rim gro byed par
279a7(mdo sde): gyur to/ / de dag thams cad la'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis rim gro byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi thog ma dang / ba ra dang / za ma dus
279b1(mdo sde): gsum du bstan pa rnams yongs su bzung ngo / / de'i 'og tu zla 'od ces bya ba'i bskal pa byung ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
279b2(mdo sde): dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / / de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po de'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyad cur gyur te/
279b3(mdo sde): de la'ang byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sra des bskal pa bye ba brgyad cu'i bar du yid du 'ong bas bsnyen bkur byas te/ yid du mi 'ong bas ni ma yin no// de la de bzhin gshegs
279b4(mdo sde): pa dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba des bskal pa bye ba brgyad cu'i bar du ji ltar chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par 'gyur ba/ nam mkha' la bris pa lta bur chos kyi dbyings su
279b5(mdo sde): 'jug pa bstan to/ / bskal pa bye ba brgyad cu'i bar du chos thams cad nam mkha' la bris pa lta bur bstan to// dpa' sra 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni gzhan du 'gyur yang srid kyi
279b6(mdo sde): nam mkha' la bris pa lta bu'i chos thams cad ni cung zad kyang gzhan du 'gyur ba med do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sras chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa 'di thos nas
279b7(mdo sde): 'di lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs thob ste/ ji lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs thob pas nam mkha' la ta la bdun srid du 'phags te/ des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
280a1(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mthong /
280a2(mdo sde): kha cig ni bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ kha cig ni rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa du mas sems can rnams 'dul/ kha cig ni tshe'i 'du byed 'dor/ kha cig ni phur
280a3(mdo sde): po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal
280a4(mdo sde): po de la zab mo'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod do/ / zhi ba'i byang chub mtshungs med btsal slad du// bdag gis sangs rgyas 'das pa bye stong la// shin tu
280a5(mdo sde): gus pa chen po bskyed nas su/ / sngon gyi 'dren pa dag la bsnyen bkur bgyis// sems ni nams kyang gzhan du ma gyur te// rtag par yid ni stong pa nyid la bzhag/ chos
280a6(mdo sde): rnams stong par bde bar gshegs pas bstan/ / de dag chos kyang yid kyis rnam par bsams// bdag tu smra ba'i mi gang mi mkhas pa// mu stegs can kun bdag gis/
280a7(mdo sde): zil gyis mnan// chos rnams thams cad chu yi zla ba bzhin// de la bdag ni the tsom cang ma mchis// mig ni dam pa'i don du stong par ni// bde bar gshegs pa bshad
280b1(mdo sde): pa thos nas rtogs/ / mig 'di mig tu mchis pa ma lags te// lus kyang ngo bo nyid ni med slad du// nges par sna lce rna ba de bzhin te// lus kyang ngo bo nyid kyis mchis
280b2(mdo sde): ma lags/ / de bzhin sems dang sems pa'ang stong pa nyid// sems ni dben zhing rab tu stong pa lags// gzugs kyang rigs kyi chos rnams dben zhing stong // sgra dang dri/
280b3(mdo sde): dang ro dang reg kyang stong // chos rnams thams cad ngo bo nyid stong ste// skye mched de dag ngo bo nyid kyis spyong // de bzhin khams rnams ngo bo nyid kyis stong // dbang po 'di yang
280b4(mdo sde): bo nyid kyis stong / / bden pa'ang bden pas de bzhin stong pa ste// 'di la mdzangs pa ma lags 'gro rnams bslab// gang na'ang stong par rig pa ma mchis par// nam
280b5(mdo sde): mkha' bar snang bya yi rjes dang mtshungs/ / gang na'ang ngo bo nyid ni ma mchis pa// de ni nams kyang gzhan gyi rgyur mi 'gyur// gang gi ngo bo nyid ni mi rnyed pa// rang bzhin
280b6(mdo sde): demed ji ltar gzhan gyi rkyen/ / rang bzhin med pa gzhan gyis ci zhig skyed// rgyu de bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa'o// thams cad chos kyang mi g.yo brtan par gnas//
280b7(mdo sde): mi 'gyur gtse ba ma mchis zhi ba ste// ji ltar nam mkha' rig pa ma mchis ltar// de la mi mdzangs 'gro ba myos par 'gyur// ji ltar ri bo dag ni mi bskul ba// de
281a1(mdo sde): bzhin chos rnams rtag tu bskyod mi nus/ / 'chi 'pho ma mchis skye ba ma mchis pa'i// chos rnams de ltar rgyal bas rab tu bstan// gang gis yang dag
281a2(mdo sde): chos rnams nges rtogs pa/ / des ni rgyal ba rnam 'dren bsnyen bkur bgyid// gang la 'di 'dra'i nan tan ma mchis pa// de dag rgyal ba'i chos nyid mchod ma bgyis// gang
281a3(mdo sde): gis tshul bzhin rab tu chos rtogs pa/ / des ni rgyal ba bde gshegs bkur sti bgyis// de dag rgyal ba chos kyis mchod bgyis te// byang chub dam pa mchog tu 'tshang yang
281a4(mdo sde): rgya/ / gang gis tshul bzhin chos rnams rab rtogs pa// mkhas pa de dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyang 'dzin// bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa des bzung ste// byang chub dam
281a5(mdo sde): pa mchog tu 'tshang yang rgya/ / rgyal ba brgya yis stong pa nyid bshad de// byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig rnams kyis bzung // bde bar gshegs pa'i shul 'dir byang chub phyir//
281a6(mdo sde): de la mkhas pa the tsom gzhar mi 'byung // bde bar gshegs pas chos rnams gang bstan pa// chos nyid de ni de ring bdag gis 'tshal// 'dren pa mi rnams kyi yang mchog tu
281a7(mdo sde): 'gyur/ / shin tu sdug bsngal skye bo rnam par dgrol// 'di ltar stong pa nyid ni rigs pas na// bdag gis de ring chos kyis yab la mchod// gang slang mi yi gtso bo khyod
281b1(mdo sde): 'phags pas/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de la skyabs su mchi// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sras bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po
281b2(mdo sde): la stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nges/ gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der yang gzungs dang / zhi gnas dang / shes rab kyis sem
281b3(mdo sde): can thams cad zil gyis mnan to/ / 'jam dpal de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dpa' srus su gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/ 'jam dpal khyod
281b4(mdo sde): sa de ltar mi bsta/ daca'i phyir / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad zil gyis gnan pa 'di dzi pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sa zhes bya bar gyur te/
281b5(mdo sde): bas na 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar 'dod pas stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo la bslab
281b6(mdo sde): par bya'o/ / de la slob pa'i tshe'ang sems gang la'ang mi chags mi thogs te/ de'i sems ma chags shing thogs pa med pas/ bya ba gang dang gang la dmigs pa de dang de'ang mngon
281b7(mdo sde): sum du 'gyur ro/ / 'jam dpal nga stong pa nyid 'di la bslab pa na/ ye shes ji lta bu rab tu thob pas ji ltar bsams pa de bzhin du 'gyur zhing kar 'dod pa der 'gyur ba'i
282a1(mdo sde): ye shes de lta bu rab tu thob bo/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu 'das pa na/ rtag tu snang bar byas zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi
282a2(mdo sde): khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shugs 'chang zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal
282a3(mdo sde): shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco brgyad 'das pa na/ rin chen yod ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dag
282a4(mdo sde): pa'i spyan zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug cu 'das pa na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/
282a5(mdo sde): de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad sems pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi
282a6(mdo sde): phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya 'das pa na/ bai DUR+Ya'i snying po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi
282a7(mdo sde): phung po zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing sa ya phrag gnyis 'das pa na/ gsar du snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/
282b1(mdo sde): da na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing
282b2(mdo sde): 'di nas shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong brgyad brgya 'das pa na/ zhi ba spyod ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de nang la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin
282b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'bum 'das pa na/
282b4(mdo sde): sprin gyi kha dog ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas stobs kyi rgyal po
282b5(mdo sde): zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyog char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum brgya 'das pa na/ yid du 'ong ba'i dri zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi kham yod de/ de nang la sems can rnam gyi de bzhin gshes
282b6(mdo sde): bdagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri'i rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum khri brgyad stong 'das pa na/
282b7(mdo sde): long gi dkyil 'khor snang zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ da na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
283a1(mdo sde): spros kyi rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag brgyad cu 'das pa na
283a2(mdo sde): zla ba snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rga shi 'joms
283a3(mdo sde): pa zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag dgu bcu 'das pa na/ dus las 'das zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de
283a4(mdo sde): de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge sbyong rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char
283a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ tshe mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin
283a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos mchog ces bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang
283a7(mdo sde): mnyam pa phrag sum cu rtsa brgyad 'das pa na/ zhi ba'i cho ga zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de nang la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
283b1(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas blo gros dag pa zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug cu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
283b2(mdo sde): 'das pa na/ ma smad pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
283b3(mdo sde): rin chen bkod pa zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ rin po
283b4(mdo sde): kun tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzi brjid
283b5(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das
283b6(mdo sde): pa na/ dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
283b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas brtul zhugs sprad ces bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bco brgyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
284a1(mdo sde): 'das blan/ yi grub ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de rang la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo
284a2(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug pud rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi
284a3(mdo sde): khams 'das pa na/ nges par song zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
284a4(mdo sde): rgyas gtsug pud 'byung zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das
284a5(mdo sde): pa na/ grong rdal zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de nang la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams
284a6(mdo sde): cad zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu'i rdul phra rab kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/
284a7(mdo sde): pa'i dri zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod/ de na ngal sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnas med par spyod ces
284b1(mdo sde): bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na// me tog
284b2(mdo sde): bsam pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang phyug ces bya bar
284b3(mdo sde): shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa brgyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ tsam pa'i kha dog
284b4(mdo sde): ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags pa'i lha zhes bya
284b5(mdo sde): bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bzhi bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ lhas sprul pa zhes bya
284b6(mdo sde): ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mi gnas pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing
284b7(mdo sde): 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bzhi bcu rtsa gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ rab tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yong
285a1(mdo sde): de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so//
285a2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bdun cu rtsa gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ ma smad pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig
285a3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams yod de/ de nang la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du
285a4(mdo sde): med pa bdun cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ gser du snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams
285a5(mdo sde): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mi rtag gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs chan gser gyis rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/
285a6(mdo sde): den nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gso ba byed pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs chan gser gyi gtsug ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de//
285a7(mdo sde): de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs dri ma sbyangs zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi
285b1(mdo sde): rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin
285b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs chan snang ba can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams
285b3(mdo sde): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dpal brtsegs zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed
285b4(mdo sde): kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ grags can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa
285b5(mdo sde): zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ gzi brjid
285b6(mdo sde): can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros 'dzin ces bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char
285b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa drug gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ tshangs pa 'byung zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de
286a1(mdo sde): nang la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi
286a2(mdo sde): zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ sangs rgyas dgyes pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems
286a3(mdo sde): can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa
286a4(mdo sde): brgyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ rin chen sgo zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs
286a5(mdo sde): pa 'jig rten slob dpon zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
286a6(mdo sde): 'das pa na/ rin po che'i rtse mo zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa skar rgyal zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar
286a7(mdo sde): gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ rin chen me tog shin tu rgyas pa zhes
286b1(mdo sde): bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sa dang mnyam pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi
286b2(mdo sde): zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ shin tu mdzes zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can
286b3(mdo sde): rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad gzigs pa zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab
286b4(mdo sde): kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ tsan dan gyi dri zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas snang
286b5(mdo sde): ba zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhod
286b6(mdo sde): 'das pa na/ zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
286b7(mdo sde): rgyas don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar shes so/ / 'jam dpal de lta bu'i rnam grangs su gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa rnams su sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed pa'i tshe/ nga la
287a1(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi ming tha dad pa shes pa ni brjod du med pa'i bskal par smras kyang shar gyi phyogs cha'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/ /
287a2(mdo sde): de bzhin du phyogs cha thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du nga la sems can gyis ming tha dad pa'i de bzhin gshegs par shes pa yang brjod du med pa'i bskal par smras kyang sangs rgyas
287a3(mdo sde): kyi zhing tha dad pa'i mtha' ba de bar mi rig go/ / 'jam dpal sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba rnams kyis nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa thos na myos par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal
287a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang theg pa 'di la yang dag par zhugs pa dang / theg pa 'di la yang dag par zhugs pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rab tu mgu bar byas pa de dag kyang 'jam
287a5(mdo sde): dpal nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa thos nas the tsom skye bar 'gyur na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa can dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dang / de ma yin pa'i byis pa so
287a6(mdo sde): so'i skye bo rnams lta ci smos/ / 'jam dang la ngas mngon par shes pa 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa
287a7(mdo sde): de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ yon tan rab tu bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
287b1(mdo sde): brtson 'grus mtha' yas zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe de'i dus nang ni bram ze'i bu mo blo gros mtha' yas zhes bya bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha'
287b2(mdo sde): yas de'ang byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig brgyad cus yongs su bskor bar gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg
287b3(mdo sde): pa dpag tu med pa'i bar la yang dag par zhugs pa nas/ theg pa brjod du med pa'i bar la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag ste/ de dag la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
287b4(mdo sde): pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas de'i rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa 'chad de/ nga'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir/ bcom
287b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas de la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byas so/ / de nas ngas de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa thos nas bdag
287b6(mdo sde): gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang de bas kyang shin tu rgya che ba de 'dra bar gyur cig ces de lta bu'i smon lam btab nas/ bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya cher
287b7(mdo sde): yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir bsngos te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / sangs
288a1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag par lung bstan mod kyi/ 'on kyang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi
288a2(mdo sde): zhing dpag tu med pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus ma btang bar gyur nas/ de ltar ngas de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig tshad med pa rnams la bsnyen bkur
288a3(mdo sde): byas te/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pas/ ngas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya cher yongs su dag par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
288a4(mdo sde): rgyas so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// brjod kyis mi lang 'khor ba na// bsam gyis mi khyab 'das
288a5(mdo sde): pa'i dus/ / sangs rgyas zhing gi rgyabakyang phyir// de nang yis brtson 'grus brtsams// brtson 'grus mtha' yas zhes bya ba// gang zag mtshungs pa med pa byung // sems
288a6(mdo sde): can bye ba rnam par 'dul/ / lhar bcas 'jig rten rnams la ston// sangs rgyas chos la dbang byed cing // stobs rnams kyi yang pha rol phyin// mi 'jigs pa la shin tu gnas//
288a7(mdo sde): so so yang dag rig la mkhas// gnas dang gnas min dbang yang thob// las dang ye shes rtogs par rig/ las rnams yang dag 'dzin pa dang // rnam par smin la the tsom
288b1(mdo sde): med/ / khams rnams du mar shes pa dang // rnam par 'dren pa shin tu ldan// sems can rnams kyi dad pa rnams// ma lus yang dag rab tu mkhyen// sems can rnams
288b2(mdo sde): kyi dbang po yi/ / rim pa bzhin du yang dag mkhyen// dbang po mchog dang tha ma rnams// ma lus par yang rab tu mkhyen// bsam gtan ye shes rnam thar dang // ting nge
288b3(mdo sde): 'dzin gyi pha rol phyin/ / snyoms par 'jug dang tshad med la// rkang gnyis dam pa shin tu bslabs// sangs rgyas rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin// des ni mi mkhyen gang yang med/
288b4(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs// gzigs pa la yang sgrib pa med// de bzhin gshegs pa de la ngas// sangs rgyas zhing gi rgya che ba// bskal pa chen po bdag
288b5(mdo sde): la gsungs/ / kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang // ma lus yang dag rab tu mkhyen// gang rnams khyod kyis mi mkhyen pa// de 'dra'i chos ni yod ma mchis// sangs rgyas zhing
288b6(mdo sde): gi skyon rnams dang / / yon tan thams cad rab tu mkhyen// sangs rgyas bstan pa rgya che ba// rkang gnyis gtso bos bshad du gsol// sems can rnams kyi smin pa dang /
288b7(mdo sde): ltar mi rnams 'tshang rgya ba// nyon mongs gang gis nyon mongs pas// mi mkhas 'khor bar rab tu 'khor// mi rnams gang gis nyon mongs pa// nyon mongs de dag khyod kyis
289a1(mdo sde): mkhyen/ / de yi lam dang bsam pa rnams// 'dren pa khyod kyis rnam par mkhyen// ji ltar ting 'dzin 'byung ba dang // byung nas ji ltar gnas pa dang //
289a2(mdo sde): ji ltar de las ldang ba rnams// ston pa khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med pa// ji skad ting nge 'dzin rnams dang // zhi gnas dang ni lhag mthong rnams//
289a3(mdo sde): rnam pa thams cad shin tu mkhyen// ji ltar chos la 'dogs pa dang // gang gis rkyen gyis bshad pa yang // de yang ston pas rab mkhyen te// de la the tsom mi mnga' khyod// khyod
289a4(mdo sde): kyi bskal pa byer spyad pas/ / ye shes 'di las nges par 'byung // ston pas stobs kyi mthu yang brnyes// drang srong chen po stobs dang ldan// bskal pa stong phrag bye ba yi// bdag dang
289a5(mdo sde): pha rol rnams kyi yang / / spyod pa dpag tu ma mchis shing // bsam gyis mi khyab thams cad mkhyen// gang du byang chub ci 'dra ba// skye ba thams cad du yang 'jug/ de dag ma lus 'dren
289a6(mdo sde): pa yis/ / ji lta bu yang rab tu mkhyen// gang du ci 'drar skye ba dang // gang du rigs kyang ci 'dra ba// ji ltar kun tu spyad pa rnams// de dag 'dren pas rab tu mkhyen// tha ma'i chos
289a7(mdo sde): rnams ci 'dra ba/ / 'dren pas 'khor ba de rnams kyang // 'gro ba gang du skye ba ni// de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen// ci 'dra ba yi ye shes kyis// sdom chad rnam par lung bstan pa/
289b1(mdo sde): mkhas pa khyod kyis de mkhyen pa// de la the tsom mi mnga' khyod// tshul khrims gang dang cho ga gang // ci 'dra'i spyod pa spyad pa dang // ye shes gang la zhugs pa dang // de dag 'dren
289b2(mdo sde): pas rab tu mkhyen/ / gang dang gang gi las kyis su// skye ba rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur// rnam smin ci 'dra 'thob pa yang // de ni mgon pos rab tu mkhyen// gang du gnas pa de dag
289b3(mdo sde): gi/ / rgyad du mchi bar nges pa yang // de yang ma lus khyod kyis mkhyen// de slad yid gnyis mi mnga' khyod// gang gi las kyis sems gang skyes// de yang khyod kyis rnam par
289b4(mdo sde): mkhyen/ / sems de'i rgyu ni gang lags pa// de yang 'dren pas shin tu mkhyen// sngon chad gnas pa mkhyen pa ni// khyod dang 'dra ba yod ma mchis// sangs rgyas bye ba stong rnams
289b5(mdo sde): dang / / 'dren pa khyod ni de dang 'dra// srog chags so so'i dge ba rnams// rjes su dran pas rab tu mkhyen// de slad sangs rgyas chos rnams la// 'dren pa'i ye shes thogs mi mnga'//
289b6(mdo sde): gang dang gang gi las kyis su// ji lta bu yi rgyud du mchis// de yang thams cad mkhyen pas mkhyen// de slad rgyal las lhag ma mchis// 'dren pas chos rnams thams cad la//
289b7(mdo sde): khyod ni the tsom yong mi mnga'// sems can kun gyi spyod yul dang // sangs rgyas spyan gyis rab tu gzigs// skye ba dang ni 'chi 'pho mkhyen// khyod 'dra ba ni yong mi gda'// lpa
290a1(mdo sde): bcas 'jig rten thams cad na/ / thub pa khyod las lhag ma mchis// zag pa zad pa'ang rab tu mkhyen// ma lus par yang rtogs par 'gyur// nyon mongs
290a2(mdo sde): thams cad yongs su spangs/ / khyod kyis bag chags kun kyang bcom// sems can kun gyi nyon mongs dang // spyod pa rnams kyang 'dren pas mkhyen// gang la nyon mongs spyod yul dang /
290a3(mdo sde): nyon mongs 'di dag gar 'byung mkhyen// nyon mongs dag la spyad pas na// bag chags rjes su 'jug pa rnams// de dag kun kyang khyod mkhyen te// de las khyod ni pha rol phyin//
290a4(mdo sde): bdag dang pha rol rnams kyi yang // nyon mongs gang gis spong ba yi// lam de rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen// de slad khyod ni lam la mkhas// 'jig rten kun mgon rnam 'dren pa//
290a5(mdo sde): mtha' yas brtson 'grus de bstod nas// bskal bye khrag khrig mtha' yas par// 'gro ba gnyis su de skyes so// 'di nas lha ris nga skye che// rtag par lnga yi dbang por 'gyur// bye ba
290a6(mdo sde): mtha' yas lha rnams la/ / rgyal ba'i ye shes 'thob par bstan// lha yi gnas nas shi 'phos te// mi yi dbang po rgyal por gyur// sems can khrag khrig mtha' yas pa// rgyal
290a7(mdo sde): ba'i ye shes 'thob par bstan/ / de dag nga yi chos thos nas// bsti stang mtshungs med skyes nas su// sems ni thams cad nyer bzhag ste// dri med sems kyis de dag nyan// sems can
290b1(mdo sde): ba mtha' yas pa/ / byang chub mchog la nges par gyur// nga yi tshig thos rtogs pa ni// sangs rgyas byang chub nges par gyur// sangs rgyas bye ba mtha' yas pa// sangs rgyas zhing gi
290b2(mdo sde): rgya bshad kyang / / bskal pa khrag khrig mtha' yas su// rgya che bshad pa mi zad do// sangs rgyas yon tan gang brjod dang // drang srong chen pos zhing bsngags pa// thams cad rang bzhin
290b3(mdo sde): stong par bshad/ / de dag ma skyes mi 'gag bstan// gang 'dir sangs rgyas bsngags pa dang // sangs rgyas yon tan gang bstan dang // bde bar gshegs pas zhing brjod pa// /
290b4(mdo sde): gang gis bshad pa'ang de dang 'dra// chos rnams zhi bar bde gshegs bshad// zhi ba'i rang bzhin de ni rnyed// gang la bshad pa de yang stong // 'di la mgon med 'gro ba
290b5(mdo sde): myomos/ / de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu mo blo gros mtha' yas kyis// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas la tshigs su bcad
290b6(mdo sde): pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ bud med kyi dbang po las gyurate/ de phyin chad bud med kyi lus su mi skye bar gyur to// 'jam dpal de lta bas na byang chub
290b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su sbyang bar 'dod cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa/
291a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgrub pa'i stong pa nyid sgrib pa med pa la bslab par bya'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
291a2(mdo sde): 'di thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu
291a3(mdo sde): rab tu ldeg/ 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/ bur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ chem chem/ rab tu che mtsham/ kun tu rab
291a4(mdo sde): tu chem tsham/ shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho/ nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho/ lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho/ byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho
291a5(mdo sde): dbus dma' na mtha' mtho/ mtha' dma' na dbus mtho bar gyur to// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu rtsa drug len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// dgra
291a6(mdo sde): slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma tshad med pa phrag brgya ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag
291a7(mdo sde): khrig dpag tu med pa ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ / srog chags stong phrag mang po dpag tu med pa rnams dang / lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu sngon ma bskyed pa rnams ni
291b1(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong po
291b2(mdo sde): de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// /
291b3(mdo sde): 'phags pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+he dang / zhu chen gyi lo
291b4(mdo sde): ba ban+de ye shes sdes zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas/ slad kyis gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya
291b5(mdo sde): g+ha na byA ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rgyan stug po bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// // bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang
291b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la mnga' sgyur ba/ 'dod pa dang
291b7(mdo sde): gzugs dang / gzugs med pa dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams las 'das te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po na/ stobs rnams dang / mnga' rnams dang
292a1(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis rnam par 'phrul zhing rjes su spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnal 'byor dam pa'i rnal 'byor can 'di lta ste/
292a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mur 'dug byed pa thams cad kyi gzhung rnam par 'joms pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po dang / byang chub
292a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
292a4(mdo sde): gzigs kyi dbang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen brnyes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po dang /
292a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
292a6(mdo sde): chen po rnam par grol ba'i zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shugs 'dzin dang / de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phru ba bye ma snyed kyi
292a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khams gsum pa'i yul las yongs su 'das pa/ sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang / kun gzhi'i spyod yul las
292b1(mdo sde): yongs su 'das pa/ ye shes dang yid kyi lus yongs su gnas par gyur pa/ sgyu ma lta bu dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba dang / chos kyi sprin gyis dang / ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa
292b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas du ma'i phyag gis dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba/ khams gsum pa'i yul las shin tu 'das pa'i gzhal med khang gi pad+mo chen po la 'khod pa rnams dang thabs cig tu
292b3(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ de na mur 'dug dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyu ba med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
292b4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ba'i chos la bde bar spyod pa/ bdag gis so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis mkhyen pa'i spyod yul btsun par dbyangs 'byin pa
292b5(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyi gzugs du ma ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te/ bzhengs nas kyang / pho brang 'ja' dang glog gi 'od can rgyan dang / lhab lhub du mas brgyan pa nas mngon par byung
292b6(mdo sde): ste/ zla ba dri ma med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i khang stengs su gshegs so// gshegs nas kyang stug po'i ri'i brgyan/ seng ge gdan dam pa la byang chub sems dpa' dang thabs cig
292b7(mdo sde): tu bzhugs so/ / bzhugs nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bzhir gzigs te/ gtsug gi rin chen 'od kyi rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs chen po 'od zer stong phrag
293a1(mdo sde): brgya'i 'khor can smin mtshams nas phyung ste/ 'od zer gyi tshogs de byung bas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gcig dang 'dra bar
293a2(mdo sde): yongs su snang bar gyur to/ / mchog tu phra ba'i rdul gyi phra ba nyid du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rang bzhin phra ba nyid kyang yongs su snang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po'ang sangs
293a3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gyi rang bzhin rdul gyi phra ba nyid las 'das te gnas so/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po ni 'od dang / gza' dang / zla ba spangs pa ste/ 'dus ma byas kyi rang
293a4(mdo sde): bzhin nyid kyis shin tu phra ba'i rdul gyi phra ba nyid du mi snang gi/ gzhan du mya ngan las 'das pa dang / nam mkha' dang / ma brtags par 'grog pa lta bus byang chub sems dpa'
293a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan na spyod pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gzigs so//
293a6(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub dpa'i mthu phyung ba de dag gzigs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis phyogs bcur
293a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa la gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa la bka' stsal
293b1(mdo sde): pa/ rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa/ stug po'i rgyan ces bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa dang
293b2(mdo sde): 'du shes med pa'i sems can du gtogs pa'i gzugs sred pa dang / ma rig pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi 'bras bu ye shes kyi mes rnam par bsregs te gnas gyur pa'i phyir/ ye
293b3(mdo sde): shes kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / yid bzhin gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / yid bzhin gyi lus stobs dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang pos brgyan pa/
293b4(mdo sde): gsang med pa/ ring du gnas pa/ zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / nor bu dang / glog dang / 'ja' dang / byu ru dang / ba bla dang / ldong ros dang / mtshal dang / 'og ma se'i 'bru
293b5(mdo sde): dang king shu ka dang / sin+d+ra go pa dang / gser dang / tsam pa ka dang / pad+mo dang / dung dang / rma bya'i mgul dang / mdongs bu me long gi nang na 'dug pa'i gzugs brnyan
293b6(mdo sde): bu thob nas/ sa dang sar zag pa med pas sbyangs pa'i rgyu ting nge 'dzin la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir smon lam gyi mthar phyin pa bcu'i sngo bas lus thob pa'i khyad par can dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing
293b7(mdo sde): stug por 'ong ngo / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa stan las langs
294a1(mdo sde): / bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar bas
294a2(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs gcig
294a3(mdo sde): cig zhu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la zhu ba zhus pa lung bstan pa'i slad du/ skabs dbye bar gnang na bdag gis zhu'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
294a4(mdo sde): rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la dris shig dang / ngas ci dang ci 'dod pa
294a5(mdo sde): de dang de'i dri ba dris pa lung bstan pas/ sems mgu bar bya'i/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar smros shig/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa ji lta ba
294a6(mdo sde): bzhin du ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs
294a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing stug po 'ba' zhig 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can las 'das te gnas sam/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan
294b1(mdo sde): dag kyang de yin nam/ ci lags/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po 'ba' zhig 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems
294b2(mdo sde): can las 'das te gnas pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag kyang yod do// rigs kyi bu 'di nas pha rol shin tu'ang pha rol sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag brgya 'das
294b3(mdo sde): pa'i steng gi phyogs na na/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / de bzhin du sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i rgyal
294b4(mdo sde): po'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / skar ma'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom
294b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das dgra bcom pa yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi pha rol shin tu'ang pha rol tu 'das pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag brgya mang po byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi tshogs
294b6(mdo sde): kyis brgyan pa/ shin tu yangs shing che ba dag yod de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang 'khor gyi tshogs de dang de dag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la bdag
294b7(mdo sde): gi so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi rtogs pa'i spyod yul gyi gtam dang / mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i chos tshig dang / rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul dang / yi ge dang bral
295a1(mdo sde): ba de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byed pa/ phyin ma'i mtha'i mur gtugs pa ston/ de ni rnam par bkod pa yang dag
295a2(mdo sde): pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston te/ de ni gang rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa khyod kyis 'di'i pha rol na/ 'jig rten gzhan dang sangs rgyas dag yod dam zhes smras pa de'i la
295a3(mdo sde): dungs 'di smras so/ / rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa khyod 'ba' zhig sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyun dang / byang chub sems dpa' la ltad mo blta bar 'dod pa'i phyir/

295a5(mdo sde): zhing gi rgyan dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / spyi gtsug tshad med pa la ltang mo blta bar 'dod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag brgyar song ba nas/
295a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma snyed du rdzu 'phrul gyi mchog gis gyen du song yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shugs 'dzin 'di de bzhin gshegs pa gcig tsam gyi sangs
295a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan nam/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor ram/ spyi gtsug bltar tshad med pa'ang ma mthong ste/ nges ma mthong ba dang / ngo mtshar du gyur nas
295b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / spyi gtsug bltar tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang dag par rjes su dran zhing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
295b2(mdo sde): nyid du phyin nas mnyan du yod par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ nyes pa la nyes par bshags nas/ sangs rgyas rnams nam mkha' dang mnyam par shes
295b3(mdo sde): te mngon par bstod nas/ bdag gis so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rtogs pa'i spyod yul la mngon par mos shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po nyid du song ste gnas
295b4(mdo sde): par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos dang sa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas pa phra ba dang / dmigs su phebs pa dang / rnam par
295b5(mdo sde): gdon mi za ba'i gtam zlos pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de

296a5(mdo sde): ba'i spyod pa'i sa la spyod pa dang / gzugs dang / mtshan nyid dang / yang dag par bsdu ba'i lta bar ltung ba rnams dang / mur 'dug gzhan gyi smra ba la mngon par chags pa'i blo'i
296a6(mdo sde): spyod yul la spyod pa rnams dang / rdul dang gces pa dang / dbang po dang / phyogs dang / dus dang / nam mkha' dang / bdag dang / yid dang / dbang po dang / don
296a7(mdo sde): bar 'du ba'i lta bar lhung ba rnams kyi blo rnam par bzlog pa'i slad du bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bstan du gsol/ ma rig pa dang / sred pa dang / las dang / mig dang /
296b1(mdo sde): gzugs dang / snang ba dang / de las skye ba'i yid la byed pa dang / gsum 'du ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa can dang / rgyu dang / de ma dag pa dang / dbang dang / dmigs pa'i rten las
296b2(mdo sde): byung ba'i rnam par shes pa la chags par spyod pa dang / yod pa dang / med par smra ba'i rtog pa can dang / chos 'di pa'i phung po dang gang zag stong pa nyid du lta bar lhung ba rnams kyi'ang blo rnam
296b3(mdo sde): par bzlog pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/ chos kyi dbang po thos par 'gyur gyis/ bde bar gshegs pa bstan du gsol/ rnam shes lnga yi rgyu la sogs//
296b4(mdo sde): mnga' bdag dam pa ma gtogs par// sangs rgyas blo dang shes bya dang / ji ltar gang gi 'tshang rgya zhing // shes bya rnam pa lnga po rnams// thugs su chud pa sangs rgyas te// chos
296b5(mdo sde): rnams thams cad mkhyen pas na/ / mya ngan 'da' dang mnyam gshegs pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dga'o dge'o rdo rje'i snying po sa bcu la dbang ba/ rnam par rtog
296b6(mdo sde): pa'i spyod yul las 'das pa/ mkhas pa chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi rigs grags par byed pa/ dge'o rnal 'byor dam pa la dbang ba sangs rgyas dang / 'tshang rgya bar yongs su
296b7(mdo sde): dri ba 'di la ni khyod 'ba' zhig lhad mo byung ba ma yin gyi/ sgyu ma byed pa bzang po dang / rgyal ba'i bu gzhan dag kyang don 'di la ltang mo 'byung zhing / sangs rgyas kyi dngos po 'dri ste/
297a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don 'di ci zhig/ ci gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ 'on te gzugs las gzhan zhig de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/
297a2(mdo sde): de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi 'du byed las kyang ste/ nang dang phyi'i mnyam pa nyid kyang mi mthong zhing / byas pa'i rgyu dang / 'jig pa'i chos can gyi phyir pung
297a3(mdo sde): po rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa med de/ rdul phra mo med pa thugs su chud pa'i phyir/ shes rab dang / ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul te/ mnyam par gzhag pa'i thugs
297a4(mdo sde): kyis/ yang dag par rjes su ma gzigs shing / phung po rnams ma skyes pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku yin pas na rtag pa nyid do snyam mo// kye rgyal ba'i bu chos
297a5(mdo sde): kyi shin tu dbyings phye ba la mkhas pa dge'o/ / kye rgyal ba'i bu de bas na dge bar shin tu nyon te yid la gyis shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das dge'o zhes nas
