297a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan no/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu rdo rje lta bu'i snying po ting nge
297a7(mdo sde): 'dzin la dbang ba/ rdo rje'i snying po phung po rnams ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin/ phung po las gzhan na'ang med de/ phung po la gnas pa'ang ma yin/ phung po'ang gnas ma yin/
297b1(mdo sde): skye ba dang / 'jig pa'ang gnas pa ma yin/ shes par bya ba'ang ma yin/ shes pa'ang ma yin/ don kyang ma yin// dbang po rnams kyang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phung po
297b2(mdo sde): dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / yul rnams ni mno bsam med pa'i phyir te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'di rnams las nang ngam phyir yang mi blta'o// gzugs ni bskyed
297b3(mdo sde): pa med cing sems med pa ste/ 'byung ba med pa'i chos can mthar 'jig pa rtswa dang / shing dang / bong rdo dang 'dra ba/ shin tu phra ba'i rdul gyi tshogs dbu ba dang 'dra ba'o// tshor ba ni gnyis
297b4(mdo sde): tshogs pa las chu'i chu bur dang 'dra bar skye'o/ / 'du shes ni bum pa dang / snam bu dang / cod pan la sogs pa'i rgyu las byung ba ste/ de'ang gnyis las skyes pa smig rgyu dang 'dra ba ste/
297b5(mdo sde): dper na dpyid kyis mngon par gdungs pa'i sa la nyi ma'i 'od zer bab pa gyen du langs pa rnams chu'i rlabs lta bur rlab cing / ri dgas dang bya skom gyis nyen cing / chu tshol ba rnams
297b6(mdo sde): chur rmongs par bya bas rmongs par byed do/ / de bzhin du 'du shes kyang de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa'i gzugs su 'jug pa/ yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa las
297b7(mdo sde): skyes pa/ dpyod pa pa rnams kyis brjod pa las logs shin tu mi dmigs pa/ bong bu'i rwa dang / mo gsham gyi bu brjod pa ltar ming tsam du zad pa ste/ rmi lam gyi gzugs
298a1(mdo sde): brjod pa ltar blta'o/ / dper rmi lam na gzugs kyi 'du shes mthong ba zad pa'i tshe/ gzugs la sogs pa dang / bud med bzang mo'ang dmigs su
298a2(mdo sde): med do/ / de bzhin du mi shes pas log pa na bud med dang skyes pa la sogs pa mthong ba'ang mngon par sangs rgyas na mi dmigs so// 'du byed rnams ni chu shing gi snying po lta
298a3(mdo sde): bu ste/ btsal na lus dang / ngag dang / yid las byung ba gzugs med pa rnams rnal 'byor can gyi spyod pa pa rnams kyis mi rnyed do// rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu de'i bdag
298a4(mdo sde): nyid med pa ste/ sgyu ma byed pa'am de'i slob mas nan tan du rtswa dang / shing dang / bong rdo tsam la brten te gzugs kyi yan lag du ma las mngon par bsgrubs pa'i sgyu ma'i gzugs
298a5(mdo sde): glang po che dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / mi dang / rgyan ma brtags pa'i gzugs kyi phyogs gcig na ngo mtshar du bstan pa lta bu dang / gzhan yang mkhas pa rnams la ma yin gyi
298a6(mdo sde): byis pa'i 'gro ba rnams la 'dring ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'ang rnam pa gzhan du 'dug la/ rnam pa gzhan du shin tu brtags shing shin tu rtog ste/ de'ang bdag nyid
298a7(mdo sde): kyis bdag la 'dzin pa gnyis su shes nas/ sgyu mas mngon par grub pa'i gzugs gcig po'i ngo mtshar dang 'dra bar phyir ldog go// de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa// brtan pa
298b1(mdo sde): ther zug mi 'jig pa ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom pa'i rnal 'byor can rnams kyi yul yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bsgrags pa/ mya ngan las
298b2(mdo sde): 'das pa'i dbyings dang / nam mkha' lta bur mi 'jig pa ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgra chos kyi dbyings kyi tshigs gis 'das pa dang / byung ba dang / 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas
298b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung // chos rnams kyi chos nyid/ chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos kyi dbying
298b4(mdo sde): dang / chos skyon med pa nyid po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rdo rje'i snying po skyon med pa zhes bya ba ni/ yang 'byung ba'i nyes pa thams cad dang bral ba'o// rdo rje'i snying po skyon
298b5(mdo sde): med pa ni nyes pa thams cad dang bral bar ma zad kyi/ ting nge 'dzin la'ang 'jug go// skyon med par 'da' ba ni/ byang chub sems dpas spang bar bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
298b6(mdo sde): 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo de nyid du mos te/ sems can la lta ba med par gyur cing / yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byas nas/ lcags bsregs pa'i me dang 'dra bar mya ngan las
298b7(mdo sde): 'da' bar gyur te/ de sems can gyi dgos pa la brtson 'grus btang zhing / snying rje chen po dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang bral bas/ sangs rgyas kyi gdung rnam par chad par
299a1(mdo sde): byed cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas mur 'dug byed pa'i lam du 'gros/ ting nge 'dzin gyi 'dam bu glang po chen po 'dra bar rnam par thogs
299a2(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa'i yul rab tu zhum pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi skye mched thams cad kyis kun nas mi gnas shing / rdzogs par mi byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir mngon du mi bya shing
299a3(mdo sde): ma reg pa dang / nye bar mi bsgrub par gnas par bya'o// de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku'i rjes su zhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid shes pas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
299a4(mdo sde): ba'i sangs rgyas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshul gyi yul la nye bar spyod pa/ sprul pa'i yul can/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin las bslang ba'i sbyor ba sa brgyad pa las
299a5(mdo sde): 'das pa/ chos kyi sprin gyi sa la shes par rab tu byas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid myong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag gi so so rang gi rig pa/ 'phags pa'i
299a6(mdo sde): ye shes kyis rtogs pa'i spyod yul gyi sar zhugs te thams cad du 'gro ba/ ma g.yos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spyod pa lhun gyis grub pa/ rtag pa/ zer zug pa/ brtan pa// sangs
299a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing stug po na gnas par 'gyur te/ rdo rje'i dbang po sa la dbang ba rnams la 'phrul pa'i 'jug pa ston par 'gyur te gnas gyur pa/ yid bzhin gyi ye shes dang / ting nge
299b1(mdo sde): 'dzin can stobs dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang la spyod pa ngang pa'i rgyal po dang 'dra bar ma zhugs pa'i chu'i zla ba lta bur 'gro ste/ blta ba'i
299b2(mdo sde): d on yod pa mi'i bdag po thams cad kyi tshogs kyi 'khor du sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta bur 'dod pa'i gzugs dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po bstan pa'i phyir
299b3(mdo sde): sems can gyi bsam pa bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur ro/ / 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang po thams cad dang / dbang sgyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nor bu rin
299b4(mdo sde): po che'i snying po la sogs pa'i gnas dag tu bde ba rnams myong bar byas te/ sa'i rim pa rnams bstan nas/ zhing nas zhing du phun sum bde ba rnams rab tu ston cing / phyi ma'i
299b5(mdo sde): mthar thug par sku grub pa'i sngags 'chang ltar mi snang zhing / khang khyim gyi lha ltar de na gnas bzhin du mi snang ba'i gzugs su khyim na 'dug pa ltar/ de dag sprul pa'i 'od zer
299b6(mdo sde): dang / 'phrul pas sprul pa la spyod cing 'gro'o// song nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku nub ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la zhen nas gnas par 'gyur ro//
299b7(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// dbang po phung po sprul yin te// sred dang ma rig las kyang min// bag chags kyis bcings
300a1(mdo sde): mi bzad pa/ / yul dang dbang po'i rgyu las byung // rnam dpyod tshogs ni 'dod chags rnams// zhags pa sems spyod de yin no// khro ba me lce mnyam
300a2(mdo sde): pa ste/ / zhe sdang dug gi dngos po yin// thub spyod rnal 'byor bzang can gyi// 'di dag rtag tu rnam gzhigs te// phung po rnams ni dor ba'i phyir// rnal 'byor can gyis rnal
300a3(mdo sde): 'byor spyod/ / gzugs ni 'byung ba'i tshogs yin te// phung po'i lhag ma gzugs med pa// ji bzhin par snang ri mo dang // grib ma sdong dum la sogs med// mkha' la
300a4(mdo sde): rlung gzugs mi snang dang / / bya yi rjes rnams ji bzhin ni// mkhas pas so so rang rig pa// yang dag nyid dang yang dag mtha'// tshig gi spyod yul 'das pa ni// sangs
300a5(mdo sde): rgyas dngos po mi snang ste/ / sangs rgyas smras ni mya ngan 'das// mya ngan 'das kyang sangs rgyas te// rnam rtog rtog dang bral bas na// de ni bstan du mi nus pa'i// rgyu dang 'bras
300a6(mdo sde): bu med pa ste/ / yod dang med kyis rnam par spangs// rdo ba phye mar btags pa la// gser ni yod par mi snang ste// sbyangs pa'i las kyi khyad par gyis// gser ni snang bar 'gyur
300a7(mdo sde): ba yin/ / gzugs rnams rdul du rnam gzhigs te// mkhas pas phung po lhag ma dang // khams dang skye mched tshogs rnams dang // rnam par shes dang dbang po dag/ gcig
300b1(mdo sde): dang tha dang dngos por yang / / rdul phran rnam par rab sbyangs na// dngos por sangs rgyas yod pa min// sangs rgyas med pa'ang ma yin te// rnal 'byor can rnams sangs rgyas
300b2(mdo sde): mthong / / mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis can// gang na sdug bsngal de na bde// de nyid la ni snang ba yin// sangs rgyas med ces mi bya ste// sangs rgyas mnyam par gzhag pa
300b3(mdo sde): yod/ / rgyu yi sangs rgyas dge ba can// rtsa ba mkhas pa nyid kyang ste// 'jig rten kun gyi rgyal ba dang // yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // 'di dag sangs rgyas
300b4(mdo sde): lngar gsungs so/ / sprul pa'i rgyal ba lhag ma rnams// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yid// mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis can// de bas sangs rgyas yod pa ste//
300b5(mdo sde): rnal 'byor can gyis thub pa mthong // khams rnams gsum po 'das pa dang // rnam pa du mar sangs rgyas zhing // de bzhin gshegs kyi lha rdzas zhing // rgyal sras bzung
300b6(mdo sde): pos kun tu gang / / de na thub tshan sangs rgyas bzhugs// mtshan gyis kun nas yongs su rgyas// rnal 'byor rnal la mnyam par gzhag/ chos dang bcas su rnam par mdzes//
300b7(mdo sde): de bzhin phan tshun bsam gtan mdzad// shes rab ma shes shes byed la// stug po de na rnam par spyod// stug po de yi sems can su// sangs rgyas gzugs can de dag
301a1(mdo sde): kun/ / skad cig 'jig pa shin tu 'das// ting nge 'dzin la rtag tu mos// dga' ldan nas babs 'phrul pa gang // rtog pa can rnams kun gyis
301a2(mdo sde): mthong / / stug po nas gshegs glang po ste// sangs rgyas gzugs ni sdug na bzhugs// sna tshogs rnam mang gzugs tshul te// sems can bsam bzhin zhugs pa'i sa/
301a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam gzhag pa// chu yi zla ba bzhin du snang // sna tshogs gzugs kyi nor bu ni// tshon gyi 'byor las rnam par mdzes// de bzhin sangs rgyas stug zhings
301a4(mdo sde): mnyam par bzhag pas rnam pas mdzes/ / thams cad chos la gzugs brnyan ltar// gcig dang tha dad spangs pa ste// dgos par kun la 'jug pa ni// skyes bu dam pa thams
301a5(mdo sde): cad mkhyen/ / rdul las ma yin dus las min// dbang po las min gces las min// rkyen gyis ma yin 'jig rten dang // sangs rgyas ldan par rnam mdzes pa// rgyu yi tshul
301a6(mdo sde): du sangs rgyas ni/ / 'bras bu rnams la rnam par mdzes// 'jig rten skul 'khod bya ste// rgya mtsho ri dang shing dag dang // de la 'gro ba sna tshogs bcas// mnyam par bzhag
301a7(mdo sde): pas shin tu dgyes/ / bya ba thams cad phyi nang du// gza' zla la sogs mdzes pa'i rnams// phyir yang phyag gis mthil bkod do// yungs 'brur 'gro ba kun 'dzud pa// sangs
301b1(mdo sde): rgyas thub pa'i rnal 'byor mnga'/ / thub chen thub pa'i dam pa'o// 'jig rten rnams la byed pa med// sangs rgyas 'phrul gyis sprul pa ste// 'byung ba gsum po 'di dag kun//
301b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'od kyis rnam par sprul// rab rib mi shes myos mdongs pa'i// rtog pa can rnams 'phyan pa yin// bdag dang bdag med lta ba'i rnams// yod dang med pa'i smra
301b3(mdo sde): bas bcom/ / 'on tam thams cad 'jig pa dang // cung zad 'jig pas smra ba rnams// 'di la med dam cung zad dam// bdag dang bdag med ga la yod// sangs rgyas sna
301b4(mdo sde): tshegs 'byung kun na/ / rnam 'byor mkhan po rnam par mdzes// dri za'i grong la bya ba rnams// ji ltar snang ba 'jig rten na// rmi lam rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs// ri dgas
301b5(mdo sde): rnams la smig rgyu bzhin/ / de bzhin 'jig rten sna tshogs dag/ gdeg la sogs pa'i las rnams kyang // rlung ldan sogs pa'i zag pa bzhin// sangs rgyas rnal
301b6(mdo sde): 'byor mkhyen pa'i mchog/ mi la 'khrul 'khor bskor ba ste// rgya mtsho skye ba 'dzin dang 'dra// stug po'i ris kyi ye shes kyi rgyan las byung zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//
301b7(mdo sde): / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te// bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom
302a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom
302a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das mtshams med pa lnga bgyid pa rnams dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams dang / 'phag pa spong ba rnam dang / mnar med pa la
302a3(mdo sde): gzhol ba rnam dang / ma dad pa la snying ring ba rnams dang / tshangs pa 'gums pa rnams dang / ba lang 'gums pa 'gums pa'i sems can rnams ji ltar yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur/ bcom
302a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das sems can de dag 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las ji ltar yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sbyin pa gnyis byin pa'i
302a5(mdo sde): sems can rnams 'khor ba de sdug bsngal las yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur te/ de 'di ltar chos kyi sbyin pa dang / zang zing gi sbyin pa'o// chos kyi sbyin pas skye ba dran par 'gyur
302a6(mdo sde): ro/ / zang zing gi sbyin pas ni sems can thams cad la phan btags par 'gyur ro// zang zing gi sbyin pas ni bkres pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal yongs su sbyong ngo // chos kyi
302a7(mdo sde): sbyin pas ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su 'grol to// 'jam dpal sbyin pa gnyis
302b1(mdo sde): po 'di byir/ / sbyin pa thams cad 'dus par 'gyur ro// 'jam 'apal gzhan yang sbyin pa lngas sbyin pa dang / nye ba'i sbyin pa thams cad 'dus par 'gyurate/ lnga gang zhe na/
302b2(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ bzhon pa sbyin pa dang / gdugs sbyin pa dang / dar sbyin pa dang / gos sbyin pa dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad kyi rkyen
302b3(mdo sde): sman dang / yo byad sbyin pa rnams kyis/ sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su sbyangs par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal yang sems can la la mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dag gam/ dam
302b4(mdo sde): pa'i chos spong ba dag gom/ 'phags pa spong ba dag gam/ mnar med pa dag la gzhol ba dag gam/ bskal par gnas pa dag gam/ sems can gang la la dkon mchog
302b5(mdo sde): gsum la snying ring ba 'am/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la gnod par byed pa 'am/ tshogs kyi nor la 'phrog pa dag gam/ chung ngu na lug gsod pa dag kyang rung
302b6(mdo sde): phyag dar ba'ang rung / sme sha can yang rung ste/ 'jam dpal sus shin tu rgyas pa chen po rmad du byung ba'i chos stug po'i rgyan rin chen 'di thos pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa
302b7(mdo sde): dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan la'ang rgya cher yang dag par stor pa dang / chung ngu ra yi ge gcig kyang rung ste/ brjod pa dang / su'ang chos de sgra/
303a1(mdo sde): ba la mchod cing rim gro byed pa dang / nang par langs nas ngo phrad par byed cing blta ba dang / sngar smra ba sbyin par byed pa dang / lag pas reg par byed pa'i sems
303a2(mdo sde): can de dag thams cad 'jam dpal sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur
303a3(mdo sde): ro/ / 'jam dpal sa'i phyogs gang na chos smra ba de 'dug gam/ de'i dur ram/ ro 'am/ ro bam pa zhig yod la// de'i ngo mthong na'ang mtshams med pa'i las lnga rnams
303a4(mdo sde): byang bar 'gyur ro/ / 'jam dpal rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na yi dgas lto dpag tshad brgya stong du mar skyes pa yod de/ yi dgas de bdag gi las kyi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa'i tshor ba yod
303a5(mdo sde): do/ / 'jam dpal de bzhin du sems can su mdo sde chen po rin po che 'di spong ba de dag kyang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal su'ang mdo sde rin po me 'di rim gro byas te/
303a6(mdo sde): me tog dang / bdug spos dang / mar me dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan gyis mchod
303a7(mdo sde): pa dang / chos smra ba de'ang mchod par bya ste/ ci ste chos smra ba de mtshams med pa lnga byed na'ang / 'on kyang de'i sems 'khrugs par mi bya'o// chung ngu na byol song gi skye gnas su
303b1(mdo sde): gtogs pa'i ri dgas dang / bya gang la las chos smra ba de shi ba'i ro bam pa dur khrod na 'dug pa'i sha zos kyang / de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang
303b2(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / ri dgas dang bya gzhan po de dag thams cad phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po 'di nyid du 'thob par 'gyur te/ de la nem
303b3(mdo sde): nur dang / the tsom dang / yid gnyis mi bya'o// sems can gang la la sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sngon byang chub sems dpas yongs su bzung ba/ sngon gyi byang chub sems
303b4(mdo sde): dpa'i sa bon las ma nyams pa de dag thams cad phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na/ mdo sde chen po rin po che 'di thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas kyang mchod pa chen pos mchod par 'gyur ro//
303b5(mdo sde): mdo sde thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyan stug po rin po che las sbyin pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // mtha' yas yul can shin tu phra// bsam gtan mkhyen pa
303b6(mdo sde): skyes bu'i mchog/ dbang po 'das pa mngon sum pa// chags dang dbang po rnam par spangs// bsam gtan bsam pa bsam gtan pa'i// de ni dgos pa'i tshul yin te// thub
303b7(mdo sde): pa rnal 'byor mkhas pa rnams/ / kun gyi snying la gnas pa yin// yod dam med kyi phyogs dang bral// sangs rgyas phyogs ni dri ma med// blo dang shes bya bral ba ste// tshad
304a1(mdo sde): dang dbang po spangs pa yin/ / sems shes rnams kyi yul ma yin// de ni grol ba rnams kyi yul// mtshan rnams kun kyang snang ba ste// de bzhin gshegs ni
304a2(mdo sde): mtshan med pa/ / dregs can rnams kyi dregs med mdzad// mnyam par gzhag cing gos pa med// g.yo ba ma yin g.yo med min// chags med lam la gnas pa ste// lha
304a3(mdo sde): yul byung ba'i lha rnams dang / / dri za lha min mi 'am ci// thub pa rnams dang mur 'dug gis// bstod kyang rtag tu yong mi g.yo// de la ngo mtshar srid pa med// 'gro ba
304a4(mdo sde): gang na'ang g.yo ba med/ / sngon las dag pa'i rnal 'byor gyi// de ni pha rol yin pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas 'phrul pa'i spyod pa yis// bya ba tsam gyi lha rnams kyis// mthong
304a5(mdo sde): yang de dang 'di na med/ / ji bzhin nyi zla de dang 'dra// rnal 'byor yul du gnas pa ni// dregs pa med mdzad 'gro bas mthong // rnam pa tha dang mur 'dug rnams// gang la gang
304a6(mdo sde): gis dbang 'gyur ba/ / de la de lta'i chos ston to// rnal 'byor bskyed pa'i 'od zer gyis// rnal 'byor chos can rnams phye zhing // rgyal ba'i tshul dang gsum po dag/ rgyal po'am
304a7(mdo sde): rgyal po'i 'khor rnams dang / / rgyal po'i yul gyi bya ba dang // dka' thub tshal dang zhing rnams kyi// phun sum tshogs pa de las byung // lha rdzas rnams dang nam mkha' dang //
304b1(mdo sde): rin chen 'byung khung rnam dag pa// lha yi lha yi mthu yis na// phyogs dang yul na 'bab pa yin// 'byung ba gsum gyi thabs rnams gang // rnam pa sna tshogs mkhas
304b2(mdo sde): rnams kyis/ / gang rnams byed gzhug bya ba dag/ sangs rgyas lhun gyis grub 'bras bu// de ni mdo 'dzin 'gro ba yi// dgos dang dka' thub can rig dang // gang mo rtsa ba'i
304b3(mdo sde): sbyor ba dang / / gar mkhan rnams la rtag tu'o// dga' ldan gnas babs 'jig rten gyis// mthong ba bud med 'gro dang bcas// 'phrog cing sbyin dang 'brel ba dang // / cod
304b4(mdo sde): papon can dang lag na gzhur/ / dam pa rnams kyis kun tu mthong // stug po nas ni de ma bral// yul 'di thub pa de yis te// thams cad na yang shin tu snang // rab
304b5(mdo sde): rib can gyi rab ring bzhin/ / ri dgas rnams kyi smig rgyu 'dra// 'jig rten rnams kyi sgyu ma la// ji ltar gzhan du mthong ba dang // rmi lam na yang gzhan du ba'i
304b6(mdo sde): rmi lam bzhin du byis pas mthong / / khyad par rab tu mthong ba ni// rnal 'byor can rnams log long bzhin// lha yi lha yi yul yin te// de yi sras kyi dus kun tu//
304b7(mdo sde): mi sbyin su lang tshangs pa dang // sa nan ta dang sa nan 'da'// sa nan gzhon nu ser skya dang // ne tse la sogs rnams bsams kyang // de yi yul la rnam par bslad// de dag rnal
305a1(mdo sde): 'byor gyis mi mthong / / bub pa gang dag 'byung ba dang // byung dang da ltar gang 'khod pa// de dag yul na gang yang min// lta ba'i bag chags g.yogs pa'i
305a2(mdo sde): phyir/ / sa dang sar ni rnam spyod pa'i// rdo rje'i snying po de la bstan// lha yi lhas ni byas pa yi// stug po'i zhing na yod pa yis// 'di dag rdo rje'i snying po de// mnyam par bzhag
305a3(mdo sde): la shin tu bstan/ / rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor yul// ji ltar gang gis sbyor ba dag/ dbyibs dang mdog dang khyad par dag/ bzo bor gyur pas byas pas na// gces dang rdul
305a4(mdo sde): phran dag gi ste/ / brtags pa'i dngos po yod pa min// skye ba dag ni chos tsam ste// ldog par 'gyur ba chos tsam mo// kun tu phra ba'i bdag nyid kyi// yon tan dag tu dngos yod brtags//
305a5(mdo sde): mar me bzhin du gsal byed pa// rgyu rnams dgos pa sgrub pa dag/ mtshan nyid snga nas mi rnyed de// 'jig dang bral bas mi gnas pa'o// 'das pa 'das pa'i dngos por yang // yod pa
305a6(mdo sde): ma yin 'byung ba med/ / rkyen du bya rnams med par yang // brtag pa'i dngos po gang yang med// rkyen rnams 'dus te byas pa la// dngos po yod pa ma yin te// rkyen rnams gang gi rkyen
305a7(mdo sde): du 'gyur/ / yod dang med pa'i dngos mi snang // med pa'ang snang ba yod ma yin// phra ba'i bdag gis rnam par brtags// phung po rdza ma ras la sogs// ri dgas skom gdungs smig rgyu bzhin//
305b1(mdo sde): rmi lam dri za 'dra ba ste// gtsug lag nor ba dug dang bcas// rab tu smra ba sum brgya yis// 'jug pa dag dang phyir ldog dag/ mya ngan 'da' ba gang yang med// de nas
305b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par bkod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa/ sa'i dbang po lag pa'i 'phreng ba tshad med pa/ lus dpe med pa/ dpung rgyan dang / cod pan
305b3(mdo sde): dang gtsug gi rin po che dang / se mo dos shin tu chas pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ theg pa gsum
305b4(mdo sde): dang / 'jig rten dang mi 'gal ba/ lta ba'i chos la bdag gi so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rig pa'i spyod yul bde ba la gnas pa/ rdo rje snying po'i dbang po rnal 'byor
305b5(mdo sde): chen po'i rnal 'byor can/ / rnal 'byor gyi mkhan po/ sa dang sa'i mtshams thams cad mi 'gal bar ston pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rdo rje dbang po khyod slu ba thams cad dang //
305b6(mdo sde): rgyal po'i 'khor dag tu/ cod pan can dag la chos ston pa yin te/ de'i phyir rgyal ba'i sras khyod la gsol ba gdab kyis/ bdag gi so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rig
305b7(mdo sde): pa'i spyod yul la bde bar gnas pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa lta ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par spyod pa'i gnas ston cig/ des bdag dang cod pan
306a1(mdo sde): can 'di dag gis bdag la mngon sum du gyur pa'i spyod yul/ sangs rgyas kyi sa'i sgo'i bde ba nan tan gyis rab tu thob ste/ yid bzhin gyi lus rnam pa bcu la
306a2(mdo sde): dbang sgyur zhing / stobs dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang gi gzhal med khang gis gnas gyur te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas spangs te/
306a3(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyi lus yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra ba'i rang bzhin du 'gyur te/ rgyal ba'i tshogs kyi 'khor thams cad dang / stug po stug po na spyod pa rnams la chos sna tshogs ston par
306a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / rdo rje snying pos smras pa/ rgyal po smros shig/ dge'o dge'o// cod pan can la khyad par du// chos la 'jug pa bdag med pa/ stug po'i rgyan ni rab ston pa//
306a5(mdo sde): sems kyi rang bzhin mtshan nyid dag/ rnam rtog spyod yul yin she sa na// rnam rtog don las phyir ldog pa// 'gro ba rnam rtog mthong nas te// 'gro ba'i rang bzhin mthong
306a6(mdo sde): nas kyang / / ting nge 'dzin la gnas par 'gyur// chos kyi ngo bo nyid bstan gyis// rgyal po nga la de nyon cig/ dpyid kyi smig rgyu ji bzhin la// de yi rnam par 'gro bar 'di//
306a7(mdo sde): mtshan gzhi mtshan ma rgyu rnams las// rnam par rtog pa rnam mi rtog/ blo dang rtogs byas bskyed pa ste// rtogs byas de yi khyad gyur pa// gnyen por gyur pa gcig med
306b1(mdo sde): pa/ / nyi ma dang ni grib ltar gnas// sems med tsam po'ang yod pa min// tshad dang gzhal dang gnyis ka med// rnam par rtog pa sems tsam ste// rnam par rtog pa
306b2(mdo sde): rnam mi rtog/ shes dang shes bya rnam rtog pa// sems tsam de ltar yin na ste// shes bya sems dang tsam pa ni// rtag tu tsam la shes yod min// sems kyi chos kyi ngo bo
306b3(mdo sde): nyid/ / gang zag dag kyang g.yo ba rnams// gang tshe sems la rnam brtags na// rtog dang brtags pas spangs pa yin// brgyad po rnyed nas dag par 'gyur// dgu la bsam/
306b4(mdo sde): gtan spyod yul te// bcu la sangs rgyas sangs rgyas kyis// dbang bskur rgyal bar 'gyur ba yin// rgyal ba'i yul la chos rnams kyang // mi zad chos kyi skur 'gyur ro//
306b5(mdo sde): nam mkha'i zad dang 'dra ba ste// sems dang rnam shes de bzhin te// mi 'jigs pa yang ma yin zhing // rtag cing zhi ba bde la brtan// 'dus ma byas pa'i ye shes te// stug
306b6(mdo sde): po'i zhing na rnam par mdzes/ / rnam shes 'byung gsum 'das pa ste// sna tshogs gzugs kyi rin chen bzhin// de bzhin sangs rgyas sa bsam med// stug cing rgyal ba'i gnas
306b7(mdo sde): gyur pa/ / ji ltar gyo mo rnams kyi rgyu// rdza ma chag par bstan pas bzhin// gyo mo rnams kyang rdul gyi ste// rdul kyang mchog phra'i de bzhin du// dngos po rnams kyi rkyen rnams
307a1(mdo sde): la/ rgyu rnams ji ltar snang ba bzhin// zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi// rgyu ni de bzhin zag bcas pa'o// ji ltar shing las me 'byung ba// phyis
307a2(mdo sde): kyang gzhan du 'bar bar byed/ / de bzhin ye shes byung ba'i me// phyis kyang gzhan du 'bar bar bya// gnas kyi lus las 'phos 'gyur cing // sems dang rtog pas rnam spangs
307a3(mdo sde): pa/ / chags pa med pa'i ye shes ro// stug po'i dbus na rnam par mdzes// bskyed med rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs// sa la gnas pa ma yin pa// lta ba thams cad
307a4(mdo sde): zad byed pa'i/ / bdag med nyid la skyabs su song // rgyud kyi rgyun rnams chad pa'i phyir// 'jig pa med cing 'byung med pas// lta ba thams cad zar byed pa// bdag ma
307a5(mdo sde): nyid la skyabs su song / / zhir gyur zhi bzhir ma byas// zhi bas zhi ba bden nyid du// lta ba thams cad rnam dag phyir// bdag med nyid la skyabs su song // sa rnams
307a6(mdo sde): sna tshogs byas pa ni/ / bdag med pa la bdag med pas// mi rtag tho bas bcom pa dang // rnam par ston pa'i mdas kyang ste// bsreg pa tshig pa'i me bzhin du// bdag nyid
307a7(mdo sde): zhir 'gyur de nyid du/ / de bzhin lta bas rnam brtags te// bdag med bsam gtan rab gnas pa// lta ba'i chos la bder gnas kyi// so so rang rig spyod yul la// thog ma
307b1(mdo sde): med nas nyes dri med/ / 'phags pa rnams kyi sa la gnas// 'phags gnas 'jig rten pas spangs te// 'jig rten 'das pa'i 'phags la gnas// sems kyi
307b2(mdo sde): sa las rab gyur te/ / stug po'i dkyil na rnam par mdzes// mi bdag mi bdag dbang po rnams// thams cad kyis kyang yang smras pa// rdo rje snying po skyabs dang mgon//
307b3(mdo sde): gang la skyabs su mchi bar bgyid// sangs rgyas yod min med pa min// phung po'i skye shing rnams bsregs te// dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud bcom ste// stug po sangs rgyas sa
307b4(mdo sde): la gnas/ / shes bya dri med zhi ba la// skyabs su song zhig grogs po dag/ rtog dang tshad las bral bas te// blo dang rtogs bya'i gnas ma yin// stug po'i dkyil
307b5(mdo sde): bzhugs rnal 'byor can/ / de yang grogs po mgon skyabs so// rnal 'byor can rnams kun gyi zhing // zhing mchog bzang ba stug po'o// rnal 'byor 'byor pa mang
307b6(mdo sde): pos gang / / stug po de la skyabs su song // spros pa kun dang bral ba ste// lta ba'i nyes pa rnam par spangs// ri mo'i thag thug lta bu dang // rmi lam mo gsham bu byung dang //
307b7(mdo sde): rmi lam bud med bzang mo ltar// thub pa rnams kyis 'gro ba mthong // dri za'i grong khyer spyod pa bzhin// skra phung mgal pa bskor ba ltar// smig rgyu ri dgas sred mtshungs su//
308a1(mdo sde): yod dang med pa rnam par spangs// sgyu ma'i lus gzugs sna tshogs dang // sprul pa'i sprul par de dag ni// 'jig rten spyod tshe mthong ba ste// sa dngas//
308a2(mdo sde): la thub pa rnams// bsngor med du ma'i gzugs gyur pa// sgyu ma'i shing gi 'bras bu ltar// sprin dang du ba glog ltar yang // bub pas rnal 'byor rnam par mthong // rdza la
308a3(mdo sde): sogs pa'i bzo gzung ltar/ / 'gro ba bdag gi rnam rtog byung // yid dang yid kyi rnam shes dang // chos lnga'i ngo bo nyid rnams dang // 'jug pa'i rnam shes spyod pa ni// bdag
308a4(mdo sde): med mi gnyis brgyan pa ste/ / bag chags thog ma med pa yi// sems kyi gnas ngan len byung yod// 'od pa'i dba' rlabs 'dra bar ni// kun gzhi sa la gnas pa yin//
308a5(mdo sde): rlung gis ji ltar 'od pa la// phan tshun dag tu bskyod byas nas// dba' rlabs rnams la 'jig pa med// 'od pa'ang med par mi 'gyur te// sa med bag chags gnas can
308a6(mdo sde): rnams/ / 'jug pa'i yul la gzhol ba dag/ sems brgyad rnams kyi 'jug pa ni// rnam par thar pa ma yin te// dus gcig tu yang de dag 'byung // bar bar du ni rims kyis
308a7(mdo sde): so/ / thog ma med nas sems 'jug pa// skar ma gza' yi dkyil 'khor dang // lo ma me tog 'bras bu dang // ri dang sde dang tshal sogs la// rtag tu dus gcig 'jug pa
308b1(mdo sde): ste/ / rims kyis kyang ni shes par byos// yang dag ma yin snga ma'i yul// mal la gnas bzhin mthong ba yin// lus kyi 'jug pa'i rims kyis kyang // srog la chen
308b2(mdo sde): cing 'byung ba yin/ / rdzas dang grangs dang chos rnams la// tha dad rims kyis 'byung ba ste// mur zhing bca' dang bza' rnams la// tha dad rims kyis 'da' ba min//
308b3(mdo sde): ro dang dri yi rnam pa la// rims kyis tha dad 'byung ba yin// rims kyis kha dog khyed par gyi// sna tshogs la yang dus gcig tu// rgyal po sems ni bsam mi khyab// rtag
308b4(mdo sde): tu rang bzhin 'od can no/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ste// rdo ba rnams kyi gser bzhin gnas// yid ni kun gyi gzhi las byung // yid kyi rnam shes de bzhin te// rnam
308b5(mdo sde): shes drug po rnam pa mang / / sa yi khyad par byed pa po// bag chags sems dang lhan cig tu// sa bon kun pa'i kun gzhi ni// kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag kyang // rtag
308b6(mdo sde): tu rang bzhin 'od can gyis/ / de ltar nga bzhin gshegs kyi rigs// nges dang ma nges dge pa yin// rtag tu gnas ltar 'byung ba ni// rgya mtsho rlabs dag ji bzhin du//
308b7(mdo sde): tha ma 'bring dang rab rnams su// de bzhin kun gzhis khyad par byed// sangs rgyas sa la rnam dag cing // gzhan du gyur nas rnam par mdzes// yang dag ji bzhin don ston la//
309a1(mdo sde): rdo rje snying pos yang smras pa// mthong zhing thos te shes pas na// sa chen bdag po khyod nyid kyi// spobs pa can la bstan par gyis// khyad par du'o/
309a2(mdo sde): khyad par bdag/ khams phran rnams kyi khams nang na// sa la 'khor lo 'khor rnams kyi// kun gzhi rnam par dag gyur na// sa yi rgyal por 'gyur ba yin//
309a3(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling la dbang ba yin// 'khor lo 'khor bar yang 'gyur ro// dga' ldan la sogs gzhal med du// mtshe ma rab kyi dbang por 'gyur//
309a4(mdo sde): dbang po'i gnas su dbang por te// dbang sgyur gnas su de bzhin no// 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang po'i bdag/ gzugs khams bdag po'ang de bzhin te// gzugs
309a5(mdo sde): med 'du shes med sems can/ / bsam gtan bde ba'i 'bras bur yang // yang dag mngon bya ma chags pas// yang dag mtho la ma reg par// 'jigs med seng
309a6(mdo sde): ge'o sgra sgrog cing / / dga' dang ye shes yang dag ldan// bsam gtan dbang gi bde bas ngoms// de ni stug por smon pa yin// khams gsum spyod pa'i nyes pa yis//
309a7(mdo sde): chags med mnyam par gzhag pa ste// mthar gyis stug por zhugs nas su// rnam par sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sar// chos kyi dbang po bdag gyur te// rten las
309b1(mdo sde): gzhan du gyur cing bde/ / rtag pa brtan pa zhi ba'i chos// stug po'i dkyil na sras dang bcas// chos kyi bdag po rnam par mdzes// 'jig pa med pa mi yi mchog/ mya ngan
309b2(mdo sde): 'dus pa 'jig pa min/ / mur 'dug rnams kyis cir brjod bzhin// mchog dang tha ma bar ma yi// rgyal po bcu po'i las rnams kyi// theg pa gsum du gyur pa ste// stug
309b3(mdo sde): po tshol ba'i khyad par yang / / rgyal po yang dag skye bar 'gyur// sa dang sa la gnas pas so// 'jig na 'dus byas nyes par 'gyur// 'chi ba rnams la de bzhin te// rgyal
309b4(mdo sde): po 'jig pa mthar ma yin/ / de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sku// sems can zad cing med 'gyur ba// de ste mya ngan 'das 'jig na// sngon gyi mtha' yang 'jig pa dang //
309b5(mdo sde): sems can 'byung ba med par 'gyur// sems can khams rnams zad gyur na// rgyal ba'i shes bya dngos po med// mya ngan 'da' med shes bya med// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas
309b6(mdo sde): nyid kyang med/ / me mar bsregs pa'i dpe rnams dang // sa bon tshig pa'i dpe dag gis// rtog can thar la mkhas pa rnams// lus can rnams la thar pa ston// yod
309b7(mdo sde): dang med pa'i rnam thar gyis/ / thar pa'i bde las de dag ring // bsam gtan gnas pa thams cad de// lugs su 'byung dang bzlog pa dang // gzugs med 'du shes
310a1(mdo sde): med pa dang / / mngon shes dbang dang stobs rnams dang // ma nyams nyams pa med pa yi// chos kyi mtshan la mkhas pa rnams// sa yi khams la
310a2(mdo sde): mkhas pa dag/ mi yi dbang po stug por 'gro// yod dang med pa 'jig pas ni// de dag 'khor las mi 'byung ste// phrad pa gsum po 'jig byed cing // rgyu dang dmigs pa'i
310a3(mdo sde): rkyen rnams dang / / de ma thag dang dbang yang ste// sa rnams bdag med phyi rol dag/ mig dang gzugs dag rgyur byas te// phrad pas gang rnams 'jug gyur pa// gzugs
310a4(mdo sde): rnams mngon byed ye shes dang / / de dag thams cad zhig par 'gyur// phyi dang nang gi sa rnams ni// phan tshun stobs kyis byung ba ste// yod dang med pa'i lta ba las// de
310a5(mdo sde): sta grol nas 'jig na ni/ / sems dang dmigs las bral ba'i phyir// rnam par dmigs pas mi gnas te// mdun du rtog pa med gyur cing // de yi rang bzhin mi
310a6(mdo sde): gnas la/ / gang tshe dmigs pa spang ba la// rnam par rtog pa mi gnas shing // gang tshe gnyis las rnam grol te// rtog med rtog pa spangs pa na// de tshe sems ni mnyam
310a7(mdo sde): par bzhag/ 'gro ba rnam rtog med pa mthong // gzung dang 'dzin pa med pa ste// bsam gyis mi khyab shes la gnas// rten pa las ni gyur pa ste// ye shes gnas ngan len pa
310b1(mdo sde): spangs/ / yid bzhin rnam pa bcu po ni// sna tshogs gzugs kyis brgyun pa ste// sa gsum rgyal po rab byed cing // rgyal po stug por rab tu 'gro// gzugs dang sems
310b2(mdo sde): dang sems las byung / / mi ldan pa dang 'dus ma byas// nang dang phyi yi sa rnams kyang // tha dang rnam par rab mthong zhing // so so rang gi ye shes mkhas// lta ba'i chos
310b3(mdo sde): la rnam par gnas/ / rgyal po stug por 'dong ba ni// ye shes mkhas pa rnal 'byor can// mtshan ma ming dang de bzhin nyid// rnam par rtog dang ye shes dang // yang dag
310b4(mdo sde): mtha' la gnas pa yis/ / so so rang rig spyod yul du// rgyal po dag dang rgyal po'i bu// rnal 'byor sems pa'i rnal 'byor can// rgyal po stug por 'dong ba ni//
310b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bstod pa'i zhing du'o// phrad pa gsum dang rkyen spangs te// bdag gi phyogs las 'phags gyur na// phyogs las nyams pas 'jig pa ni// rtog pa can
310b6(mdo sde): dang mnyam par 'gro/ / ma grub pa dang yang dpe yi// rgyal po 'gal bar shin tu 'gyur// rnam par rtog dang nyes pa'i mtshan// de dag rnam pa lngar 'gyur ro// phrad pa
310b7(mdo sde): gsum po sun 'byin pa/ / nud zos bung ba ji bzhin du// de bzhin 'jig rten sun 'byin pa// yang dag ma yin rtog pas smra// de la nyes pa rnam lnga ste// rtog pa bslang
311a1(mdo sde): pa'i mig can la/ / 'dra chos mi 'dra chos skyon can// nor dang bzlog pa med pa dang // bdag gi phyogs las nyams pa'i blo// pha rol phyogs la brten pa
311a2(mdo sde): dang / / lta ba de dag 'byung ba ni// thog ma'i mtha' ni 'jig byed pa'o// sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha'// rgyal po yod pa ma yin te// kun tu rgyug cing 'khor ba dag/
311a3(mdo sde): 'byung ba dog par rgyug pa'o// de dang de yi lam rgyud du// thugs rje'i dbang gis rgyal ba gshegs// sprul pa'i 'od zer lha rdzas kyis// zla ba lta bur rgyu zhing 'khor/
311a4(mdo sde): ma'i las dang tshul mthun par// pa skyabs chos rnams ston pa mdzad// rgyud dang rgyud du bying rnams la// chos kyang bstan par mi 'gyur te// de ste mya ngan 'da' 'jig na//
311a5(mdo sde): rgyal bas yon tan ci zhig brnyes// dbang sgyur gsum po rnams dang yang // rnam par thar dang bden pa mthong // rdzu 'phrul rkang pa gzhi po dang // dran pa nyer gzhag stong pa
311a6(mdo sde): nyid/ / tha dad yang dag shes bzhi dang // 'dri la lung bstan pa rnams dang // dmigs pa dang ni de ma thag/ rgyu dang dbang yang de bzhin te// gzugs med pa dang spyod pa dang //
311a7(mdo sde): dbang po stobs rnams bcas pa dang // mngon par shes dang dad rnams dang // rnam par shes dang de'i rgyu dang // 'dus byas ma byas chos rnams dang // byang chub yan lag gang zag dang
311b1(mdo sde): rnam par thar dang skyes bu brgyad/ / sa rnams dag dang shes pa dang // zil gyis gnon pa'i 'du mched dang // ye shes mngon du chud pa bcu// sdug bsngal chos nyid shes pa dang //
311b2(mdo sde): sdug bsngal gyis su so sor rtog/ sdug bsngal nyid kyi rjes su shes// 'dus pa rnams kyi chos shes dang // 'dus pa la ni kun rtog dang // 'dus la rjes su 'gro shes dang //
311b3(mdo sde): 'gog pa dag la chos shes dang // 'gog pa dag la rtog pa dang // 'gog la rjes su 'gro shes dang // lam la chos kyi shes pa dang // lam la so sor rtog pa dang // lam
311b4(mdo sde): la rjes su 'gro ba shes/ / shes pa rnams dang slob pa bcu// brgyad pa mang na lan bdun dang // rigs las rigs dang lan cig 'ong // bar chad gcig po'i gang zag dang //
311b5(mdo sde): bar mar mya ngan 'da' ba dang // gzhan skyes mya ngan 'da' ba dang // mngon par 'du byed ma byas dang // steng ma'i rgyud kyang de bzhin te// rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang // ye shes spyod
311b6(mdo sde): yul yin par gsungs/ / rnal 'byor can yul sna tshogs te// tha ma mchog dang bar ma'o// byang chub sems dpa' khyad par du// mchog dang bcas par de la sgom// rang sangs
311b7(mdo sde): rgyas ni dbu mar te/ / nyan thos pa ni tha ma'o// bcu gcig pa dang bcu gnyis pa// lnga gsum bcu drug dag tu yang // sems kyi tshogs kyi 'gog pa ni// rnal 'byor can rnams shin tu byed//
312a1(mdo sde): gang 'das de ni 'gags pa yin// sems ni rang bzhin 'od sdang can// zag pa gang yin de sems min// sems dang lhan cig gnas pa'ang med// ma
312a2(mdo sde): 'ongs pa ni ma byin te/ / da ltar byung ba gnas pa med// sems ni rkyen dang mi ldan par// 'di dang gzhan du'ang skye ba med// bsam gtan bzhin sems med de// 'byung ba'i rgyu la'ang/
312a3(mdo sde): gnod pa med// 'byung ba'i rgyu ni rnam shes te// yid dang rnam shes lnga pa'o// rang gi rnam rtog mi shes pas// dba' rlabs bzhin du'ang 'byung ba yin// rtag dang rtog las rnam
312a4(mdo sde): grol ba/ / thub pa kun gyi kun gzhi'o// yod dang med las lha rdzas su// gzhan 'gyur 'jig pa ma yin zhing // stug po dang ni stug dkyil du// zla ba lta bur rab tu mdzes//
312a5(mdo sde): de ni mi 'jigs bde bar gnas// stug po'i dkyil na sras dang bcas// tha dad ma yin mtshan nyid mkhyen// ye shes ro gcig nyid du 'gyur// bsam yas rnal 'byor yul
312a6(mdo sde): can te/ / rgyal po zla ba lta bur spyod// rgyal po phun sum tshogs pa 'di// rnal 'byor khyer ba thub rnams kyi// rtag par rgyal po de yi phyir// khyed kyi yid kyang rnal 'byor
312a7(mdo sde): shog/ 'dod gnas rnam pa drug po dang // tshangs pa dag gi bcu gnyis dang // gzugs med shes med sems can du// rgyal po khyod ni dbang por gyis// stun por 'dod
312b1(mdo sde): pa'ang thob par te/ / bzang po'i stug por smon pa'i phyir// rgyal po ye shes bcu po rnams// bsgoms na stug por 'akra bar 'gyur// chos dang rjes su 'gro shes dang //
312b2(mdo sde): pa rol sems dang kun rdzob dang // sdug bsngal 'dus pa'i shes pa dang // 'gog dang lam las skyes pa dang // byang ba'i shes dang mi skye dang // khong bzo bsgom pa de
312b3(mdo sde): bzhin te/ / sha kun ta la'i rgyal rigs dang // ig shwa ku dang so ma'i rigs// yang dag don ston rgyal ba'i mchog/ khyod kyi rigs ni khyad par 'phags// de yi rigs su khyod
312b4(mdo sde): skyes shing / / zhum pa med par stug por song // lte ba'i chos la gnas pa yi// rnal 'byor can gnas dri med du// sdud pa bzhin du dbugs rgyu zhing // 'gro rgyu
312b5(mdo sde): lug dang 'dra ba ste/ / rnga 'brug bzhin du lus phyed kyi// 'gro zhing 'ong ba byed pa ni// thams cad lus la yid yin te// sgyu ma'i ri dgas bzhin du gnas// sgyu ma'i
312b6(mdo sde): shing ltar shin tu snang / / chu bo'i nang gi me bzhin du// smin ma mig dang yan lag rnams// sgyur bas rgyal po bzhin du rtsa// sems dang sems las byung dang yid//
312b7(mdo sde): yid kyi rnam par shes pa dag/ chos rnams 'di dag dngos po med// sprin gyi tshul du 'byung ba ste// kun gzhi thams cad sa bon 'di// bag chags rnams kyi yongs su
313a1(mdo sde): bkris/ / sna tshogs gzugs kyi nur bu dang // 'ja' dang glog rnams ji bzhin du// lus can rnams kyi lus kyi yul// de lta'i gzugs su snang
313a2(mdo sde): ba yin/ / lu ma'i pad+mo lta bur dag/ dri med ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin// gsal ba gdon mi za ba'i rigs// sangs rgyas sprul pa bzhin du gnas// mtshan ma'i mthu las
313a3(mdo sde): ming 'byung ste/ / mtshan ma rgyan las byung ba yin// mtshan ma ming dang 'brel ba ste// rkyen rnams kyis kyang rnam par gnas// mtshan ma tshul dang dbyibs dag las// rnam par
313a4(mdo sde): rtog pa shin tu 'byung / / rnam par rtog pa skyed pa yi// rgyu la rnam pa gnyis su gsungs// phyi rol mtshan ma sems rnams dang // bag chags yid kyang de bzhin te// sem
313a5(mdo sde): dang lhan cig ldan pa ni/ / khang pa la ni gnas pa yin// yid dang dbang por ldan pa ni// rnam shes lnga yi rgyu yin te// rtag tu yang dag ye shes kyis// 'jig rten rgyu
313a6(mdo sde): la rnam par lta/ / de ltar byed dang bya ba med// de bzhin nyid 'di rnam gzhan min// thams cad chos kyi de bzhin nyid// phan tshun stobs kyis 'byung ba ste// rnal 'byor can
313a7(mdo sde): rnams de ltar lta/ / de bzhin nyid du gsal bar mthong // rang bzhin yongs su grub pa ni// chos rnams chos nyid de yin te// brtags pa'i dngos po rang bzhin du// chos
313b1(mdo sde): rnams thams cad ma skyes pa/ / stong pa ngo bo nyid med de// yod dang med pa'i phyogs spangs pa// sgyu ma rmi lam rnams dang 'dra// dri za'i grong khyer lta bu ste// skra tshogs
313b2(mdo sde): rnams dang smig rgyu bzhin/ / du ba sprin stug lta bu ni// mtshan ma tshul dang dbyibs rnams kyis// ji ltar ming du 'jug pa yi// tshig dang yi ge mang po dang // ming rnam//
313b3(mdo sde): mang po la yang ste// kun tu brtags pa'i rang bzhin gyis// gzhan gyi dbang ni de las gzhan// yid don dbang po 'dus pa las// sa bon kun nas bag chags dang // tha/
313b4(mdo sde): dad ma yin sems dang bcas// rnam par shes pa kun tu 'byung // gzhan gyi dbang gi rang bzhin yang // phan tshun stobs kyi rgyu las so// so so rang rig shin tu pra//
313b5(mdo sde): mthong ba'i chos la gnas pa ste// rang bzhin yongs su rdzogs pa 'di// 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo// 'phags pa'i rang bzhin zugs chud pas// sangs rgyas rnam
313b6(mdo sde): dang sangs rgyas sras/ / rang bzhin yongs su rdzogs pa ni// yang dag mtha' ru gzigs pas na// skye ba zad ces rnam par gsungs// rangs pa'i lam yang non ces so//
313b7(mdo sde): byas kyis gzod yang bya ba med// phyin chad 'byung ba med do zhes// sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol// g.yo ba thams cad shin tu 'byung // bag chags ma lus bsregs
314a1(mdo sde): bas na/ / rnam par rtog pa mi 'byung zhing // bdag med shin tu mthong ba ni// chos dang gang zag bsgrags pa ste// sa bon rnams dang bral bas na// sem
314a2(mdo sde): kyi tshogs rnams mi 'jug go/ / thog ma med pa'i dus bsags pa'i// yid kyi gnas ngan len rtog pa'i// spros pa thams cad mngon bsal bas// mya ngan 'das pa lcags
314a3(mdo sde): bsregs bzhin/ / ji ltar rab tu bsregs pa'i lcags// bsil bar gyur kyang 'jig pa med// de bzhin grol ba thams cad kyang // ma zad bzhin du bsil ba yi// zag
314a4(mdo sde): pa med pa'i chos dbyings su/ / bzhugs pa stug po'i dkyil 'khor na// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal sras bcas// ting nge 'dzin gyi zas gnas pas// mnyam par gzhag la
314a5(mdo sde): mnyam gzhag cing / / mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas// rgyal po rnal 'byor can gyi yul// rnal 'byor 'di yin brtsam par gyis// de ste rgyal sras dge ba'i gnas//
314a6(mdo sde): stug por 'gro bar 'dod na ste// sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs pa'i gnas// zhing gi mchog ni stug po'o// de phyir rgyal po dge bar rtsom// rgyal po rnams la'ang dge bar
314a7(mdo sde): gyis/ / ming ni mtshan ma'i mthu las byung // mtshan ma rkyen las byung ba ste// mtshan ma las kyang rnam rtog 'byung // grub pa rnams ni ma gtogs par// rdza la sogs pa
314b1(mdo sde): dbang po'i yul/ / phung po yon tan ldan pa'i rnams// rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma 'di// skye ba la ni rgyu yin no// khyad par byed pa rnam rtog ste// gnas kyang rnam par
314b2(mdo sde): shes par byed/ / 'gro dang mi 'gro 'gro ba yi// gti mug rnams kyang shin tu skye// ring po zung ngu kha dog dang // rtsub pa dag dang 'jam pa'i rnams// sgra dang dri la sogs
314b3(mdo sde): pa'i yul/ / mngar dang kha dang tsha ba dang // yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i yul// ji snyed dge dang mi dge dang // 'dus byas chos dang 'dus ma byas// mya ngan 'da' ba ye shes
314b4(mdo sde): yul/ / skad cig skad cig rab tu 'byung // byung zhing phyir yang log pa ste// de ni mgyogs par shin tu 'gro// rnam par shes pa rgyu las byung // yid dang kun gzhi rab 'brel
314b5(mdo sde): bas/ / khab long lta bur shin tu 'khor// kha gnyis sprul pa ji bzhin la// yid kyi spyod pa de bzhin te// kun gzhi rnam shes yog par byed// gcig tu 'on kyang rab tu 'byung // /
314b6(mdo sde): yid kyi rnam par shes dang bcas// rgyu yi dgos pa byas nas ldog/ bdag tu dgos pa'ang shin tu byed// bdag gir bya ba'ang 'phel bar byed// lus la drod kyang skyed pa ste//
314b7(mdo sde): sna tshogs rnam par rab tu spyod// zas dang skom dang longs spyod dang // gos dang spos sogs rnam spyod dang // mchod pa dag dang rgyug par yang // mi yi lus ni 'dzin pa yin// gar
315a1(mdo sde): dang gang po rtsed mo dang / / yid kyang rtag tu byed pa ste// sgra tshogs mgal pa bskor ba dang // dri za'i grong khyer rmi lam dang / smig rgyu la yang de bzhin du/
315a2(mdo sde): rnam par rtog pa kun tu 'jug/ ba bab kun tu 'khor ba'i sems// bdag sems khong du mi chung bas// lus dang snod kyi rnam par yang // phyang mo nyug pa ltar gnas pa'o// /
315a3(mdo sde): nyam chung snying po med pa ste// rnam par rtog par rgyu med pa// bdag gis brtags pa'i don la spyod// mthong nas gnas pa gzugs brnyan bzhin// rgyal po rnam shes sa bon ni//
315a4(mdo sde): lta ba'i yul du g.yo ba ste// bus pa'i tshogs rnams myos par byed// 'phags pa ma yin sa yi bdag/ rgyal po rnam shes gsum pa yi// 'jug pa rab tu bstan pa ste// 'di
315a5(mdo sde): rnams dang ni bral grub pa'i/ / rang bzhin yang dag nyid yin no// bye ba phrag zhing ji snyed rnams// shugs 'dzin gyi ni mthong ba dang // 'phags pa mo'u 'gal bu yis kyang //
315a6(mdo sde): lus dang lus che'i mdzes pa rnams// de dag las ni 'di dag 'phags// stug po'i zhing na'o sa yi bdag/ thams cad zhing na ci mdzes pa// de dag dpe 'am char mi rung // bde
315a7(mdo sde): ba yod dang mngon dga' dang / / 'og gi zhing rnams bye ba dag/ de dag de na gang bzhugs pa'i// sangs rgyas de dag stug la bstod// stug ces bya yod sngon mtha' med// rang byang 'phrul
315b1(mdo sde): pa de yin te/ / zag pa med pa'i sangs rgyas sar// 'byung ba gsum las 'das te gnas// de ni bde ba nyer len med// khyod dang nga 'dir spyod dang bral// ther zug mchog tu
315b2(mdo sde): rtag pa ste/ / brtan pa stug po 'dus ma byas// yang dag sangs rgyas byang chub tu// 'tshang rgya 'og min gnas mchog tu// sangs rgyas ma gyur 'dod khams su// sangs rgyas mdzad pa
315b3(mdo sde): mi mjed de/ / de dag stug pa'i zhing gshegs nas// sangs rgyas sprul pa bye ba yis// rtag tu rnal 'byor mnyam par gzhag/ sprul pa dag dang thabs cig rol// thams cad zhing du zla/
315b4(mdo sde): ba ltar// gang la gang gis dbang 'gyur ba// de la de ltar 'byung ba ste// 'phrul pa'i sprul pa dag gis kyang // sa bcu pa yi mdo mchog dang // sdong pos brgyan dang du ma yi// gang yang
315b5(mdo sde): rnam par sprul pa'i mdo/ / dpal gyi 'phrang ba las bshad dang // rnam par snang ba'i mdo sde dang // sgyu ma dpa' las 'gro ba sogs// mdo sde rnam pa sna tshogs dag/ stug po rgyan nas
315b6(mdo sde): rnam par byung / / stug po rgyan gyi mdo sde 'di// mdo sde kun las 'phags pa yin// rgyal po 'di la rim gror yang // rgyal po rnams dang bcas pas gyis// gzugs med 'dod
315b7(mdo sde): dang gzugs rnams dang / / 'du shes med pa de bzhin te// gnas las 'das te sangs rgyas dbang // bzhugs so stug po'i dkyil 'khor na// pad+mo 'dra ba'i gzhal med khang // gzugs
316a1(mdo sde): mang rnam pa sna tshogs ni/ / lha rdzas rmad kyi ye shes te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam dag gis// rnam grol rnal 'byor can rnams dang // de na bcom ldan thabs
316a2(mdo sde): cig bzhugs/ / stug po'i dkyil bzhugs bsam gtan zhugs// sangs rgyas sa mchog rnam bzhi la// de la bzhugs shing gzugs 'dzin pa// rnal 'byor mkhas pa nyid
316a3(mdo sde): tshul gyis/ / de yi mtha' ma mi 'jigs pas// gzugs rnams dang ni yul rnams kyi// thub pa rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i rnams// gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyang //
316a4(mdo sde): stug po'i dkyil na rnam bzhugs shing // thams cad rnal 'byor can gyis bstan// ba bla gser dang zla 'od tsam pa ka dang rma bya'i mgrin pa pad+mo 'dra// de yi sa la bzhugs pa'i lha
316a5(mdo sde): yi yang lha'i gzugs ni rnam par mdzes pa ste/ / de gzugs lha rgyal go ba ka dag glog dang 'od ma byu ru 'od bzhin du// la las bal chung sku dang na bza' lo ma rtsal sogs pa'i mal
316a6(mdo sde): bzhugs par/ / mthong ngo nyi ma stong ltar shin tu rnam par 'bar ba'i sku gzugs mnga' ba la// thub can la las rnal 'byor dbang la sdug dbus chu skyes re re bzhugs par mthong // /
316a7(mdo sde): thub pa'i thor tshugs tshogs ni lag gis 'gro yi mgo bo klad pa bzhin du ste// la lar gzugs ni rdo rje an+da rnyil gyis spras pa'i cod pan brgyan par ro// la las la lar thub pa
316b1(mdo sde): de la 'khor lo ri mo nya dung bcas par mthong / / la las ji ltar nam mkha' rgyu ba'i lam la 'ja' zug bzhin du thub pa mthong // lha rdzas phyag sor can gyis sna tshogs yul can
316b2(mdo sde): ri rab phyag tu rab gzhog cing / / khams gsum chu srin gnas dang chu gnas de bzhin pa glang rmig par shong bar mdzad// sbyin pa'i shugs kyis mi yi bdag pa'i gtsug gi cod pan rnams
316b3(mdo sde): kyis rab mchod cing / / la la dag na rgyal dang rgyal po'i 'khor na dgos pa rnams la mkhas gyur cing // chad pas gcod par snang ngo stug po'i dbus na gzhan du rnam par snang ba ni//
316b4(mdo sde): thub pa rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i ye shes rnal 'byor shin tu byed pa rnams la ste// rang gi yul rnams sngon gyi rgyal bas gsungs pa de dag rnal 'byor gyis ston cing // la las
316b5(mdo sde): gnas dang lta ba yid dang blo rnams shin tu gzhan du gyur pa dang / / dbang dang ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs ting nge 'dzin dang yid bzhin sku mnga' bar// la las yul la chags med spyod
316b6(mdo sde): yul rig pa'i blo yi bya ba gcod par te/ / 'di dang gzhan med bsregs med gyur pas tshogs bya med phyir mya ngan 'das par ro// snum dang 'od 'phro med pas ji ltar 'jig rten 'di ma
316b7(mdo sde): bzhin shin tu mya ngan 'das/ / la las pha rol phyin pa'i mchod sprin mchod bcug mchod sbyin byed pa dag tu ste// sbyin dang mchod dang thub pa dag kyang rnam pa tshul bzhin mdzad par shin tu
317a1(mdo sde): mthong / / bde ba yod ces bya ba'i zhing mchog den skyes bu yod pa de dag ni// mngal nas skyes pa ma yin bde bar 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can dag smra//
317a2(mdo sde): lha rdzas gser ltar 'bar dang zla ba lta bu'i lus 'chang rnal 'byor can gyi bdag/ lha rdzas 'od bzang de dang gang yang mi nang rnal 'byor can gyi dbang po'i yul// de dag rgyal cher mi
317a3(mdo sde): phopo rnal 'byor can gyi dbang po dag gi bde de la/ / gzhan du bdag cag nyid kyis bshams pa'i longs la spyod pa'i zhing gi me de dag/ mtha' yas 'od kyi bde ba can na rgyal ba'i sras
317a4(mdo sde): rnams lha rdzas 'od 'khor can/ / rnal 'byar yang dag nyid mos thub dang khyu mchog bsam gtan bdud rtsi myong byed dang // rnam pa tha dad sna tshogs rin po che dag yal ga sbyangs pa'i naH
317a5(mdo sde): tshal shing / / lha rdzas gsar phya'i khams la bsags pa'i zhing mchog de ni shin tu rnam par mdzes// gser dang rin chen sna tshogs me tog pad+mos de ni mchog tu rab tu brgyan//
317a6(mdo sde): 'di ni sangs rgyas zhing gi gter yin dpe med de kun ming yang pad+mo skyes// thub pa de la dad cing bsam gtan mkhas la sangs rgyas sgyid la rab tu mos// bdag gis ston pa la ni
317a7(mdo sde): bdag bstan yid can pad+mo dag las skyes pa ste/ / sangs rgyas zhing gi mchog na gnas pa'i mi ni bzang po'i mtshan gyis kun nas brgyan/ dpe byad bzang po'i bcas pas rmad du 'bar
317b1(mdo sde): ba'i lus can dpal gyi be'u dang bcas/ / yod dang med pa'i rnam rtog rtog pa med pas dro med dag go/ de ltar 'di dag rnam par bstan nas rdo rje khyu mchog mthe bong tsam du gyur//
317b2(mdo sde): srom rdul phran shin tu phra ba'i sgra yi brgya che'i gzugs su'ang de bzhin gyur// la lar bde gshegs rang rgyal nyan thos gzugs dang de bzhin sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang // gang dang
317b3(mdo sde): gang la sems kyi spyod pa ji bzhin de 'dra'i gzugs kyi khyad par dag/ rnal 'byor mkhas pa rdo rje zhes byas mtshan med gzugs kyi yul dag rnam par spangs// de skad bshad nas yang smras
317b4(mdo sde): pa/ / sna tshogs gzugs can rgyal ba'i sras// sa rnams de bzhin dbang rnams dang // ma nyams mngon par shes pa dang // sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang // de ltar yid bzhin lus kyang ste// /
317b5(mdo sde): gzungs dang rdzu 'phrul rkang pa dang // rnam thar tha dad yang dag rig/ stobs dang 'jigs pa med pa dang // phung po khams rnams zag med pa// 'di dag gzhan du gyur nas 'thob//
317b6(mdo sde): rtog pa'i sangs rgyas sa yang ngo // chos rnams lnga yi rang bzhin dang // rnam par shes pa brgyad rnams dang // bdag med gnyis po rab rtogs nas// gzhan du 'gyur ba 'byung bar 'gyur//
317b7(mdo sde): yid bzhin lus ni bcu po dag/ sgyu ma dpa' bar 'gro bas bskor// mi zad smon lam bcu po dang // lam gyi rnams kyis shin tu sprul// rmi lam me long gzugs brnyan nam/
318a1(mdo sde): yi zla ba bzhin du mthong // rnal 'byor lam la thub pa'i rnams// sangs rgyas sa la zhugs pa dang // rgyal ba pad+mo'i gdan bzhugs pa// rgyal ba'i sras kyis
318a2(mdo sde): mdun du byas/ / yod dam med pa'i phyogs bral ba// rdul phran rnam par 'jig rnams kyis// dri za grub pa'i rgyal po dang // lha yi gnas na 'khod pa'i tshogs// ri rab sa la 'dod rgyu
318a3(mdo sde): zhing / / nam mkha'i dkyil nas 'khor spyod kyang // ji ltar snang bar ma gyur pa// de bzhin rgyal sras gces pa'i rnams// rnal 'byor med pas mi mthong ngo // rnam pa sna tshog gzugs
318a4(mdo sde): dang ldan/ / sa dang zhing rnams bye ba na// rgyal ba mchog la mngon par mos// smon lam dbang la gnas pa'i rnams// pad+mo'i khang par rab tu skye// dbang dang bsam gtan sems
318a5(mdo sde): pa dag/ zhing dang zhing du mya ngan 'da'// ting nge 'dzin las skye ba ston// lhun gyis grub par thams cad du// chur byung zla ba 'dra bar te// nyi ma lta bur khyad med pa// snang ba sems
318a6(mdo sde): can spyod yul du/ / yang dag mtha' la mi reg par// ting nge 'dzin las rab tu ldog/ gru la gnas pa'i bung ba dag/ gangs chen mtsho la 'gro ba bzhin// gang du gru 'gro der rgyug
318a7(mdo sde): ste/ / dpag tshad shin tu mang bar yang // thugs rjes nyon mongs dma' ba'i lus// sdug bsngal can gzigs de bzhin du// de dag 'byung ba rab tu ston// phyir ldog bdag med pa
318b1(mdo sde): yang ste/ / 'jig pa dag kyang rnam mkhyen nas// zad pa'i dus su mi gnas pa// gzung dang 'dzin gyis 'phangs pa'i rnams// gzung dang 'dzin la spyod pa'i rnams// gzung dang 'dzin
318b2(mdo sde): gyis bskyed pas na/ / mtshan ma'i gzhi med mtshan nyid med// 'khor ba'i rgyun gyis khyer ba'i rnams// yang dang yang zhing skye ba yin// chags med mtsho yi gter gyur la// gcig
318b3(mdo sde): la gcig 'ju'i spre'u ltar yang / / byed pa grub la gnas kyis mthong // 'ju ba'i gnas dang rten med par// de bzhin rgyal ba rgyal sras rnams// sred pas rnam par dkrugs pa
318b4(mdo sde): yi/ / rnam rtog sdug bsngal gnas pa'i rnams// sa yi gnas na nyon mongs phyir// rab tu byung dang phyir ldog dang // sbyin dang mchod pa dag kyang 'byung // 'di 'dra rnal 'byor can
318b5(mdo sde): gyi chos/ / rnam pa sna tshogs bsgom par gyis// // 'phags pa rgyan stug po bam po gnyis pa// kun tu bzang po mi yi bdag
318b6(mdo sde): gzi brjid chen po sna tshogs gzugs/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po la smras pa// mthun pa dag la dbang byed dang // lnga gnas 'khod pa gzhan dag dang //
318b7(mdo sde): rin chen khang pa sna tshogs na// gang yang stug po'i dkyil 'khod pa'i// rgyal sras rnal 'byor ldan pa dag/ gang gis stug ces bya thos te// thos nas nan tan byed pa'i rnams// gzhan
319a1(mdo sde): 'gyur la gzhol ba dag/ gzhan du 'gyur ba'i tshul thos shing // ting nge 'dzin de'i tshul song ba// stug por ring por mi thogs 'gro// sangs rgyas yang dag 'gro
319a2(mdo sde): la mos/ / 'gro ba 'dzin dang shugs 'dzin dang // 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa dang // mthu chen 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang // zla ba la sogs gzugs dbang rgyal// blo gros shin
319a3(mdo sde): tu zhi ba dang / / lte ba rdo rje rnal 'byor rigs// du ma mkha' yi bdag po dang // phyag na rdo rje blo chen dang // rnal 'byor can dang rgyal sras rnams// gang yang bye ba'i zhing dag nas// chos
319a4(mdo sde): mnyan phyir ni 'ongs pa'i rnams/ / stug po'i rgyan la gzhol ba dag/ rgyal ba ma 'ongs mthong nas kyang // khong nas snying rje snying brtse ste// rnal 'byor ldan can dbang po'i gtso// sna
319a5(mdo sde): tshogs gzugs la rab tu smras/ / rnal 'byor can gyi gcol dris// 'jigs med rdo rje snying po la// rin chen khams pa sna tshogs dang // dbang sgyur khang pa bzang por yang // ji ltar
319a6(mdo sde): gang gis sna tshogs byas/ / sna tshogs gzugs can khyod kyis smos// dngos po kun gyi sna tshogs nyid// 'gro ba dag gi rab 'byung ba// rdza la sogs pa'i dngos po dag/ ji ltar chu 'jim
319a7(mdo sde): thal zhar las/ / las su bya ba thams cad bskyed// 'gro ba 'di dag de bzhin byas// rnga dang pi wang sgra la sogs// las su bskyod las dbyangs 'byin te// de bzhin 'jig rten
319b1(mdo sde): 'di la'ang ci/ / bskyod pa'i las las kun 'byung ngam// rang bzhin gsum po ji bzhin du// dngos po gcig la kun tu gnas// sa rnams 'di ltar thams cad du// 'dos dang
319b2(mdo sde): dngos la rab tu gnas/ / de bzhin 'di dag kun kyang ci// dngos po gcig la rab gnas sam// gang phyir 'di ltar rgyan dag snang // khams gsum g.yo dang mi g.yor bcas// dga'
319b3(mdo sde): ldan mtshe ma rab gnas dang / / dbang sgyur rnams kyis byas sam ci// mi 'am ci dag du ma dang // gya nom snang bas byas sam ci// 'og min thor tsugs can gyis sam// 'on tan
319b4(mdo sde): gzugs med rnams kyis kyang / / lha rnams bdag po thams cad kyis// gcig tu 'dus te 'di byas sam// 'phrul pa'i sprul pa dag gis sam// rgyal ba khyu mchog gis mdzad dam/
319b5(mdo sde): 'on tan rgyal ba rgyal sras rnams// zhing gzhan rnam par bzhugs pas sam// rnal 'byor la mkhas rnal 'byor can// sangs rgyas zhing du bzhugs rnams kyis// sa rnams thams
319b6(mdo sde): cad byas sam ci/ / gang la nor pa rab tu gnas// gang 'di nor pa snang ba dag/ smig rgyu rnams la chu bzhin te// rdza ma'i phyogs la yon tan bzhin// 'gro ba gang gis phyogs la gnas//
319b7(mdo sde): yon tan mi 'bral yon tan can// yon tan med dang yon tan gnas// ma yin phan tshun 'brel bas na// yon tan tshogs su rnam par gnas// nor pa sna tshogs de bzhin du// gang la'ang de bzhin gnas
322a1(mdo sde): yin nam/ / 'gro ba rnam pa sna tshogs rnams// sa rnams la ni gang snang ba// 'on tam tshangs pas phyung ba 'am// 'gro ba mthu bo che yis sam// khyu mchog gis
322a2(mdo sde): sam spun zlas sam/ / ser skya yis sam rang gis sam// gces pa'i rkyen gyis byas sam pa// rang bzhin gyis sam dbang pos sam// dus dang phyogs kyis bskyed pa 'am// 'on tam ma
322a3(mdo sde): rig sred pas sam/ / lha yi drang srong the tsom za// lha yi tshogs kyang de bzhin te// grub dang dri za'i rgyal po rnams// sa la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor can// 'on tam 'di dag mig 'phrul
322a4(mdo sde): lam/ / 'gro ba dri za 'dra zhig gam// mi lam yin nam smig rgyu 'am// sngon med rnam par rtog yin nam// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos por yang // kha gnyis sprul bzhin gnas pa
322a5(mdo sde): 'am/ / 'on tam rang bzhin 'di med dam// 'khrul 'khor ro langs bzhin gnas sam// mgal pa bskor ba 'dra ba 'am// 'on tam skra yi tshogs lta bu'am// byed dang las kyis ma
322a6(mdo sde): byas shing / / dbang po ku be ras ma byas// mchod sbyin sbyin sreg mchod 'bras sam// sbrang gi gzhung gi lam gyis sam// rgyu rnams shin tu phal tshabs// nan tan rtag pa ma yin te//
322a7(mdo sde): 'gro ba 'dzin pa med pa'ang min// rgyu rnams kyi yang rgyu dag ste// 'gro ba ngo bo nyid kyis grub// las kyi bag chags rnams las byung // rnam shes brgyad po'i skyes bu ni// kun gzhi zhes
322b1(mdo sde): kyang bya ba ste/ / des ni sna tshogs 'di dag kun// rdza ma'i 'khrul 'khor bzhin du bskor// til bkrum til mar ji bzhin du// lan tshwa'i tsha bro ji lta bar// gzugs la mi rtog nyid
322b2(mdo sde): ji bzhin/ / skyes bu 'di yang de bzhin gnas// ji ltar gsung la sogs la dri// yon tan rnams la yon tan mtshan// nyi zla gnyis kyi 'od zer bzhin// de ltar skyes bu gnas pa
322b3(mdo sde): yin/ / dgos dang byed pa med pa ste// yod dang med kyi phyogs kyis spangs// gcig dang tha dad med pa ste// mur 'dug phyogs kyis rnam par spangs// rjes su 'gro ba'i shes pa med//
322b4(mdo sde): nam yang rnam par mi rtag ste// grol ba'i so so rang rig pa// sangs rgyas sar skyes thub can gyis// gzung dang 'dzin pa med pa ste// snga med sems dang sems byung gis// rnam
322b5(mdo sde): shes brgyad dang bral ba ste/ / nam yang rnam par mi rtag ste// de la gnas pa chu rlabs bzhin// phan tshun mtshan nyid tha mi dad // 'byung zhing phyir yang ldog pa ste// de yi ldan pa rigs pa
322b6(mdo sde): min/ / ji ltar thub pa'i rnal 'byor dang // rdzu 'phrul can gyi rdzu 'phrul bzhin// mnyam par bzhag pas rab tu mthong // rnal 'byor 'gro ba gzhan gyis min// de bzhin 'jug pa'i rnam
322b7(mdo sde): shes rnams/ / de dag kun gzhi lhan cig gnas// rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu mthong // sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sras de bzhin// des ni 'di dag thams cad kyang // ji ltar nor bu phug pa'i
323a1(mdo sde): rnams/ / skud la brgyus dang 'khor lo bzhin// las kyi rlung gis skor byed pa// ji ltar rdza mkhan 'khor lo dang // lag dang thal zhar bskor ba yis// kun tu
323a2(mdo sde): bskor cing snod byed pa/ / yon tan sna tshogs rnam par ldan// de bzhin rnam shes brgyad kyi mi// khams kyi gzugs mnyam lhan cig tu// sa ni rnam par byed pa ste// phyi nang rgyu ba'i 'gro ba
323a3(mdo sde): rnams/ / gang la 'jig rten 'di dag kun// nam mkha'i skar tshogs ji bzhin du// gnas shing rnam pa sna tshogs rnams// rlung gi rta yis shin tu bskor// ji ltar mkha' la bya rnams
323a4(mdo sde): kyi/ / rjes ni snang ba ma yin te// bar snang yod pa ma yin na'ang // bya rnams rgyu ba'i byeng pa med// de bzhin rnam par shes pa'i mi// bdag yod ma yin gzhan med min// rnam dag par
323a5(mdo sde): snang 'dra ba dag/ dba' rlabs bzhin du rab tu 'byung // bag chags rnam pa'i nyes pa yis// mi chags pad+mo zla ba bzhin// pad+mo la ni chu med min// chu la zla gzugs med pa yang //
323a6(mdo sde): chu song zla ba yod pa ste// pad+mo'i 'dab ma de bzhin du// mig la bud med gzhon nu dag/ mig gis mthong bar cir mi 'gyur// de bzhin kun gzhi rnam par shes// las rnams cig/
323a7(mdo sde): car byed pa ste// 'gro ba dag gi lus la ni// khyab gnas sa bon can kun no// stug po'i sprin dang 'dra bar yang // sa rnams yog par shin tu gnas// tshe dang rnam shes kun nas
323b1(mdo sde): yog/ drod kyang de bzhin stobs chen bgyis// sna tshogs gzugs kyi lus can gyi// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs kyang rtsom// rdza mkhan ji ltar sa snod la// spyod pa ji bzhin de lta'o//
323b2(mdo sde): ba glang sogs pa'i ru mthong zhing // bong bu'i rwa ni med pa ste// ma mthong bar ni med pa med// ba glang rwa ni med pa yang // phyin ci log tu dmigs pas med// phyin ci log gis mam
323b3(mdo sde): sems la/ / shin tu phra ba'i rdul bshig na// yod pa de dag med par 'gro// med pa yod pa'i rgyu las te// med pa yod ces rtog pa ni// yod pa med las bltos pa ste// phan
323b4(mdo sde): tshun ltos pa'i rgyu las so/ / blo dang rtog par bya med de// khong du chud pa skye ba med// mas me'i 'khor lo 'khor lo min// ji ltar sgra tshogs mthong ba bzhin// dri za'i grong khyer sgyu ma
323b5(mdo sde): dag/ ci zhig mthong nas 'byung ba bzhin// blo yi 'byung ba rgyu med par// yod pa ma yin rnam rtog pa// rtog bya rnam par rtog pas bskyed// lus can rnams kyis yid skyes te// ming dang
323b6(mdo sde): 'du shes 'brel ba dang / / rang bzhin gnyis kyi bag chags kyis// mi yi sems ni rab tu 'byung // grub pa'i don ni mi skye'o// thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags// gnas ngan len
323b7(mdo sde): gyi yul las byung / / rab tu spros pas bsgos yid las// sems kyi tshogs ni 'byung bar 'gyur// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos por yang // kun tu skye ba'i mi yi sems// rdza la
324a1(mdo sde): sogs pa'i gzugs kyi dbyibs/ / snang ba gzhan yod ma yin te// 'di dag thams cad blo tsam pas// rtogs bya'i dngos po yod pa min// blo dang rtogs
324a2(mdo sde): bya'i dngos por ni/ / bdag nyid rab tu 'jug pa ste// byis pa rnams kyis mi rig pa// bag chags rnams kyis sems myos rnams// rnam pa brgyad dang rnam bdun dang // dus gcig
324a3(mdo sde): tu yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ / sngon med bag chags ldan pas na// kun gzhi sa bon thams cad can// rgya mtsho'i dba' rlabs ji bzhin du// rlung gi rkyen gyis bskyod pa ltar// gar byed
324a4(mdo sde): cing ni rab tu 'byung / / rnam par rgyun kyang mi 'chad do// blo yi 'od pa de bzhin rtag/ yul dang reg pas bskul ba'i phyir// sna tshogs bdag rtog rnam shes kyis// bdag la bdag
324a5(mdo sde): gis 'dzin par byed/ / ji ltar sa la rnam rtog med// 'gyur med rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs// dgos pa'i rnam par gyur pa ni// de 'dra kun gzhi rnam shes la'o// ji ltar mi
324a6(mdo sde): zhig lag pa yis/ / rang gi lus la mnyed pa dang // phyogs kyi glang po bdag lus la// bdag gis sna yis chu 'thor dang // ji ltar shed can la la dag/ bdag gi lus la sos
324a7(mdo sde): 'debs pa/ / de bzhin blo ni brtag don la// don gnyis tshul du 'jug pa'o// blo yi yul du bya ba 'di// khams gsum rnam par khyab par gnas// phyi dang nang gi bya ba yang //
324b1(mdo sde): rnal 'byor mkhas pas mthong ba yin// sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'di kun gzigs// sa la ji snyed snang ba dag/ rnam pa sna tshogs dbyibs kyi gzugs// sa la rnam pa sna
324b2(mdo sde): tshogs so/ / chos 'di yang dag bshad pa dang // rdo rje snying po 'jigs med pa// mi smra'i dngos la dgar 'gyur te// bsam gyis mi khyab chos dbyings kyi// lha yi bsam gtan mi
324b3(mdo sde): g.yo ba/ / sangs rgyas spyod yul bzhugs pa dang // stug po nas ni 'ongs pa'i gzugs// mthong nas rnal 'byor lam gnas pa// thub pa de yis lha rdzas lus// rnal 'byor gtang
324b4(mdo sde): ste yang gnas so/ / 'o dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med dang // 'du shes med pa'i gnas rnams kyi// mun pa'i tshogs nas phyir byung ste// stug po de nas 'dir 'ongs so// sangs rgyas
324b5(mdo sde): rnams kyi bzhugs pa'i gnas/ / sangs rgyas zhing ni mchog rab nas// gzugs kyi rnam pa du ma yi// sangs rgyas sku yang rnam byung nas// mi yi khams na rnam par 'phrul// su
324b6(mdo sde): blo ci 'dod phan par ro/ / stug po yi ni ming phyung nas// rgyal ba'i sras po thams cad kyang // phan tshun gcig la gcig bltas te// gcig la gcig ni rang smras pa// stug po dri med
324b7(mdo sde): bsod nams te/ / sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed// rnal 'byor can gyi gnas kyi mchog/ sangs rgyas zhing gi dam pa phul// yu bus de yi sgra thos te// thos nas bdag cag dga'
325a1(mdo sde): ba'i yid/ / stug po rnal 'byor can gnas kyi// brtan lam bdag cag thob par bya// 'og min tshangs pa thor tsugs can// gtsang ma'i gnas kyis rnam spangs
325a2(mdo sde): pa/ / zhing gi ngo mtshar ltad mo dang // sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i sras kyi yab// tshangs pas de tshe gsol nas su// gtsang ma gnas kyi 'jigs med rnams// de dag thams cad sems
325a3(mdo sde): pa ni/ / tshangs pas stug por 'gro mi 'gro// tshangs pa rnal 'byer chen po can// mun pas de dag bslad par gyur// thub pa mi shes thub rig gi/ ji ltar gnas ni thub par 'gyur//
325a4(mdo sde): tshangs pa de na kun tu sems// blo yis tshangs pa rig pa'i mchog/ 'dod dang gzugs kyi bdag po dag/ rgyu ba de na med pa ste// nam mkha'i khang pa gnas rnams dang // 'du shes
325a5(mdo sde): med pa'ang de bzhin te/ / mur 'dug gzhan la grags pa yi// rnal 'byor can rnams der mi 'gro// bdag gis bya ba byas sam ci// bsams te 'dir yang 'ongs par gyur// bdag
325a6(mdo sde): 'gro'am brtan zhing brtag pa yis/ / ther zug 'dus ma byas stug tu// gal te yang na thub pa de// rnal 'byor mnga' ba lha'i yang lha// mthu yis rnal 'byor mkhyen rnams kyi// pho brang
325a7(mdo sde): stug po der 'gro'am/ / thub pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// de skad smras nas ther tshugs can// mthong ba shin tu 'bar ba yi// sangs rgyas lam na bzhugs pa rnams// gsungs shig gsu
325b1(mdo sde): shig thub pa'i rnams/ / khyod la ci 'tshal ci gyis shig/ sangs rgyas dbang po bka' stsal gsol// stug po ji ltar 'thob par 'gyur// gzugs yul 'di las phyir log cig/
325b2(mdo sde): der 'gror med pa gzugs can rnams// stug po de ni thub can yul// bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas zhing // 'du shes med pas mi 'thob ste// de bzhin 'dod pa'i khams dbang gis//
325b3(mdo sde): mur 'dug gzhan la grags pas kyang // rnal 'byor rig lam sdug mi 'thob// tshangs pa nyid kyis de gsung thos// mchod sbyin gsol ba'i zhal na ste// de ni de nas phyir log ste//
325b4(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i gnas su yang song ngo // de yi phyir na der 'gro ba// tshangs pa yis kyang mi 'thob pas// gzugs med 'dod dang gzugs can rnams// der 'gro yod pa yod ma yin//
325b5(mdo sde): ci phyir dad pa 'di 'dra rnyed// stug po'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba yang // rnal 'byor can gyi gnas kyi mchog/ de phyir ngo mtshar thob par gyur// sgyu ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul// rnal
325b6(mdo sde): 'byor can gnas stug po de/ / 'di ni gcig nas gcig tu thos// de nas byung bas rnam par bsnyad// sna tshogs tshig 'di thos pa ni// thub can rdo rje snying po yi// rgyal sras khyod
325b7(mdo sde): kyis smra bar gyis/ / rgyal ba'i sras rnams nyan par 'dod// dbang sgyur rgyal po de bzhin gyis// gzi brjid chen po ma thogs shig/ mtshe ma rab dang dga' ldan dang // gtsang gnas
326a1(mdo sde): 'jigs pa med pa'i rnams/ / thub pa'i bka' ni ma lus par// smra bar su zhig nus pa yod// gzhan du khyod dang sangs rgyas rnams// thub can thub pa bsnam
326a2(mdo sde): bdag/ sangs rgyas yul ni bsam mi khyab// mchog gi gtso bo sangs rgyas kyi// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor med pa la// su yis ji ltar bstan par nus// mtshe ma rab dang shugs
326a3(mdo sde): 'dzin dang / / dbang sgyur rgyal ba'i sras po dag/ gcig pa'i dbyangs su yang smras te// gsungs shig gsungs shig rgyal ba'i sras// rnam par 'phrul dang 'jam dpal dang /
326a4(mdo sde): byams pa mi 'am ci yi bdag/ rnal 'byor can gzhan gang de ni// de dag smra ba smros shig grogs// nam mkha' las kyang sgra byung ste// lha dang sngags 'chang rnams kyis kyang //
326a5(mdo sde): nas shin tu rnga brdungs pa// gsungs shig gsungs shig rgyal ba'i sras// de dag de skad smra ba na// thor tsugs can gyi tshangs pa 'ongs// sa 'khor kun la smras pa ni// stan gyi mchog
326a6(mdo sde): la 'dug gnas te/ / ngo mtshar lha rdzas 'di ci zhig/ thub pa rnams kyi tshogs 'khor na// rnal 'byor dbang po thams cad dang // slob ma mkhas pa de dag kyang // khyu mchog thub la
326a7(mdo sde): dri bar 'dod/ / rgyal sras rdo rje dbang po la// skabs 'di ci zhig su zhig la// rgyal ba'i sras kyis gsungs pa yin// ku ru'i bu dang di li ba// 'khor lo 'khor ba man 'tha' ste//
326b1(mdo sde): yang na g.yo ban sha la// lha rdzas mi yi gtam brjod dam// nyi bu ig shwa ku la'am// de bzhin gzhu stong bdog pa'am// 'on tam gnas srung po la 'am// 'khor lo 'khor ba
326b2(mdo sde): gzhan dag la'ang / / 'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med gtam// 'du shes med gnas pa la 'am// nam mkha' mtha' yas rnam shes sam// 'on te cung zad med pa dag/ thub can
326b3(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas dag la'am/ / nyan thos rgyal ba'i sras la'am// sangs rgyas sa la zhugs pa yi// rgyal dbang rnams la gtam 'di 'am// 'di ci lha min lha sras sam// 'on te/
326b4(mdo sde): skar ma'i de bzhin nam// ji ltar gyur pa khyod kyis gsungs// bdag cag slob ma phyogs su nyan// bla ma'i tshig ni thos nas kyang // rgyal ba'i sras po thams cad dag/ phan tshun
326b5(mdo sde): shin tu dpyod par byed/ / de yi ting 'dzin 'gro song rnams// rgyal ba'i sras rnams tshig thos pa// gtsug tor can las mngon du ste// slob mar bcas par nyan 'dod pa// gtsang
326b6(mdo sde): gnas bdag po nyid kyang yin/ / thar zla blo gros mi zad dang // nam mkha'i dbang po 'gro ba 'dzin// mthu chen spyan ras gzigs dbang dang // rnal 'byor shes pa gzungs kyi dbang // /
326b7(mdo sde): lha yi cod pan rnal 'byor dbang // gtsug na rin chen blo gros shing // lag na rdo rje zhi ba'i blo// lag na rin chen blo chen dang // 'di dag rgyal sras gzhan dag kyang // bye ba'i zhing rnams kun
327a1(mdo sde): nas 'ongs/ / rdo rje snying po blo can la// de dag kun gyis rnam bltas nas// pad+mo'i stan la 'khod pa'i rnams// rgyal ba'i sras la gsol ba 'debs// zla
327a2(mdo sde): chen rab tu bshad par gyis/ / rgyal ba'i sras rnams nyan par 'dod// 'das pa dag dang ma 'ongs tshul// da ltar byung ba'i gang tshig kyang // rgyu dang dpe yis rab gsal bar// khyod kyi
327a3(mdo sde): zhal nas byung ba'i rnams/ / gdon mi za ba'i tshig 'di yang // khyod kyis rgyal ba de zhal nas// thams cad ma lus thos pa ste// skyon med de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen// ting
327a4(mdo sde): 'dzin dbang sgyur rgyal po yis/ / thams cad blo gros rnam bltas nas// rdo rje snying po 'jigs med kyis// rnal 'byor can la tshig smras pa// rgyal ba'i gsung rab ma lus par//
327a5(mdo sde): smra bar sus kyang nus pa med// de yi byin rlabs ma gtogs pa// sangs rgyas rnams dang rgyal sras kyi// sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal te// sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs
327a6(mdo sde): pa dag/ nor bu rin chen sna tshogs khang // dbang sgyur gnas bzang 'khod rnams la'ang // ye shes dad pas smra bar bya// sangs rgyas rigs byed tshul yin te// nga las 'di dag
327a7(mdo sde): thams cad nyon/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dag/ rgyal po rnams la gtam 'di min// mi bdag mchog rnams 'das pa la'ang // 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs kyi gtam// sdug
327b1(mdo sde): dkyil phun sum tshogs rnams kyi/ / rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor yul// sangs rgyas rnams kyi phun sum tshogs// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes phra// rtog med rtog pa spangs pa de//
327b2(mdo sde): so so rang rig mkhas pa'i yul// brjod pa dang ni rnam par bral// de ni smra bar dad pa med// bdag gis de yi mthu thos pa// lha rdzas kyi ni ye shes dang // ting nge 'dzin gyi me tog
327b3(mdo sde): gis/ / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsungs pa ni// stug po'i dkyil du mnyam bzhag pas// thams cad phyogs las rnam grol zhing // yod dang med pa'i phyogs spangs pa// yod
327b4(mdo sde): dang med pa'i phyogs dang bral/ / dbu ma'i lam ni dge ba ste// gzhan du 'gyur ba'i lha sras tshul// sangs rgyas sa la 'jug par byed// dbu ma'i lam po de nyid kyang // mtha' bzhi
327b5(mdo sde): rnam par spangs pa ste/ / rnam par rtog med dmigs med pa// stugar gnas pas shin tu mthong // thub can de nyid lam shes pa// bdag med ye shes mkhas rnams kyis// bla ma'i
327b6(mdo sde): tshig 'di thos pa dang / / rnal 'byor can rnams thams cad kyang // rkang pa gnyis la mnyam btud nas// rdo rje zhes la smras pa ni// rnal 'byor can rnams nyan par brtson// skom pa
327b7(mdo sde): rnams ni chu tshol bzhin/ / khyod kyi zhal nas btung 'dod pa// tshig gi sbrang rtsi bung ba bzhin// rnal 'byor dbang po yang dag gsungs// rgyal ba'i sras rnams shin tu nyan// rnal 'byor can
328a1(mdo sde): rnams rnal 'byor blo/ / ye shes dbang po 'phrul can rnams// zhing gi bdag po rgyal po rnams// rnal 'byor lam ni rtog byed pa// bde gshegs bka' ni nyan par
328a2(mdo sde): ro/ / khyod kyi zhal nas rnam byung ba// rnam pa sna tshogs dka' ba'i sgra// khong du chud byed mtshan bzang dang // tshangs pa'i yang dag gshegs pa dang // dbang po'i don grags khyad
328a3(mdo sde): par du'o/ / sna tshogs thub pa de yi gsung // sgra yi don la mkhas pa yi// de phyir bdag ni smrar ma mos// brtag bya rtog pa rnam par spangs// bar snang ri mo ji bzhin dang //
328a4(mdo sde): grib ma sdong la sogs pas spangs// de ste snang na rmad du rung // de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa'i bka'// mkha' la bya rjes ji bzhin du// blta bar shin tu dkon pa bzhin//
328a5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa thub pa'i bka'// de ni bsten par mi nus so// sa rnams gsum du mkhas pa yis// dpe yis kun tu rab bstan gyi// dpe dang bral ba'i de bzhin nyid// thub
328a6(mdo sde): pa'i zhal nas rnam par 'byung / / de yi tshig la dpe med de// rmi lam lta bur bdag la snang // rab rib mgal ba bskor ba dang // sla yi tshogs dang de bzhin 'dra// ji ltar sgyu ma'i
328a7(mdo sde): / grong khyer dang // rlung ni shin tu blta dka' dang // sgyu ma smig rgyu 'jab ste// rnam rtog gnyis po rab tu spangs// 'on tam rnal 'byor sna tshogs pa// thub pa'i gsung ni de bzhin te/
328b1(mdo sde): bdag gis rnal 'byor can dbus su// bshad par de phyir dad pa med// 'di dag tham cad mkhas pa ste// de bzhin nyid blo shes pa'i rnams// sangs rgyas spyod yul bsam yas
328b2(mdo sde): pa/ / de phyir smra bar dad pa med// 'on kyang brjod do thub pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// de ring bdag las nyon cig rgyal sras rnams// sna tshogs tshig gi don ldan bub pa'i bka'// dpe med
328b3(mdo sde): sems dang yid las rnam par 'das/ / ji ltar bung bas me tog ro 'thungs shing // lhag ma gzhan dag 'thung bar byed pa bzhin// snying khu thub pa'i mchog rnams kyis 'thungs te// de yi
328b4(mdo sde): 'thungs lhag bdag gis de ring bshad/ / de ni yid dang tshig gis kyang // bstan par nus pa ma yin la// lha yi lha yi yul yin te// mkhas rnams dge ba 'phel bar byed// mi yi gzugs
328b5(mdo sde): su byas nas su/ / sangs rgyas zhes ni mtshan ldan pa// cod pan can dang gzhan la snang // gzhal med khang gnas gzhan la yang // 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang // mtshan bzang
328b6(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs su/ / sa la sna tshogs snang ba ni// mur 'dug 'dus pa'i dregs pas sel// dus rnams bzhi po thams cad du// sangs rgyas rnams kyi dus dus la// stug na bzhug
328b7(mdo sde): pas dus sprul te/ / rnam par bye ba rab tu mdzad// bzang dus de bzhin gsum pa dang // gnyis kyi pha rol dus ngan dang // de dag tu yang ci dgos pa// sa la lus can rnams kyi ste//
329a1(mdo sde): ldan pa de dag thams cad mdzad// stug po'i dkyil na bzhugs shing ste// stug po de ni dri med gnas// sbyor chen rnams kyi bde ba'i gzhi// ngan dang gnyis//
329a2(mdo sde): kyi pha rol mtshams// thub pa gzugs ni rnam bzung nas// dri med stug na rnal 'byor ldan// zla ba bzhi du 'gro la snang // sna tshogs 'gro ba gang shes kyis// sna tshogs gzugs/
329a3(mdo sde): su mdzad pa ni// gang la gang snang gang gis kyang // ji ltar gang la de bde ba// de dag de la thams cad du// de phyir cha yis mig la gnas// shes can yul can thub pa ni// rnal 'byor
329a4(mdo sde): mkhyen pa shes pas snang / / dbang po che gzugs gzhan dag dang // 'jug 'dod kyi dang de bzhin gzhan// ser skya yi yang gzugs su ste// thub pa la lar mkha' bzhugs pa/
329a5(mdo sde): shes byed shes la yang dag snang // sa nad sa nad da na la// sa nad gzhon nu med dag dang // sgra gcan mi tsi tum bu ru// ig shwa ku dang zla ba'i rigs// thams cad sa yi
329a6(mdo sde): rgyal po la/ / thams cad sar yang mchod pa ste// sku ni su su ci 'dod bzhin// la yar mur 'dug spyod sprul te// ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyis mthong // tshul gyis gtsug lag
329a7(mdo sde): ston par yang / / de bzhin rigs par rab ston cing // rdo rje dngul dang gser dag dang // zangs dang lcags kyi 'byung khung dang // ro nye zha nye mu tig dang // pad+ma rA ga dang an+da rnyil//
329b1(mdo sde): bai DUR+Ya dang shel dag dang // a sA ga rab mu sa ra// tshul dang brtag pa thams cad ldan// mkhan po bla ma kun 'gro dang // gang gis lus can su su dzir// sa la bde ba skye ba bzhin
329b2(mdo sde): de la de bde thams cad du/ / thub pa'i rnal 'byor rab las byung // lha yi bu mos mi bskyod de// de bzhin dri za'i bud med kyis// 'dod khams dbang po'i bud med dang // de bzhin
329b3(mdo sde): klu yi bud med kyis/ / mi tsi lha min bu mo dang // gnod sbyin bu mos de bzhin no// de ni 'dod pa'i yul las rgyal// gzugs can rnams kyis yul de bzhin// nam mkha'
329b4(mdo sde): rnam shes mtha' yas dang / / cung zad med pa'ang de bzhin to// 'du shes yod min ma yin gyi// gnas na rnam par rmongs pa med// kun tu la sogs 'di dag lam// rnal
329b5(mdo sde): 'byor can gyi 'ching ba'i dngos/ / ma zhi mi dge gzhan dag kyang // srog chags rnams kyis yod pa// lus can rnams kyi lus kyi yul// stug na gnas la stug na med//
