359b4(mdo sde): rnal 'byor pa de las mngon langs shing // gcig la gcig ni phan tshun lta// rnal 'byor spyod pa tshul dge 'di// gang gis shin tu mthong bar gyur// rnam pa sna tshogs 'os pa yi// stan
359b5(mdo sde): gyi mchog la 'khod pa'i rnams/ / kun kyang ngo mtshar rmad du rnyed// bsam med bsam gtan bsams pa dang // bsam gtan rnams kyi dgos pa dag/ rgyal sras 'jigs pa med pa'i
359b6(mdo sde): rnams/ / kun kyang sems shing rab tu gnas// stug po'i rgyan dang rgyal po la// lta ba mnyam par bzhag pa'i rnams// mgo la cod pan thogs pa dag/ mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis//
359b7(mdo sde): yan lag bris pa de dag kun// bye ba'i zhing nas 'ongs pa ste// g.yo ba rnams dang shin tu bral// thams cad gos bzang cha lugs mdzes// rnal 'byor spyod pa stobs chen te// lha'o rdo
360a1(mdo sde): rje snying po la'o/ / rnam par rtog dang rnam dpyod dang // chos la mos pa yang dag tu// mthong ste de nas de kun dang // phyogs rnams bzhi por blta byas te//
360a2(mdo sde): 'dzum pa sngon du rab btang nas// 'jam zhing snyan pa'i dbyangs su smras// rgyal sras mnyam par bzhag pa'i rnams// rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor yul// gang la rtog can myos 'gyur/
360a3(mdo sde): ba// de dag bdag las mnyan par gyis// gang bsam gang gi ji lta bur// bsam gtan bsam byed dgos pa dag/ 'dod dang sdig pa rnams kyis dben// rnam par rtog bcas rnam
360a4(mdo sde): dpyod bcas/ / dga' ba de dben las skyes par yang // bsam gtan dang po skye ba yin// de lta bu yi rims tshul du// bzhi dang brgyad dang de bzhin bcu// mur 'dug bdag tu smra ba dang //
360a5(mdo sde): bsam gtan can rnams bsam gtan byed// nyan thos theg pa can rnams dang // rang rgyal theg ldan de bzhin te// kun kyang rtag tu bsam gtan byed// chos rnams dang ni sa dag gis// rang
360a6(mdo sde): gi mtshan nyid rtogs pa dang / / phung po skye mched tshogs kyi rnams// 'di dag thams cad bdag med de// byed pa med cing g.yo ba med// gsum po 'dus las rab tu byung // 'khrul 'khor
360a7(mdo sde): ro langs 'dra ba ste/ / byed pa rnams kyis rnam par spangs// thub pa phyi rol bsam gtan byed// stong par lta ba'i lta ba can// chos kyi mtshan la mos pa rnams// chung gzor mtshan nyid
360b1(mdo sde): ma yin te/ / phung po bdag med mkhas pa'i rnams// bsam gtan 'di 'drar bsam gtan byed// de bzhin gshegs kyi bsam gtan dag/ lha rdzas bsod nams lta sbyor ba//
360b2(mdo sde): rnal 'byor can dang rgyal ba'i sras// mnyam gzhag rtag par bsam gtan byed// 'di dag thams cad sems tsam ste// mtshan can mtshan nyid yod pa min// phung po rnams med kham
360b3(mdo sde): yod min/ / thams cad chos la mtshan nyid med// rdul phran rnam par gzhigs pa dang // de dag de ltar mi gnas so// rtog pa skyed pas brtags pa ni// dngos po sa dang chu la sogs//
360b4(mdo sde): dngos po'i rang bzhin mi shes pas// mtshan nyid du yang rnam par brtog/ kha dog sdug dang mi sdug dang // kha dog snang gzhan de bzhin te// 'ja' dang in+d+ra go pa ltar// kha dog sna mang
360b5(mdo sde): sprin lta bu'i/ / sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra ba yis// thams cad 'gro ba kun bkang ste// rgyal ba'i skye mched ces pa bas// 'byung ba rnams kyang rnam gzhigs te// rnal 'byor shes pa
360b6(mdo sde): gzugs can gyis/ / lus la rtag tu gzugs kyang mthong // gang la dmigs te mnyam bzhag pa// de la dmigs shing rnam par ldang // gang dang gang la rnam rtog pa// de dang de ni dmigs/
360b7(mdo sde): pa yin// rnal 'byor can med rnal 'byor med// de ltar rnam par rtog pa ni// rnal 'byor can gyis rnal 'byor nyid// kun gzhis rnams thams cad dang // thub pa'i rnal 'byor bde la
361a1(mdo sde): gnas/ / chos dang chos kyi mtshan nyid kyang // rtag tu rab tu rtogs byas shing // mnyam par bzhag pa'i khyad par dag/ mnyam gzhag ldan pa rab tu ston// chos kyi
361a2(mdo sde): rang bzhin rnam phye bas/ / rnal 'byor can gyi blo 'khrugs pa// blo gros zhan pas rab tu skye// chos dang bdag la 'dzin par 'gyur// yid ches lung dang mi ldan par// chos rnams ston par
361a3(mdo sde): byed pa ni/ / mtshan nyid rnam par rtog pa yis// bdag kyang chung zos gzhan chud gzon// mtshan nyid can med mtshan nyid med// 'dres pa'i phyir na rnam par snang // dngar ba'i rnams ni mkhris
361a4(mdo sde): bsel/ / bad kan tsha skyur lan tshwas te// ma zhu tsha ba'i rnam pa dang // lan tshwa la sogs rnam pas sel// mkhris pa bad kan 'khrug pa las// rims rnams skye bar gyur pa dang // lus
361a5(mdo sde): can rnams kyi lus yul du/ / 'dus pa rlung las byung ba dang // rims dag rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir// thub pas bsdu ba byas pa ni// kha ra la sogs yan lag drug/ sha dang skol ma khu ba
361a6(mdo sde): dag/ tha dad mtshan gyi 'jig 'gyur ba// lus can rnams kyi rims kun to// rnam shes rnams ni kun gzhi la// phan tshun tha dad mi gnas te// gal te chos kyi rang bzhin nam// mtsha
361a7(mdo sde): nyid gcig ni yod gyur na/ / de tshe chos dang mtshan nyid la// mtshan nyid mi 'ja med par 'gyur// rdzas rnams bsdus pas sel mi nus// mi yang sos par mi 'gyur ro// sos dang rnam
361b1(mdo sde): par bsal ba 'di/ / mkhas pa rnams kyis mthong ba ste// gzhan du kun gzhi rnam shes pa// rnam pa mang por gnas pa ste// sgyu ma'i ri dgas bzhin 'khor ba// rnal 'byor brtson pas brtags
361b2(mdo sde): pa yin/ / mtshan med mtshan can med pa ste// phung po rnams las phung po can// gzhan med yan lag nying lag las// yan lag can med yan lag la// 'jig rten rgyu yis ma byas te//
361b3(mdo sde): 'bras bu rnams la rgyu yang med// 'jig rten rdul phran bsags pa min// phyogs dang gnas su mi 'gro'o// de dag sor gnyis sor gsum du// ci yang brtson par mi byed de// dngos po yod
361b4(mdo sde): pa phrad pa'i phyir/ / rdul phran thams cad 'du bar 'dod// de tshe yon tan khyad yod pa// yon tan rnams kyis yon tan du// 'jig rten ma byas rang bzhin gyis// 'jig rten rgyan las ma byung
361b5(mdo sde): ste/ / 'dod rgyal dngos kyis de bzhin min// chos gsum pas kyang ma byas te// bag chags rnams kyis dkrugs pa'i sems// rnam par rtog pa mang pos gnas// snying gi phyogs na/
361b6(mdo sde): gnas pa yi// lus can kun gyi kun gzhi dang // sems dang yid dang rnam shes rnams// 'gro ba dag gis sna tshogs brtags// 'gro ba ma lus rab mnan te// sgyu ma'i ri dgas bzhin du
361b7(mdo sde): gnas/ / sems tsam du ni 'jug pa las// gzhan du yongs su gnas 'pho ste// sa la stong zhes brjod par bya// sems ni dngos po'i tshul du gnas// rdza la sogs pa'i yul med de//
362a1(mdo sde): sems ni rdza ma lta bu'o// sa la gzugs rnams yod pa dang // lha yul gnas pa'i khyim rnams kyang // rnam pa sna tshogs gang snang ba// de dag kun gzhi snang ba yin//
362a2(mdo sde): kun gzhi kun tu lag pa ste// kun tu kha mig mgo bo yang // cig car ram ma ma rims kyis kyang // sa rnams yog par rab tu gnas// byis pa rnam par mos byed de// gang gis snying la gang
362a3(mdo sde): gnas pa/ / de ni de la gnyis tshul du// lus kun bkang ste rab tu gnas// stong min dngos po gang yang med// thos pas ji ltar rdza bzhin du// dngos po gang la gzhol bya ba'i// dngos po
362a4(mdo sde): dngos su yod pa min/ / de ste stong pa'i dngos yod na// 'jigs med ma yin gzhig par 'gyur// gzhig bya gzhig par byed pa gang // de ni rnam par rtogs pas brtags// ri rab ri bo
362a5(mdo sde): tsam gyur pa'i/ / bdag tu lta ba mi gnod kyi// stong nyid lta ba gnod pa ni// nga rgyal mi bden brtags pa'o// rnal 'byor spyod pas stong pa nyid// gnas ma yin par sbyar mi bya// gnas min gal te sbyar gyur na// bdud
362a6(mdo sde): rtsi drug tu 'gyur ba yin/ / lta ba ji snyed gang yang rung // lus can rnams la yod pa yi// lta ba rnam par spangs pa'i phyir// stong pa nyid kyi tshul bstan to// stong pa nyid kyi lha thos kyang //
362a7(mdo sde): la la'i lta ba ma zhig na// gsor mi rung ba'i lha can te// sman pas btang ba'i nang pa bzhin// ji ltar bsregs pa tshig pa'i me// bsreg pa med pas mi gnas so// de bzhin bsreg bya la
362b1(mdo sde): tshig na/ / stong nyid me yang 'gag par 'gyur// lha bas 'gog pa'i dus su yang // ye shes yang dag me 'byung ste// nyon mongs thams cad sreg par byed// nyon mongs bsregs nas
362b2(mdo sde): rnam par mdzes/ / thub pa rnal 'byor ldan pa'i rnams// ye shes 'di ldan thub spyod dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas kyi mchog/ stug po der ni rab tu 'dod// ri bong rA yis
362b3(mdo sde): bong rnams/ / mngon par gzhig bya ma mthong ste// 'di la mo gsham bu yis kyang // srog chags gang yang gsad pa med// ri bong rA yi gzhu yis kyang // su yang 'thab mo mi byed
362b4(mdo sde): de/ / mo gsham bu la su yang rung // khyim gyi las su mi sko'o// stong pa nyid dang mi rtag nyid// rtag tu dngos dang gcig gyur te// yod dang med pa'i rang bzhin yang // de bzhin gcig
362b5(mdo sde): pa nyid du gyur/ / mngal na gnas dus tshun chad kyang // gzugs rnams gzhig par brtson pa ste// gang na'ang de med gzugs yod min// gzugs med par yang de med de// khyad par
362b6(mdo sde): med par 'gyur ba ni/ / ma sgribs zla dang 'od zer bzhin// de bzhin dngos rnams stong nyid dang // lhan cig gcig tu 'byung ba ste// phan tshun rnam pa tha dad du// de dag dgos pa mi sgrub bo// /
362b7(mdo sde): rgyu dang rkyen rnams tshogs pa las// rnal 'byor can gyis las bsgrub bo// lus 'di bdag yod ma yin te// ro langs 'khrul 'khor 'dra ba ni// sred pa'i srad bus bcing byas shing // yul
363a1(mdo sde): gyi rnams kyis drang ba yin/ / lha rdzas stong pa nyid bshad pa// lta ba thams cad sbyor ba ste// mtha' rgal stong pa nyid lta ba// rgyal ba rnams kyis lha med bshad//
363a2(mdo sde): stong nyid lta ba sbyong ba ni// yod dang med pa gzhig pa'i phyir// blo ldan mnyam par gzhag pa yi// rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu bsgom// rtswa dang shing dang gyo mo dag/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pos
363a3(mdo sde): rgyur byas te/ / sngags kyis ci dang cir 'dod par// gzugs kyi dngos su rab tu byed// gzugs dang snang ba yid byed dang // srang dang mig rnams bsgyur byas shing // mig gi rnam
363a4(mdo sde): shes sgyu ma bzhin/ / gang gi yul du'ang 'ong ba med// yul gzhan dag tu'ang 'gro ba min// 'di lha'i rnam shes 'byung ba la// yod dang med par brtag mi bya// sgra yi tshogs dang ngong
363a5(mdo sde): bu'i rwa/ / mo gsham bu dang smig rgyu dang // dri za'i grong khyer rmi lam dang // ming du grag gi yod pa min// stag dang gzig dang dom dag dang // rnga rta bong bu khyi rnams dang // dbyi dang
363a6(mdo sde): mtsha' dang rus sbal la/ / rA ni yod pa ma yin na// thub pa rtsod par brtson pa yis// de dag ci phyir mi brtag cing // bong bu'i rA la brtag par bya// ji ga de dag sgrub nus sam// shes
363a7(mdo sde): rab can gyis sar bstan pa/ / de dag nyi tshe brtag par bya// rtog pa can rnams 'khor ba ni// blun po 'on pa long ba 'dra// sgrol ba'i ye shes de la med// so so rang rig yul yang med//
363b1(mdo sde): gzhan gyis byas pa'i tshul dag la// rnam par rtog pas ci zhig nus// stug por gnas par rnam par rtogs// de la brtags shing dge ba thob// rnal 'byor mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor
363b2(mdo sde): can/ / de na gnas pa bzhin du snang // lnga yul gnas pa'i snyems bral dang // zla ba gza' la sogs pa yang // rlung gis rab tu bskyod pa'i rnams// ri rab rten cing rgyu ba yin// de
363b3(mdo sde): bzhin rnam par shes pa bdun/ / bag chags rnams dang ldan pa yi// kun gzhi kun gyi sa bon can// de la brten cing rab tu rgyu// ji ltar sa la kun brten cing // sa skye kun kyang 'byung ba bzhin//
363b4(mdo sde): sems can kun gyi gnas yin te// 'byung ba kun gyi khyad par du// de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang // rnam shes rnams kyi gnas yin te// sems dang sems las byung bar ldan// dpa'
363b5(mdo sde): rlabs bzhin du rab tu 'byung / / ji ltar rma ba'i 'dab sgro rnams// 'od dang kha dog rnam mang ste// gtsug pud can rnams 'dab sgro yis// rma bya mo dang longs rtsa ba// de bzhin kun gzhi
363b6(mdo sde): rnam shes kyang / / sa bon mang can mtsho ltar gnas// thams cad chos kyi gzhi yin te// rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu mthong // ji ltar rgya mtsho chu bo yis// nyin gcig bzhin du dgang
363b7(mdo sde): bya yang / / chu bo rnams ni rgyur mi 'chad// rgya mtsho rdzogs par yong mi byed// de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang // zab cing mtsho ltar gnas pa ste// rnam shes rnams kyis nyin gcig bzhin//
364a1(mdo sde): bag chags chu bos rab tu gang // ji ltar rin chen ldan pa yis// sna tshogs kun tu phan 'dogs te// sems can rnams kyang nye bar 'tsho// yon tan dngos su
364a2(mdo sde): ston pa yin/ / de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang // rnam rtog rnams dang lhan cig 'byung // de ni 'khor ba 'phel byed de// gyur na de bzhin gshegs pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa
364a3(mdo sde): skyobs bcas/ / stor pa legs bshad gtsang ba // sa bcu pa las mngon 'byung // bde bar gshegs pa'i slar zhugs nas// yang dag mtha' la rab gnas pa/
364a4(mdo sde): tshogs sems can rnam sprul par// 'jigs pa med par 'byung ba ni// rnam par rtog meng sa bzhin no// sos ka me tog mang po gzugs// mi dang bya yi yid du 'ong // de bzhin
364a5(mdo sde): sna tshogs len pa'i sems/ / thub shes yid 'ong myos par byed// ji ltar don mkhas rgyal ba'i sras// 'byung las byung ba ma yin pa// med pa'i blo can de bzhin te//
364a6(mdo sde): log par smra la brtsor pa dag/ chos dang mi mthun phra ma can// lce gnyis log par lta ba dag/ rnam pa gzhan du gnas pa'i dngos// rnam pa gzhan du ston par byed// ji ltar
364a7(mdo sde): sgyu ma'i skyes bu zhig/ 'bras bu sna tshogs ston byed pa// 'bras bu me tog de na med// sngags dang khong gzos zo mdog bde// 'jig rten rnam pa gzhan gnas pa// rnam
364b1(mdo sde): pa gzhan du ston par byed/ / rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i sras// kun kyang thabs kyi dmigs la mkhas// bstan pa gzhan la ji snyed du// bstan pa byas pa de dag kun//
364b2(mdo sde): bde gshegs rnal 'byor mkhas pa yis// bstan pa stug po'i rgyan la bstan// khams rnams drug dang bco brgyad dang // skye mched bcu dang gnyis kyi mi// yid
364b3(mdo sde): kyi srad bus btags pa dag/ sems can kun tu rab tu 'khor// rnam par shes pa brgyad kyi tshogs// khams dang skye mched phung po ste// yid kyi srad bus bcings
364b4(mdo sde): byas shing / / lus dang lus la rab tu rgyu// 'di ni 'gro ba'i skyes bu ste// 'gro ba rnams kyi don du bstan// lus can kun gyi skyes bu ni// 'gro yang 'byung
364b5(mdo sde): ba ma yin te/ / khams rnams drug po skyes bu yin// skye mched bcu gnyis de bzhin te// bco brgyad rnams la yid rgyu ba// dbang sgyur zhes ni bya ba ste// dbang
364b6(mdo sde): skyur po brang sna tshogs pa/ / nor bu rin chen grong rdal dang // dga' ldan la sogs bsnyems bral dang // mtshe ma'i gnas su'ang de bzhin bshad// rdo rje snying po
364b7(mdo sde): dbang can la/ / rgyal sras 'jigs pa med pa'i rnams// dge'o dge bshes dga' 'bod cing // thams cad mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// thub ldan rnal 'byor
365a1(mdo sde): spyod pa dang / / rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i sras// zhing dang zhing na bzhugs pa dang // lha yul gnas pa'i rgyal sras dang // rnal 'byor
365a2(mdo sde): bdag po rnal 'byor can/ / ye shes dbang po 'phrul chen dang // dbang sgyur lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyang // thal mo sbyar te gnas par gyur// phan tshun
365a3(mdo sde): gcig la gcig lta zhing / / rgyal ba'i sras la smra ba ni// 'gro ba'i lha rdzas skyes bu yang // mur 'dug bdag smra spangs pa ste// thub can kun gyi skyes bu ni//
365a4(mdo sde): thub pa'i khyu mchog khyod kyis bstan// 'das dang da ltar byung ba yis// sngon byas ma byas thob pa ni// sngon gyi rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis// khams drug
365a5(mdo sde): skyes bu dge ba'o/ / ji ltar mkha' la byarjes rnams// rnam par gzhag pa de bzhin du// sems tshogs ldan pa'i khams kyi rnams// gtan
365a6(mdo sde): tshigs bcas pa rab tu bstan/ / ji ltar shing las me dag gis// me lce gnam du gnas par 'gyur// bsreg pa gzhan ni ma rnyed cing // klung gis bab na
365a7(mdo sde): gtan mi 'bar/ / bya rjes rnam par gzhag pa ni// mkha' la gnas par mi snang ste// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'khor ba yi// 'gro ba'i skyes bu snang ba yin//
365b1(mdo sde): bya rnams rkang pas mi 'dod pa// de dag spro yi shugs kyis 'dod// bya yi rjes dang 'dra ba ni/ skyes bu'i sgo nas rab tu bsnun// las kyi skyes bu bstan pa ni//
365b2(mdo sde): 'khor na rtag tu 'khor ba ste// bde dang sdug bsngal myong byed pa// byas pa'i las ni chud mi za// ji ltar zhing pa rnams kyi las// 'bras bu med par mi
365b3(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ / don dang ldan pa de dag ni// gzhan yang 'ong zhes rmo ba med// lha rdzas 'gro ba'i skyes bu ni// rnal 'byor can la rnal 'byor ston// lus can
365b4(mdo sde): lus kyi nang na zhing / / de ni dge pa'i las byed do// 'di dang phyi ma'i bde ba dang // lha yul gnas pa'i gnas mthong zhing // 'khor las sangs rgyas rgyus 'gyur
365b5(mdo sde): ba'i/ / bsod nams rnams ni rtag tu byed// thar dang pha rol phyin rnams dang // sangs rgyas bsam gtan spyod yul kun// 'gro ba'i skyes bu med na ni// kun kyang
365b6(mdo sde): 'bras bu med par 'gyur/ / lha yi bde ba thams cad dang // dbang sgyur rnams kyi 'bras bu dang // de bzhin nyid mthong thub pa yi// rnal 'byor rnams kyang med par 'gyur//
365b7(mdo sde): las dang las kyi 'bras bu mthong // las rnams don med ma yin te// 'o dod 'bod la sogs pa dang // mnar med mtha' dang lha rnams kyi// lam gyi rgyud kyang yod pa
366a1(mdo sde): yin/ / 'gro ba'i skyes bu de yod na// srid pa'i 'khor lor 'khor bar 'gyur// 'khor dang bral na thar pa ste// blo zhan rnams kyis mi shes so//
366a2(mdo sde): 'jug pa'i skyes bu med na ni// mog sham bu yang 'gro bar 'gyur// bong bu'i rwa yang rnor 'gyur te// bye ma las kyang til mar 'byung // byi dang nang gi sa rnams ni// phan
366a3(mdo sde): tshun stobs kyis byung ba ste/ / gang dang gang du 'dra ba dag/ de dang de dag 'grogs pa yin// lha dang lha yi bu mo'i tshogs// dbang sgyur rgyal ba'i sras rnams dang // dri za
366a4(mdo sde): grub pa'i rgyal po dang / / sngags 'chang chung ma'i tshogs rnams kyang // thub la mchod par 'os pa yis// rdo rje snying po sras bcas la// mchod de gsol ba 'debs byed pa// thams
366a5(mdo sde): cad dge 'o dag bshes smra/ / nyams pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul// rgyu dang dpe yis brgyan pa ni// gzhan gyi rgol ba 'joms pa ste// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bstan// 'gab gzung
366a6(mdo sde): lhag chod tshar gcod pa/ / bdag gi phyogs kyi yon tan ston// shes rab can gyis bstan du gsol// 'gro ba 'di dag nyan par 'gyur// ji snyed rgyal ba'i sras rnams dang // lha yi
366a7(mdo sde): rgyal po kun kyang nyon/ / shin tu dka' ba'i bsam yas rgyu// brtag 'das rtog dang bral ba yi// rgyu dang dpe yi me tog ste// rnal 'byor rnams kyis thub dge bas// stug po'i rgyan ni bshad par
366b1(mdo sde): bya/ / ri ni thub la rnal 'byor ston// stug po'i rgyan de sna tshogs te// sdug na spyod pa'i thub pa yi// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas kyi mchog/ thub pa kun gyi dam pa'o// sa stengs thub pa'i rdum
366b2(mdo sde): la/ / rdo rje snying pos yang smras pa// rtag par du ma khyod kyis kyang // chos kyi dngos nyid shes par gyis// dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin ci// dngos su stong ngam rtag pa zhes// 'di 'dra'i lha dang ldan pa yi//
366b3(mdo sde): thub pa'i rnal 'byor mi 'khrul lo// chos pa gcig pu rtogs pa yis// chos par mngon du shes pa ste// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin yang // dngos po gcig gis shes par 'gyur//
366b4(mdo sde): ji ltar ji bzhin bsrubs pa'i zho// sor mo'i rtse mos mngon shes pa// de bzhin dngos po thams cad kyi// rang bzhin dngos pos shes par 'gyur// dngos po ci med stong pa nyid//
366b5(mdo sde): dngos po dngos por yod pa'ang med// 'di dag kun gzhi'i rnam pa ste// stong nyid kun gzhi rnam pa'o// rgyal sras rdum 'jigs med pas// rdo rje'i snying po de la smras//
366b6(mdo sde): lus can rnams kyis khams kyi mi// ji lta bur na sems tsam 'gyur// 'byung ba chen po rgyur byas shing // 'byung las byung ba ji lta bu// g.yo ga sher tsha dang sra ba yi// khams
366b7(mdo sde): rnams ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur/ / rgyal sras rdo rje snying po yis// du ma'i bdag po'i tshig zos nas// mi 'am ci bdag khyod dag ste// khyod ni dge'o yang dge'o// rnal 'byor can
367a1(mdo sde): gyi snying po'i mchog/ yid 'ong byed pa gang dris pa// sems ni skyes bu'i lus can la// khams rnams skye 'gyur ji lta zhes// de phyir dbang sgyur rgyal sras la//
367a2(mdo sde): dade ni dge bar bshad par bya// de bas mi 'am ci yi bdag/ pi wang slob dpon bdag la nyon// ji ltar mi 'am ci yi bdag/ khyod dang mi ci mang bcas pa// bsnyems bral mang po sna tshogs kyis// nam
367a3(mdo sde): mkha' las ni rab 'dong zhing / / rgyal ba nyan thos tshogs 'khor du// bi wa nga sgra dbyangs snyan blangs pas// thub pa dru ma lhog shig ces// phan tshun gcig la gcig kyang gsung // bsnyem bral mang
367a4(mdo sde): po sna tshogs na/ / mi 'am ci dang 'grogs rtse zhing // pi wang bai DUR+Yas spras pa// len cing mkha' las 'gro ba'i tshe// pi wang yid 'ong shin tu snyan// dbyangs kyis yongs su sbyangs pa ste// mi 'am ci yi
367a5(mdo sde): bdag po yis/ / rab tu blangs par byas pa'i tshe// nyan thos rnams kyang gar byed de// nyan thos de dag gyur pa de// rgyal sras rnams kyis mthong ba dang // 'od srungs rnal 'byor bzang can dang // lha yi cod pan
367a6(mdo sde): la smras pa/ / rnam rtog med pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi// pi wang sgra ni bsgrags pa yis/ 'dod chags bral ba ci phyir gyur// 'od srungs khyod kyis nged la ston// rgyal sras stobs chen myur rlung bzhin//
367a7(mdo sde): ri dgas rnams dang 'dra ba ni// nyan thos g.yo ba'i blo can rnams// bag chags 'das kyi dri ma can// nyon mongs rnam rtog byung bas mnar// yang dag sangs rgyas sku rnyed nas// bag chags dri ma yongs bsal
367b1(mdo sde): te/ / bdag med gnyis kyis yongs dag cing // shes bya sgrib pa'i dri med na// sems kyi khams las gzhan 'gyur ba'i// de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu 'gyur// khyod ni dbang can phra yul ldan// shes rgya che
367b2(mdo sde): zhing gtsug lag mkhas/ / dbang po 'jig rten byol ba yi// gtsug lag mtshan la khyod gnas te// mi 'am ci yi gtsug lag kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor dag/ sa yi mtshan nyid mkhas
367b3(mdo sde): bya la/ / bslabs te zla ba bzhin gnas pa// mi 'am ci yi dbang po khyod// sa dang zhing rnams bye bar mdzes// khyod ni de ltar rnam mdzes shing // thub can dbang sgyur tshegs dbus su// khams
367b4(mdo sde): kyi sems las skyes pa ni/ / kho bo la ni sras kyis dris// mnyam sems mnyam par gzhag pa yis// thams cad lhan cig mnyan par gyis// khams rnams gang du ci tshul du// sems su grags
367b5(mdo sde): paba'i skyes bu la/ / rgyu rnams gang gis 'byung ba yi// de tshul bdag gis bstan par bya// chu ni rlan rnams skyed par byed// drod ni me'o srabs// bdeg la sogs pa'i bya ba rnams// rlung gi khams
367b6(mdo sde): kyi kun nas rtsom/ / gzugs la sogs pa'i sa mtshan ni// nam mkha' kun nas rtsom par byed// rnam shes sna tshogs yul can ni// bag chags rnams kyi rab tu bskyed// srid kyi mtshams dang
367b7(mdo sde): mig dag gi/ skye ba'i sgo rnams byed pa ni// gzugs la sogs pa'i tshogs kun te// rgyal po mtshan ni rnam pa mang // nor bu rin chen sna tshogs gnas// dbang sgyur pho brang bzang po na// rnal
368a1(mdo sde): 'byor ldan can shugs 'dzin pa/ / rgyal mas rnams kyis mdun bdar zhing // so so'i stan las kun langs te// yang dang yang ning phyag 'tshal nas// rim gror rdo rje'i
368a2(mdo sde): snying po la/ / mchod pa'i dam pas mchod pa byed// rin chen dra bas steng bkab cing // yang dang yang du gsol ba byed// dge'o dge'o yang dge'o// dge ba ldan la rab gnas shing // chos kyi sprin gyi tshul rnyed
368a3(mdo sde): nas/ / sangs rgyas sa la rab zhugs te// dbang sgyur rgyal ba'i sras rnams la// sangs rgyas yul rnams rab tu bstan// rgyal po lha mo bcas pa yis// de nas yang du mchod byas te// rnal 'byor che can dge'o/
368a4(mdo sde): dag/ rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med pa// lha rdzas de bzhin gshegs pa yi// chos de bdag la bstan pas na// nor bu rin chen sna tshogs gnas// bkra shis gtsang mar rab tu byas// thub ldan
368a5(mdo sde): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/ / blo gros chen po byams pa dang // blo gros mi zad mthu chen dang // 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa dang // lha yi cod pan rnal 'byor bdag/ shugs 'dzin dru ma blo gros
368a6(mdo sde): dang / / gzungs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang // rin chen gtsug pud 'phrul can dang // yang dag ji bzhin mthong ba dang // mtshe ma'i rab dang 'byor 'dzin dang // rnal 'byor slob dpon rnal 'byor che// rnal
368a7(mdo sde): 'byor can la sems smon pa/ / thub pa thams cad don 'grub pa// thub sras 'jigs pa med pa rnams// 'di dag gzhan yang mang po ste// rgyal ba'i sras po 'phrul chen rnams// so so'i stan las kun
368b1(mdo sde): langs nas/ / de dag gcig la gcig bltas te// rdo rje snying po de la spras// chos kyi tshul ni bstan par gyis// khyod ni rgyal dbang byin gyis brlabs// ta sras rnams kyis rab tu mchod// sa yi mtshan
368b2(mdo sde): la mkhas pa yang / / khyod la thams cad shin tu gnas// khyod la gsol ba 'debs pa ni// rgyal sras stobs chen thams cad dang // rnal 'byor can dang rnal 'byor bdag/ sngags 'chang bu me
368b3(mdo sde): thams cad do/ / rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal sras dang // 'jig rten rnams kyi ngo mtshar gzhi// mdo sde kun gyis dri med cing // bstan dang klag pa rnam spangs pa// stug po'i rgyan 'di bsten pa'i phyir/ rnal
368b4(mdo sde): 'byor bdag khyod spobs par gyis/ / sprul pas bshad pa spangs pa ste// de bzhin gtam dang sprul pas kyang // zag pa med pa chos kyi dbyings// so so rang rig spyod pa'i yul// lha rdzas mthong ba'i chas
368b5(mdo sde): la bde/ / 'phags pa rnams la de ston cig/ phung po lhag ma ma lus par// grol ba'i chos kyi dbyings ston cig/ ting nge 'dzin dang gzugs kyi rnams// rnam par thar dang dbang rnams dang // yid bzhin
368b6(mdo sde): rnam pa bcu po yi/ / lus kyi tshogs kyang bstan par gyis// sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsam yas da / mgon po rnams kyi zhing gi rgyan// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal sras kyis// rdul phran bzhin gyi sku phra dang // /
368b7(mdo sde): sgra rtsa brgya char phra ba dag/ rgyal sras khyod kyis bshad par gyis/ bstan dang bkra rnam bral 'ang // brjod pas rnam par spangs pa yi// stug po zhing ga dam pa der// ci nas thub pa 'dong ba'i phyir//
369a1(mdo sde): rnal 'byor mkhas pas seng ge ltar// thub pa de dag kun bltas te// 'gro ba'i tshogs rnams thams cad la// brtag par mi nus brtag bral ba'i// chos tshul rab tu bstan par bya//
369a2(mdo sde): blo yi mthu yang kun brtags na// rnal 'byor can dag chos kyi tshul// sngon gyi gzhung lugs nyan nus pas// tshangs pa'i sgra dang dbyangs su ste// ka la bing+ga'i sgra skad du// rgyal chen lce yis rab snyan par//
369a3(mdo sde): rdo rje snying pos shin tu bshad// seng ge ro stod lus 'chang ba// mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis dang // dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa'i lus// rdo rje'i snying pos shin tu bstan// ki ma ka'i sgral mkhas pas
369a4(mdo sde): na/ / sgra yi mtshan nyid grags pa yis// mdor na de yid nyid 'gyur du// rgyal sras de ni shin tu ston// sang sang dag pa dbyangs la sogs// mthong zhing ring ba'i sgra skad dang // gan dar dngang ldan par
369a5(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i sras pos rab tu bstan/ / ri sha pa dang de ba ta// shardza ke shi lnga po yi// sgra skad mtshan nyid ldan pa yi// dbyangs kyi thub pa rnam par gsung // ring dang dal med pa yi tshig/ zab cing snyan pa'i
369a6(mdo sde): sgra dbyangs te/ / mtshan nyid mkhas dang dri za la// de bzhin sripa par byed pa yi// tshig gi yon tan ldan pa'i tshig rdo rje snying pos brjod pa ni// lhun gyis grub par byas pa ste// sprul pa'i gzhin du 'byung
369a7(mdo sde): ba yin/ / thub sras rdo rje'i snying po ni// ci yang rjod par mi byed par// thams cad yan lag mtshan nyid sgra// yan lag rnams las mngon par 'byung // smin mang dpral ba'i spyi bo dang // phrag pa sna rtse byin
369b1(mdo sde): pa las/ / chos kyi tshul rnams rab ston cing // dge ba'i sgra rnams 'byung bar 'gyur// rdo rje snying po thub pa yi// smon lam legs las byung ba ste// bre mo'i ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin// rgyal ba'i sras
369b2(mdo sde): rnams kun nas 'dus/ / dbang sgyur pho brang bzang po na// thams cad gzugs kyi rin chen bzhin// dpa' chen rdo rje'i snying po de// rnam par mdzes la kun lha'o// skar ma'i dbang po skar ma yi//
369b3(mdo sde): gza' yi dbus na mdzes pa bzhin// rdo rje'i snying po rnal 'byor can// dam pa'i stan la rnam par mdzes// ji ltar skar ma'i dbang po dang // zla ba'i 'od du bye brag med// de bzhin rdo rje'i snying po dang /
369b4(mdo sde): rgyal ba rnams su khyad par med// yang dag ji bzhin don mthong ba'i// rgyal ba'i sras po stobs po che// rnal 'byor can dang thub pa mchog/ rnal 'byor pa yi lam gnas pa// stan las legs par
369b5(mdo sde): ldang byas shing / / rgyal sras rnams la mngon bltas nas// tshig dag rnam par smras pa ni// kye ma theg chen theg pa ni// sangs rgyas spyod yul bsam mi khyab// de la gnas shing rgyal sras dang // rgyal ba bsam
369b6(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab ston/ / bye ba'i zhing bzhugs rgyal ba dang // rgyal sras de dag thams cad kyang // dri med bsam gyis mi khyab chos// dgongs pas phyag bya 'os pa yin// theg pa chen po'i tshul dge ni// mchog tu phra zhing
369b7(mdo sde): dkon pa'o/ / gzhan du gyur pa'i tshul gyi mchog/ rtog la ma yin// rnam par shes pa brgyad kyi yul// rang bzhin rnams la khyad par byed// bdag med nyid ni lnga po yi// de bzhin khyad par byed
370a1(mdo sde): bsan/ / bag chags spros pas 'bangs pa de// yun ring gnas ngan len pa dang // sems dang sems las byung ldan zhing // rnam shes rnams las rab tu byung // lha rdzas tshul 'di
370a2(mdo sde): mthong ba dang / / gser bzhin rnam par byang bar 'gyur// rnam dag rigs la gnas pa dag/ sangs rgyas rigs su de dag 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha rdzas rigs// mur 'dug nyan thos rnam spangs pa// thob
370a3(mdo sde): nas sangs rgyas zhing gi mchog/ stug po de bzhin 'dong bar 'gyur// ting 'dzin 'di yi yul ni gang // ting 'dzin 'di yi ming yang ci// rdo rje snying pos gang thob phyir// tshul dag 'di ni ston par gyur// rdo rje'i snying po'i rkang
370a4(mdo sde): gnyis la/ / thub pa rnams kyis phyag byas nas// rdo rje snying po 'jigs med kyi// rdo rje'i blo la bshad par mdzod// ting 'dzin yul ni gang zhig yin// ting 'dzin 'di yi ming yang ci// gang la gnas shing tshul
370a5(mdo sde): 'di yang / / rgyal sras khyod ni bshad pa mdzod// rgyal ba'i sras rnams nyan par 'dod// dbang sgyur bdag kyang de bzhin no// rdo rje snying po 'jigs med kyis// 'khor du 'dus pa thams cad dang //
370a6(mdo sde): tshul 'di bsam gyis mi khyab dang // rgyal ba'i sras kyi mthu stobs dang // blo la 'dzin pa'i mthu kun dang // nus sam mi nus zhes bltas nas// blo 'dzin mthu ldan mthong ba dang // rgyal sras thams cad
370a7(mdo sde): mthu ldan gyis/ / thams cad ma 'gyur mnyan par gyis// gzhan du gyur pa'i tshul dge ba// dbang sgyur lha yul gnas pa dang // thub pa rnams la bshad par bya// theg pa chen po 'od can gyi// ting 'dzin yul ni
370b1(mdo sde): 'di yin te/ / de la gnas shing rgyas sras rnams// tshul dag ra tu ston par byed// bye ba'i zhing rnams rab tu mthong // de dag mgon po de bzhin no// rdul gyi mtha' mar thug pa'i rnams// de dag rang bzhin
370b2(mdo sde): las ston to/ / dga'o dge zhes rab tu gsungs// 'di ni rnal sa bzang ldan lam// lam 'dis nged rnams thams cad kyang // ting nge 'dzin la dbang sgyur ba// thob nas sangs rgyas dri med gyur// gang yang
370b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas ting 'dzin skyes/ / theg pa chen po snang ba yi// ting nge 'dzin gyi pra sems pa// de la gnas shing rgyal sras dang // rgyal ba bsam yas spyod yul can// sprul pa bye ba mang po yis// so so rang
370b4(mdo sde): rig spyod yul gyi/ / ting 'dzin sangs rgyas mthong ba ni// shin tu phra ba'i rdul snyed do// so so rang gis rig tshul ni// gang la sangs rgyas gnas pa yin// chos 'di mtshan ma med pa ste// sgra dang gzugs
370b5(mdo sde): kyis rnam par spangs/ / ming ni mtshan mas bskyed pa yin// mtshan ma rkyen las byung ba ste// rnam par rtog pa gnyis las skas// chos rnams kyi ni de bzhin nyid// de ni yang dag gsung mthong ba// de yi ye shes yang
370b6(mdo sde): dag mtshan/ / rang bzhin brtags pa ming yin te// mtshan ma gzhan gyi dbang las byung // ming dang mtshan ma med pa na// rang bzhin don gyi dam pa ni// thams cad lus la kun nas gnas// kun gzhi de phyir 'byung ba
370b7(mdo sde): ste/ / bag chags rnams kyi ri khrod gnas// yid kyis gnas ngan len gyis g.yogs/ yid kyi rnam shes spyod pa yas/ yi ni phrin phyogs rgyas par byas// rnam shes lnga po yul can dag/ 'byung zhing phyir lang ldog pa yin
370b8(mdo sde): rnam shes lnga yi yul rnams ni/ / sems can bzhin gnas lus can la// kun gzhir grags pa'i chu klung las// dpa' rlabs bzhin du rab tu 'byung // rnam shes kun gzhir mtshor gnas pa//
370b9(mdo sde): bag chags rnams kyis brnyosgos pa'i rnams// yul gyi rlung gis skrod pa dag/ rnam par rgyan chad med par rgyu// chos la bdag med mkhas pa yi// sangs rgyas rnams dang sangs rgyas sras// bde bar gshegs pa'i gnas 'thob
370b10(mdo sde): ste/ / mngon sangs rgyas zhing chos sbyor to// phung po gang zag bdag med par// rab sunam phye mthong gyur cing // chos kyi dngos yod ma bshigs par// nyan thos de dag mngon rdzogs 'gyur/ bdag med gnyis la mkhas pa
370b11(mdo sde): nyid/ / rgyal ba'i sras rnams sgom par byed// rnam par bsgoms shing spong ba ni// tshul bshad bzhin du yang dag mtha'// yang dag mtha' yi bde myong zhing // snying rje med pa'i sras rnams // sems can dgos pa'i
370b12(mdo sde): rgyun bcang bas/ / de dag sangs rgyas mi 'thob bo// bsam yas kyin ye shes 'di// sems can rnams kyi bde bskyed// mkhyen cing rgyal brgyal sras rnams// blo chung rnams la tshul ston to// ji ltar 'das las byung ba yis//
370b13(mdo sde): dge ba'i mtshan ldan pad+mo dag/ thub pa rnams dang lha dag gi/ nye ba'i longs spyod rgya yin no// de bzhin 'khor ba'i 'dam mcholas// rgyal ba'i sras rnams 'byung ba ni// sangs rgyas dri med rab rnyed cing// lha la yid
370b14(mdo sde): du 'ong ba yin/ / byang chub sems dpa' mi rnams dang // lha yi khrod du khyad par du// rgyal po'i khyu mchog 'gyur ba ste// 'khor lo can du'o khyad par du// lha yul gnas pa'i bdag po dang // dri za rnams kyi de bzhin
370b15(mdo sde): te/ / theg chen yon tan ldan pa yi// lus can rnams kyis rtag tu 'thob// de phyir rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis// theg pa che la brtson par gyis// mthar gyis bde gshegs gnas rab dang // rgyal po rtag tu'ang
370b16(mdo sde): 'gyur bar 'ong / / kun nas nyon mongs chos rnams dang // rnam par byang ba'i yod pa kun// rtag tu lus can thams cad kyi// sa la kun gzhi 'byung ba yin// spyi dang rgyu rnams lhan cig gam// 'on tam skye
370b17(mdo sde): dang dbang pos kyang / / gtso bo rkyen dang rgyu rnams kyi// 'jig rten rab tu bsgrub par byas// khyad par can gyi rgyu brjod pa// ci nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste// rgyu med par yang med par 'gyur// bya med pa yang
370b18(mdo sde): med par 'gyur/ / rnam par byang dang tha mi dad // kun gzhi tha dad 'gyur ba min// de sten rnam byang tha dad na// kun gzhi rtag pa ma yin 'gyur// sngon med 'jigs med rtag pa ste// mtha' bzhi rnam par spangs pa
370b19(mdo sde): yin/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dag/ sprul pa ye shes slar yang chags// ngan tshun snying po tha mings// da ni sor gdu ba bzhin du gnas// sa rnams sna tshogs kun gzhi ste// bdag shegs snying po dge pa'ang de//
370b20(mdo sde): snying po de la kun gzhi smras/ de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa mdzad// snying po kun gzhir bsgrags par yang // blo zhan rnams kyis mi shes so// gser mgar mkhas pas rnam dag gis// gser las sor gdub byas pa ni/
370b21(mdo sde): sor mo rnams la rnam par mdzes// phan tshun tha dad mtshan yin te// sor gdub ces kyang brjod mod kyi// las kyi mkhan pos yongs bsgyur bas// gser ni gzugs bzhin rab tu gnas// chos mthong rnal 'byor ldan pa yi// sems da
370b22(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa'i yul/ / bdun pa'i sa ni rnyed pa dang // 'byung ba las kyang rnam par ldog/ 'phags pa mthong ba'i chos ldan gyi// so so rang rig mthong ba dang // spyi dang bdag gi legs 'phags pa// thams cad
370b23(mdo sde): brjod par mi nus so/ / ji snyed yul yod ci yang rung // sems dang rnams shes spyod yul du// sna rogs snang ba de dag kyang // rnam shes yiran te yul med do// sems ni rngam pa gnyis dngos su// gzung dang 'dzin par snang ba ste// rdza pra sngam
370b24(mdo sde): bu sogs pa yi/ / yul ni gang yang yod pa min// ji ltar ri rab brten byas shing // nyi zla gza' yi tshogs kyi rnams// bral ba med par rtag 'brang ngo // de bzhin rnam dag kun gzhi la// rnam dag 'phags pa'i spyod yul ni//
370b25(mdo sde): rtag par gser bzhin rab tu 'bar// kun gzhi snying por bsgrags pa ni// rtog pa'i sems kyi yul ma yin// rang bzhin rnam par brtags pa dang // rtogs par nus pa ma yin dang // yongs su grub pa'i rang bzhin yang //
370b26(mdo sde): rnal 'byor thub can rtag tu mthong // yid kyi rnam shes yul can ni// byis pa rnams la 'ching ba'i dngos// smig rgyu sa tshogs byung ba ste// 'phags pa rnams kyis dri med gzigs// stong phrag bcu gnyis pa'i
370b27(mdo sde): rgyan stug po las/ ji snyed brjod pa'i mdo rdzogs so// / bsgyur ba ma rdzogs par bzhed// rgya gar skad du
370b28(mdo sde): Ar+ya tsa tra ra sa t+ya sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bden pa bzhi'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na
370b29(mdo sde): / bcom ldan 'das dmar bu can gyi grong khyer dang rgyal po'i khab kyi bar gyi dbus na/ rgyal po'i ma'i dbyug pa can nus mo nye bar rten cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//
370b30(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga dang khyed cag kho nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag ma shes/ ma mthong / khong du
370b31(mdo sde): mchud/ so sor ma rtogs pas lam ring po 'dir rgyug cing 'khor bar gyur to// bzhi po de gang zhe na/ nga dang khyed cag kho nas sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa ma shes/ ma mthong / khong du ma chung /
370b32(mdo sde): so sor ma rtogs pas lam ring po 'dir rgyug cing 'khor bar gyur to// nga dang khyed cag kho nas sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'phags pa'i bden pa ma shes/ ma mthong / khong du ma chud/ so sor ma rtogs
370b33(mdo sde): pas lam ring po 'dir rgyug cing 'khor bar gyur to/ / nga dang khyed cag kho nas sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa ma shes/ ma mthong / khong du ma chud/ so sor ma rtogs pas lam ring po 'dir rgyug cing 'khor
370b34(mdo sde): bar gyur to/ / nga dang khyed cag kho nas sdug bsngal 'gog pa lam 'phags pa'i bden pa ma shes/ ma mthong / khong du ma chud/ so sor ma rtogs pas lam ring po 'dir rgyug cing 'khor bar gyur
370b35(mdo sde): to/ / dge slong dag ngas sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa rjes su rtogs shing so sor rtogs te/ srid pa'i sred pa bcad pas 'khor ba'i skye ba zad de/ da ni srid pa gzhan med do// ngas
370b36(mdo sde): sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa rjes su rtogs shing so sor rtogs te/ srid pa'i sred pa de brdung bas 'khor ba'i skye ba za nga / nga ni sred
370b37(mdo sde): pa gzhan med do/ / ngas sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa rjes su rtogs shing so sor rtogs te/ srid pa'i sred pa de bcad pas 'khor ba'i skye ba zad de/ da ni srid pa gzhan
370b38(mdo sde): med do/ / ngas sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa rjes su rtogs shing so sor rtogs te/ srid pa'i sred pa nga bcad pas 'khor ba'i skye ba zad de/ nga ni
370b39(mdo sde): srid pa gzhan med do/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bang par gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/ ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad bka' stsal to//
370b40(mdo sde): nga dang khyad cag kho na yis// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag/ ji lta ba bzhin ma mthong bas// lam ring du ni 'khor bar 'gyur// bden pa de dag mthong nas ni//
370b41(mdo sde): srid pa'i sred pa bcad nas su// 'khor ba'i skye ba zad pas na// da ni srid pa gzhan med do// bcom ldan 'das kyis skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
